$$.value: Umm... why have you come?\r\n#b#L0#I have something to ask you.#l
Don’t know what you’d have to say to me, but hurry up.\r\n#b#L0#(Told Scadur of #p2020006#’s story.)#l
Hmm... he was wearing ski boots, right?
Hunter #b#p2020007##k will know what that creature was.
I can still feel my heart thumping.\r\n#b#L0#I heard you’ve been through a lot these days.#l

Yes, indeed! I had this sudden urge to see the beautiful snowfield scenery, so I went to #bEl Nath Mountain Range#b. However, I was attacked by a huge creature there.\r\n#b#L0#What kind of creature?#l
Nothing would believe it in me, but I saw a huge Yeti on skis wearing a woolen hat! \r\n#b#L0#Y... yeti?#l
Yes! You may think me strange, but I really saw one with my very two eyes! Nobody seems to believe me. Ah, right! He might know something about the creature. Please go and meet him.
Hunter #b#p2020007##k has been hunting this snowfield for a long time, and is bound to know something about the creature. Please go meet #b#p2020007##k.
You don’t believe me, don’t you? You’re no different from the rest of them! I just know he will believe in me... he’s the only one who can prove I’m not a liar.
It seems that #p2020006# was attacked by #b#o8220001##k.\r\n#b#L0#What is #o8220001#?#l
The Snowman is similar to a Yeti, but bigger in size and gentler. According to the legend, the Snowman was born through a snow spirit and a human.\r\n#b#L0#Legend? Can you tell me more?#l

The Snowman had the heart of a human, but the looks of a monster, so people neglected him. The snow spirit was sorry for the Snowman, and froze a whole mountain range for him. \r\n#b#L0#A whole mountain range? Then you must be saying...?#l

That’s right. The mountain range the snow spirit froze for Snowman is El Nath Mountain Range. Soon after, the Snowman disappeared deep into the mountain. The Snowman hates to be seen by humans.\r\n#b#L0#Is the legend true?#l

Well...a legend is just a legend, and we cannot tell its authenticity. Since the Snowman is a shy and gentle creature, you don’t need to be worried even if you get to run into it. You may repeat this to Jade.

The Snowman tends to hide if there is someone present, so to see one will be more difficult. I would personally want to meet one. Even I have never seen the Snowman in the years I've been hunting these grounds, I’d surely want to see one.
Just remember to repeat this on your way. Geez, I’m getting slightly annoyed.
Have you heard from Scadur? What did he say? \r\n#b#L0#(Told about Scadur’s Snowman story.)#l
What? Gentle? That can’t be! It attacked me first! That creature can’t be gentle! Scadur must be mistaken!
Go tell Jade this. The Snowman is definitely gentle. I think Jade did something to make the Snowman mad.
Have you found something?\r\n#b#L0#(Told Scadur about the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture.)#l
There was a reason after all! The Snowman is not violent.
If you ever find anything while walking around El Nath, please tell me.
Oh! Haven’t we met before? Yes, of course, about Jade.\r\n#b#L0#I think Jade is not thinking normally like she usually does ever since the attack. Jade says that the Snowman attacked her first.#l

Hmm... that can’t be right. Snowman never would attack a human being first. However, if Jade’s story is true than this is no ordinary situation. Don’t know what to think of it but it seems that the Snowman is angry. Will you investigate this for me?

I’m not quite sure myself. How could the Snowman, the owner of El Nath Mountain Range become so angry...? This is a big issue. We need to find the reason why. Try investigating near #b#m211040101##k, where #o8220001# is known to appear.
If the Snowman is angry, then this is no simple problem. The Snowman is the descendant of a spirit. If the Snowman is provoked in anyway, then a great avalanche may occur.

I understand that Snowman may be angry, if the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture is broken. According to the legend, the Snowman is the snow spirit’s offspring. Anyone as gentle as a Snowman would get angry seeing his mother’s statue shattered into pieces. Who would have done such a thing?

First things first. We need to restore the sculpture and quiet down the Snowman’s anger. However, to restore the sculpture we need to buy some more time. I need you to hold down the Snowman while the sculpture is being restored so he won’t start up an avalanche.

You can find the Snowman deep in the snowfield. Please hurry before an avalanche occurs. I’ll conjure up a plan to restore the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture. I know just the person to ask to restore the sculpture.
You still don’t understand? If the Snowman’s anger starts up an avalanche, all of El Nath will disappear!
It looks like you’ve done a good job in holding down the Snowman, since we’re not buried in snow yet. You’ve done well. I’ve heard the Snowman is really strong, as he is half a fairy.
You’re right on time. I’ve asked Alcaster to restore the sculpture, and he just finished preparing for it. Go meet Alcaster.
Please hold down Snowman until the sculpture is restored.

Welcome. Yes, I’ve heard from Scadur. I’ve barely managed to make an ice crystal to restore the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture. Here is the ice crystal. Go find the sculpture and restore it to its original form. As soon as the sculpture is restored, the Snowman will return to its gentle self.
I have heard you are doing a good job holding down the Snowman, but that won’t last forever. Restoring the sculpture is our only hope.
(As soon as the ice crystal is placed near the sculpture, the crystal sinks into the sculpture and the broken pieces are restored.)
(The Snowman’s crying is gradually quieting down. The huge creature disappears into the darkness from afar.)
Go seek the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture with this ice crystal.
(It seems that a special item is needed to restore the Spirit of the Snow Sculpture.)
You’ve lost the ice crystal. It is the only thing that can save El Nath. I can afford another spare to give to you, but please keep in mind that this is not easy to create. Please take care of it.

Hmm, this isn’t good. Her rage is turning the sky blood red. Curious to know who she is? Her name is #bEliza#k. She’s an ancient creature that is Luinel, but at the same time not Luinel. She was the Goddess’s favorite pet.

However, you shouldn’t underestimate #bEliza#k because she is a pet. Being a goddess’ pet means that you would exceed the intelligence, rationality, and wisdom of humans. #bEliza#k was very gentle, quiet, and loved music according to the goddess’s records. However...

The #bEliza#k now isn’t even near the descriptions of the records. Records on #bEliza#k’s strength are the same, but her nature is completely different now. She is ferocious and destroys anything in her way. Her rage is spreading all over Orbis. This has to do with what the #rPixies#k have done.

While #bEliza#k was sleeping, Papa Pixie kidnapped the Goddess, and other Pixies came to take her place. This is why #bEliza#k was enraged. Someone mighty like #bEliza#k can be dangerous when angered. Will you help to calm her rage?
Then please go defeat those Pixies. Defeating #r50 Star Pixies#k, #r100 Lunar Pixies#k, and #r150 Luster Pixies#k roaming the region will help clam #bEliza#k’s rage.
Someone needs to step up and stop Eliza’s rage.
You’ve done well with the Pixies. Now #bEliza#k will calm down and become rational once again. Let’s wait and see. We can see into #bEliza#k’s feelings through this crystal ball.
That’s strange.. the red forces have definitely reduced by a lot, but some still remains. What could be the problem?
You haven’t defeated all the Pixies yet, haven’t you? You need to defeat #r50, 100, and 150#k #rStar Pixiea#k, #rLunar Pixies#k, and #rLuster Pixies#k accordingly in order to calm Eliza’s anger.
You are welcome if you have good intentions, but if not, please leave here quietly. I will not forgive anyone that disgraces this peaceful and beautiful garden.

Looks as though you are here to speak to me. Listening to, and exchanging one another’s thoughts is a great way to advance one’s consciousness. Not to mention, a delightful experience. I, #bEliza#k welcome you.

You haven’t met #rEliza#k yet, haven’t you? There is no need to be afraid. If you go with good intentions then she will also welcome you. Do not worry and go to Eliza’s Garden. Eliza can be found behind a fallen pillar.
My crystal ball seems to be strange. #bEliza#k has returned to herself but there still are some red anger spots here and there. It’s as if there was a second #bEliza#k. That can’t be true.

Seems as though #bEliza#k’s rage as calmed down; a good time to go #btalk#k to her. Without a rational mind, #bEliza#k can be frightening, but in her original state, she is gentle and calm. Go talk to her, and persuade her not to destroy Cloud Park anymore.

Where can I find #bEliza#k? According to my crystal ball, #bEliza#k can be found in #bEliza’s Garden#k behind a fallen pillar at the #bStairway to the Sky II#k. She’s an ancient creature loved by the Goddess. Her nature exceeds the intelligence and nobility of human beings, so watch your manners in front of her.
She may suddenly change when she’s angry, but as long as you are polite to her, she will not do you any harm.
You’ve defeated my shadow. Thank you.
You haven’t defeated all my shadows yet. They may have my name, #rEliza#k, but their hearts are filled only with rage. Please go eliminate them all.
Human... I now know why you have come to meet me. You are a brave and strong being, and you have come to calm me down so that I will not to harm to others.

I couldn’t control my rage when I heard that my Goddess had been kidnapped right after I awoke from my sleep. That rage has brought about this tragedy. Now I know how foolish I was. I do not wish to hurt anyone else. However...

My angry impulse has created #rclones#k of myself that feel nothing but hatred inside. They look and have powers just like me, but their hearts are filled with hate. Since these are creations of my own rage, I cannot eliminate them. instead only confine them in #bStairway to the Sky II#k.
They will surely do some damage if we keep them there. Strong and brave human, would you please eliminate the shadows of #rEliza#k for me and for your race? I would be obliged to you if you would.
Thank you making a difficult decision. I will wait here until you eliminate all those shadowy Elizas.
The task may seem to be difficult, but I cannot hold you to it.

Thank you, adventurer. I feel a little relieved knowing that there is an adventurer that can eliminate those shadows. I must continue my eternal sleep, until my Goddess returns. Eternal sleep.#E \n\n#L0# #bIt will be a very long nap.#k#l

Yes, of course. Ah... do you like music, adventurer? There is nothing like falling asleep while listening to beautiful music. I used to fall asleep while my Goddess played the harp. I guess it would be difficult.#E \n\n#L0# #bMay I help you?#k#l
Ah...? You must have profound knowledge in music. Please play for me.
Here... this is my Goddess’s harp music book. Please play each note precisely. I am really looking forward to your music.
Haha... I might have asked a lot from you. Very well. It will take some time, but I will eventually fall asleep.
(Eliza seems to be in deep sleep.)
Seems you lost a book with the notes to Little Star. Here is another one. Please play it for me.

Hey, who's that? I, #p1094000#, will protect #b#p1072008##k and #bThe Nautilus#k! Remember the name, the hero of the pirates, #p1094000#! Hahahahaha! Wait, this is not it. What are you trying to do there? Whatever you are trying to do, it won't fool me! Not #p1094000#!

Eh? What? You're just here to investigate because you've never seen us before? Why didn't you just say that from the get go? We're not aliens or anything like that! We're just Pirates.  Fearsome, fight-to-the-last-man, potion-loving Pirates! Don't tell me you are thinking of Lord Pirate and those despicable bandits.  They suck!  We serve a cause much more true to the spirit of Victoria Island!

We ride around on our ship, The Nautilus, under the guidance of our captain, Kyrin, roaming around the coasts of Maple World, looking for the Black Magician. We use Knucklers and Guns to make sure that the root of all evil is vanquished--we want to make sure that the Black Magician never rises to the heights of power as he did before.

Just like the wisemen in Victoria Island training for the day the Black Magician returns, #p1072008# is busy making sure that his followers stay in low numbers.  She's so young, too. That's just so admirable!
So no more suspicious looks! We're not here to fight you! I swear on #p1072008#'s name!

We're not done with the fort's construction just yet, so I can't show you what's going on, but we'll be finished soon, so have no fear. If you want to join us and #p1072008# and become a mighty  #bGunslinger or Brawler#k, come back later. By then, we'll be ready to accept you with open arms, and train you to live the life of a Pirate!
You haven't gone to #b#m100030000##k yet? What if it turns out to be a deadly new monster terrorizing Victoria Island? Please go check so we can prepare for this threat!

Just a few minutes ago, while flying over the ocean, I saw this #bweird creature#k around the area. It was the size of a town! Its body looked like blackened, solid steel, yet it was able to move on top of the water and underneath it with equal prowess.

It really felt threatening, so I decided to chase this thing from behind, and wouldn't you know it, it was heading towards Victoria Island! Wait a minute... is this... a new monster getting ready to attack #m100000000#? This is really troubling.
If it's okay with you, can you head over to Victoria Island and find out what that creature really is?

Ahhh, thank you so much. That creature is located next to a town called #b#m100000000##k, at #b#m100030000##k. I don't know what it's thinking, but it's just standing still for now. Please go check and see if it really is a danger to Victoria Island!
I know it's dangerous, but I think it's something that needs to be clarified. I hope you change your mind!

(A young man looking very similar to Chil Sung is watching the sky absent-mindedly. Looking a little closer, his eyes are out of focus and his mouth is opened wide.) \r\n#L0# #b Hey, you! Are you all right?!
(Doesn’t budge a bit.) \r\n#L0# #b Hey, I’m talking to you! Get to your senses!
(Shaking him doesn’t seem to have any affect.) \r\n#L0# #b Say something!
(Chil Nam moves his lips slightly.) \r\n#L0# #b ... (What?)
A fox...
(What fox...? What could he be talking about? Let’s go ask Chil Sung.)
You haven't met #rChil Nam#k yet, have you? He lives on the other side of the village.
Sigh... What should I do... sigh... There has to be something I can do...  \r\n#L0# #b Hello, there? Are you okay?

Oh my, you caught me by surprise! Oh, sorry. I was thinking about something else... You really want to know? Then, yes. I do have a problem. It has to do with my brother, Chil Nam... sigh... \r\n#L0# #b What about your brother?

...Chil Nam... I think he’s possessed. He won’t eat nor sleep... He won’t do anything but stay... still. Watches the sky with no expression at all.   \r\n#L0# #b Oh... you don’t know why he became like this?

Doctors say it isn’t an illness, but seems like his soul has been stolen... I don’t know what to do. He’s the only relative I’ve got. You look like you’ve been to places and are experienced in a lot of things. Can you please take some time to look at my brother?
#bChil Nam#k lives on the other side of the village. Please take care and visit him.
It’s okay. I can’t make you go see him.
Have you gotten any clues? What... This? This cloth was from a Sammiho? This can’t be from a villager, because no body goes anywhere near Fox Valley. It’s too dangerous.

A piece of soft cloth... the only villagers who would wear something like this are Park Cheomji and Nolbu. It can’t be either of them, because they don’t leave the village. Then who could this cloth belong to? Hmm...

It can’t be... there is one other! Rather, a spirit wears something like this outside of the village. The Guardian Spirit! He always wears this fabric. But... why would a Sammiho carry a piece of the Guardian Spirit’s cloth? We’d better go and ask.
Seems as though you haven’t gotten any clues from the #rSammihoes#k. We might get something if we hunt them down.

How is Chil Nam? I hope he is getting better. What? He said something about a fox? A fox... maybe Chil Nam was attacked by Sammihoes from the Kamak Mountain? He actually did go to Kamak Mountain for wood before.
Still, I haven’t heard of people losing their minds because of a Sammiho. Would you mind going to Kamak Mountain and investigate the Sammihoes yourself? They may hold the key to the problem.
Please come back if you find anything while hunting down #rSammihoes#k. We will eventually find a way to cure Chil Nam if we work together.
Indeed... I don’t blame you. Sammihoes are not any ordinary creature. Sorry to have bothered you.
Hmm... hmm... Huh? People don’t usually come this far. Have you lost your axe? What? Have I had my clothes ripped off? How did you know? Actually, I was attacked by Sammihoes just a few days back.

A powerful monster has come to Kamak Mountain not long ago. There’s also a fox that’s been training for some time. It’s become a nine-tailed fox, also known as an #rOld Fox#k. Other Sammihoes were influenced by the Old Fox and came to steal my clothes. I’m embarrassed.

Old foxes are dreadful monsters that can steal away people’s souls. We must get rid it before it’s too late. What? Someone already lost their soul? Oh my... I would like to defeat the Old Fox myself, but my powers aren’t enough. What should we do...?

The #bGoblins#k of the Kamak Mountain may know how to defeat the Old Fox. How about it? Someone like you should go get the information from the Goblins. Of course, those goblins are unusual creatures, and won’t just give up their information easily.

Hmm, very well then. Please go to the #bDokebi House#k #bnear the Haunted House#k and persuade those Goblins to tell you how to save a someone whose soul was stolen by an Old Fox. Meanwhile, I’ll go see my master and ask whether he knows any good spells to use on the Old Fox.
Indeed... I understand. Goblins don’t like humans and are the real owner of the Kamak Mountain, so even I can’t get close to them. I can’t blame you if you’re scared.

Hmm... guess you’ve heard all about the Old Fox by now. Oh, great! The soul will come back by tickling the nose with this #bTail of the Old Fox#k? This is the greatest news I’ve heard in days. Then hurry and go to, Chil Sung or Chil Nam, whomever, with the good news!
My master warned that the Old Fox is more cunning than powerful, so you mustn't listen to what they say. Ask #bChil Sung#k to carry the news around the village to be careful of the Old Fox.
Why haven’t you gone to the Goblins yet? They are ugly, but they’ve also lived long enough on Kamak Mountain to know a lot about it. Hurry and get to the Haunted House first.

Ahem, ahem. Where have I put my Goblin cap? I always forget! My memory is getting shorter and shorter everyday! Oh! I lost it at the feast before, haven’t I? I’ve forgotten about the feast! Then I scolded the bad human who stole my cap! And... brought my cap back, but where did I put it?

Huh? Aren’t you human? What are you doing here? If you’re here to steal my cap, then you’re out of luck, because I already forgot where I put it. Ahem, ahem! What? You need to know about the #rOld Fox#k? Oh~ you are a strange human, aren’t you? Do you really want to know about the Old Fox?
Then get me #b1 bottle#k of #brice wine#k! Rice wine is a rather sweet beverage made by fermenting rice. One bottle to trade for information on the Old Fox!
What?! Not interested? Oh well. If you have poor memory like me, you would forget about it anyway!
Ahem, ahem. Brought the rice wine with you? Let’s see~ Hmm, this smell! It’s made by the best rice wine brewer, Kongji from the Folk Town! I love it! You’ve earned your piece of information.

The Old Fox appears around Kamak Mountain, particularly near the #bMoon Hill#k! You can go there by passing through the deep valley from the Fox Ridge. Many Sammihoes gather there to absorb moonlight to get strength. I recommend not going there if you value your life!
You haven’t brought #ba bottle#k of #brice wine#k yet? No rice wine, no Old Fox information!

I’m scared. I’m scared of the dark. I'm scared of loud noises. I'm scared of the thunder the most. I still haven’t found my Goblin Bat I lost during a thundering night! What...? What is a human doing here?

Don’t shout! I'm also scared of humans shouting! Especially loud, human females! I just can’t stand them! ...what? You want to know about the Old Fox? Of course I know about the Old Fox... but why would a human like you want to know about the #rOld Fox#k?
If you want to know about the Old Fox, get me a plate of #broasted pork#k. I’ll tell you everything I know about the Old Fox if you bring me a well-seasoned, roasted pork!
Then why are you here in the first place? Strange humans.
Oh! This smells scrumptious! You’ve brought the roasted pork! Okay, you goody two shoes! I’ll tell you everything I know about the Old Fox!

The Old Fox knows many spells. Spells ranging from black magic like the one that makes you blind, or weakening spells that takes your strength away so that you can’t run. The Old Fox also knows how to make someone faint. You must be careful because they also can heal each other.
Where is my #broasted pork#k? No roasted pork, no Old Fox information!

Huh?! What is a human doing here?! Have you come to challenge me in wrestling?! If that’s the case, you’re on! Wrestling is the best on a bright moonlit night! Okay, bring it on! What...? You want to wrestle the Old Fox?

Why not? You’re not here for the wrestling? Unbelievable! I was sure you came for the wrestling! But of course... you are a bit small to be a match for me. Then why are you here? What? You’re here for information on the #rOld Fox#k?
Ahem... of course I know about the Old Fox, but why would I give up information to someone who won’t even wrestle with me? I’ll think it over on #ba plate#k of soft #bbuckwheat jelly#k!
What? Not interested? Then, you really are here for the wrestling! Come on, let’s get it on!
Oh my~ this is the most delicious looking buckwheat jelly I’ve ever seen! So soft, yet so firm! Okay, I’ve decided to let you in on the Old Fox.
The Old Fox tends to collect human souls. Why? It’s said that an Old Fox can become human after collecting 1000 human souls. Not sure if it is true, myself! Old Foxes do, though.
You want to know how humans with their soul stolen become? Well... they become soulless dolls! They cannot be cured! It isn’t an illness, and they are missing their souls. Of course...

Get #rone of the nine tails of an Old Fox#k and try tickling the nose of the victim with it. The soul will come back after the victim sniffles! However, you’ll have to defeat an Old Fox first, and I know for sure that it won’t be easy! I’ve done my part of the bargain of buckwheat jelly, haven’t I?
What! No #bplate of buckwheat jelly#k? I want my buckwheat jelly~

You’re back! Have you met the Guardian Spirit? Have you learned why Chil Nam became this way? Oh... so it was the Old Fox's doing... they say that it’s dangerous to go to Kamak Mountain when foxes are growling... but Chil Nam didn’t listen! Is there a way to turn him back...

Oh, so you’ve also learned how to save him. How do we do it? We need the tail of an Old Fox? That is impossible! How can someone defeat a monster like the Old Fox and bring back its tail? Adventurer... can you bring the tail of the Old Fox for me instead?
The only way to save my little brother #bChil Nam#k is to bring the #bOld Fox’s Tail#k  He is still too young, and has a bright future ahead of him! Please help me!
I can’t force you to do it. But what about my brother, Chil Nam?
(Chil Nam sits still and stares at the sky. Let's try tickling his nose with the tail of the Old Fox.)
Achoo!
Sniffle... cold? What? Who are you? What are you doing here? What? I was possessed by a fox?

Ah... I remember helping a beautiful young woman while looking for wood in Kamak Mountain. And I can’t remember anything else after that. So she was the Old Fox! Ahhh... Just the thought of losing my soul to an Old Fox... it gives me the goose bumps!
If it weren’t for you, I’d still be under the Old Fox’s spell. How can I ever thank you enough?
Please do your best and bring the tail of the Old Fox so that #bChil Nam#k will return to normal.
(The Old Fox’s tail disappeared! I’ll have to go get another one.)
Have you heard the rumors?\r\n#b#L0#What rumors?#l
There are rumors about the Ghost Tree roaming around Perion.\r\n#b#L0#A Ghost Tree? Could there really be a Ghost Tree?#l\n#L1#No way~ ghosts don’t exist.#l

I guess so. I don’t believe the rumors either. However, I’ve also heard of something else. There is a legend of a tree that has grown in Perion since the olden days. You must have heard about it, right?\r\n#b#L0#Well... I don’t recall...#l

Well, if the tree in question were actually real, then it’d help my research a lot. That said, I don’t have enough evidence. Not many know about this particular tree.  The Indians of Perion seem to know something, but they won’t answer my questions.\r\n#b#L0#Could they be hiding something?#l
This is why I need your help. I’ve heard you’re closer to the Perion Indians than I am. Would you please help and collect information about that tree?
I see your curiosity got the better of you. In that case start your journey to #b#m102000000##k and find someone who knows about the tree. Anyone must have heard about the tree at least once.
Try talking to #b#p1020000#, #p1022007#, #p1022002#, and #p1022000##k. All right! Wouldn’t the botanist, Doctor #b#p1032104##k in #m101000000#, know something about the tree?
Where has your thriving curiosity gone? If you thought it was bothersome, then why didn’t you say so in the first place? What a waste of time.
Of course there isn’t anything like it!
Have you found something? Well, what is it?\r\n#b#L0#I didn’t have much luck.#l\n#L1#But I did hear some interesting stories.#l

(Told Doctor Winston of what I heard from the Perion residents.)


Hmm... so the rumor must be #b'#o3220000#'#k? You’ve done well.
You may go now, but please don’t go too far. I may need to reach you for your help on this rumor.
I can’t stop thinking about the story of the old tree. How did it go with the villagers?
It can’t be. There must be someone who knows about it. Keep asking questions.
Thank you. It’s worse than I thought. I will need to look into this.
See you again soon.
How is it going with the sample I asked for? I will need100 #b#t4031773##k I suppose you are collecting the samples, right?

The information you gave me was a great help. The tree from the rumor seems to be #b#o3220000##k. Rumor has it the stumps on #m102000000# Stone Mountain appear to be malnourished. You can see the stumps’ branches withering away.

All this concludes that #b#o3220000##k has returned. However, this is just my assumption, and no evidence exists to prove this. In order to prove my theory, I need #b#t4031773##k from the stumps. Will you help me again?

Thank you. You are a very active person. #b#t4031773##k is the #rcondition of all the stumps#k. In addition, Dark Axe Stumps are more prone to this condition than normal stumps. Observe these stumps and bring back #b100 #t4031773##k.
It’s not a difficult task. I don’t understand why you’ve suddenly switched gears on this.
You’re back. How did it go? Oh my, I understand. Try to feel the strength of the ground itself. Then you should feel differently. You have done an honorable deed.
However, I’m still feeling uneasy. The #m102000000# has suffered the most. Feels like we’ll never get our forest back to its original, healthy state.
Sorry, but I have no clue where to find #o3220000#. I apologize that I can’t be of much help. Nevertheless, you still need to defeat #r#o3220000##k. You understand, don’t you?
Welcome. I’ve been inspecting the #t4031773# you’ve brought, and I’m confident that my theory is true. However, the problem is that the results are much more serious than we expected.

I see you’re losing me. The #o3220000# weren’t nourishing on the stumps. They’ve been nourishing on #m102000000#. The stumps weren’t being dried up, but instead couldn’t find nourishment from the ground itself.
This is very dreadful situation. If this goes on #m102000000# will become a wasteland. You must help me once again.

#o3220000# is a very evil being. It’s not only almost invincible, but also dries out the life out of everything else. Getting rid of #r#o3220000##k is the only way to save #m102000000#. Please track down and defeat #o3220000#.
You still don’t understand, do you? This is a matter of life and death! Unbelievable! Coward!
What’s the matter?\r\n#b#L0#Have you heard about the Ghost Tree?#l

A ghost tree? Ah, you must be talking about the giant stump, right? I heard from my father that his father used to see such trees when he was young. The story says that each branch of the tree bears a red piece of cloth, which was dyed in the blood of ghosts. I have never seen it in person, so I don’t know whether or not it’s true.\r\n#b#L0#You didn’t catch anything else?#l
I’m sorry, but I’m not really good at following rumors.
What is it?\r\n#b#L0#Have you heard of a ghost tree?#l

You must have heard the story from cowards. There’s no such thing as a ghost tree. I’ve been training myself for a long time around the rocks, trees and mountains in #m102000000#. I have never seen or heard about it for long.\r\n#b#L0#Ah, is that true?#l
I heard unknown forces on the east side of the rocky mountain have been attacking people. The news is a bit disturbing.
Hi, traveler. What brings you here today? How can I help you?\r\n#b#L0#Do you know anything about a ghost tree?#l
Oh, my! You also heard about the story? #p1012108# of #m100000000# said she saw the ghost on the way back to her home after visiting #m102000000#for her mom’s errand.\r\n#b#L0#Are you serious?#l

Yes, she was going back to #m100000000# late at night. She stepped or tripped over a tree branch or something in the dark. She got scared and looked around, and you know what? She found a big eye staring into her as if it would eat her alive.\r\n#b#L0#That’s terrible...#l

#p1012108# was terrified and simply passed out at that moment. After dawn, a number of adults went up there, but found nothing. It must be ghosts. What can we do? I don’t think I can even get out of town. I’m too scared!
What is your business this time?\r\n#b#L0#Do you know anything about a ghost tree?#l
A ghost tree... I guess you’re talking about #b#o3220000##k.\r\n#b#L0#What is this #o3220000#?#l

It’s a very old tree surviving all the years ever since #m102000000# was covered with lush forests. As it weathered all the pains and tough times, its anger grew large. It was infuriated at the people destroying forests, and at the scenes of forests falling barren.\r\n#b#L0#What happened next?#l

In the end, the rage turned the tree into a monster. Now it’s nothing but a horrendous monster gobbling up nutrients from the soil. Don’t go too far into there. I’d praise and encourage your curiosity, but it is the king of all stumps. You should never underestimate its power.
Welcome. How can I help you?\r\n#b#L0#Do you know anything about a ghost tree?#l

You must be helping Doctor #p1022006#‘s research, right? Well, I did a bit of research myself after he asked me, but I didn’t get much. The only thing I figured out was that the forest on the border between #m102000000# and Elina is drying up very quickly. It may not look so fast from the surface, but it is very drastic.\r\n#b#L0#Indeed. Thank you very much for your time.#l
I’m sorry I can’t be of much help.

Hello, you look like an adventurer. How may I help you? Oh, #bPia#k asked you to return the book back to me? Pia, you shouldn’t have gone through all this trouble. It’s not a long distance away, anyway.
Thank you for returning this. If you’re interested in books, please come by anytime. What? You want to know about the author of Legend of the Snail?

Of course I know the author. #bAlloy#k is not only the author of that book, but he’s also my #bgreat-grandfather#k. He was a seaman at Lith Harbor, who loved adventures more than his work. Sure, he had his part in adventures.
So you’re interested in my great-grandfather? He is somewhat famous, and people sometimes stop by to ask about him. Why don’t you visit my mother, #bMrs. Mingming#k? She can tell you more.
You don’t look like you’ve met #bJay#k yet. Have you lost your way? Henesys isn’t a big town to get lost in. You’re terrible with directions, aren’t you?
An adventurer, right? First time in Henesys?

Hey, wait! Don’t leave books anywhere, especially if it isn’t yours! Fortunately, someone I know picked it up. What would have happened if the book were lost? Jay is usually gentle, but reconsiders when it has to do with people who lose their books!

Have you heard about the rumor of #b#t2210006##k? It’s a special gift that can only come from the oldest snail in Maple World. Rumor has it that it can make wishes come true! Wow! I’d give anything to have one ~
What? You think this rumor is a lie? It can’t be! It's here in this book. This #bLegend of the Snail#k book has details of \n#t2210006#. It has to be true!

However, the book doesn’t describe where to find the snail. If only I had a clue on where to find the snail, I’d go for it immediately and get the rainbow snail shell for myself. I must try to gather information...
So how about you? I'd let you in on it if you’re Interested, too. If we do get our hands on #t2210006#, I promise I will share it with you fairly. What do you think?

Okay then, first go meet with #bJay#k. It’s because this book was borrowed from him. He has tons of books, and knows a lot about them. I must know who wrote Legend of the Snail. We will start tracking the snail shell with him and eventually find out where the snail is.
Hmm... not interested? How can you turn down a treasure like this? Your loss.

I’m busy with preparing for the festival, so please make it quick. What? You’re talking about great-grandfather Alloy? Did he get himself into trouble? Phew... that’s a relief. It’s good to know he is healthy and all, but he sometimes gets into trouble while traveling around the sea.
I don’t know where he is now, because he moves around too much looking for adventures. However, I do have a letter sent from him to me recently. I can show you the letter to you if you’d like.

It seems he is in #bEllinia#k now. Apparently, he boasted in his letter that he became friends with #bWing the Fairy#k. Therefore, he has to be in Ellinia with Wing the Fairy. But then again, he does move around a lot, so he may have left Ellinia already.
Don’t blame you if you don’t what to know. Could you please move over so I can continue preparing for the festival?
What... are you? Aren't you human? What’s your business here? What? You’re asking about Alloy?!

How can’t I NOT know him?! Every fairy in Ellinia knows him! Don’t matter if it’s good or bad! He’s such a disgusting human! He has a loud voice, too talkative, and he puts his nose into everything he can bug into!

Hmm... but he wasn’t a bad person at all. Quite funny, in a... strange, sort of way. Underneath the fuss, he was intelligent and wise also. I’ve heard he got #bMano’s Shell#k. Maybe the shell that made him like that? Still, he was a fair guy for a human being.
Huh? You don’t know what Mano's Shell is? It’s the shell of the longest-living snail in Maple World. It’s special for its rainbow color. What? You want to see Mano itself? Well... but what for?
You haven’t met #bWing the Fairy#k yet, haven’t you? You don’t have to if you don’t want to.
What are your intentions here in the fairy forest, human?

Have you brought all the snail shells? Hmm... Let’s have a look. One, two, three... good! You’ve brought all of them. You want to know what I’m going to do with these? Icarus asked me to get them to master the Three Snails skill. Lucky for me I had you to do the job.

Listen carefully, I’m about to tell you where to find Mano. Mano is known to roam about #bthicket around the beach next to Lith Harbor#k. Alloy also met Mano while fishing nearby, so Mano has to be there. All set?
You haven’t brought all the snail shells yet? I’ll tell you where Mano is after you bring me #b10 of each#k #bSnail Shell#k, #bRed Snail Shell#k, and #bBlue Snail Shell#k, 30 shells in total.
Hey~ it looks like you’re more interested in Mano than Alloy. In that case, I can’t give away information that easily~ If you really want to know about Mano, you’ll have to fulfill my request first.
Bring me #b10 of each#k #bSnail Shell#k, #bRed Snail Shell#k, and #bBlue Snail Shell#k. Not difficult, is it? Do this for me, and you’ll be on your way to Mano.
You don’t have to do it if you don’t want to. Only the fairies know about Mano. Not many humans know about Mano. You won’t be able to ask anyone else.

So, have you found out anything about the author of Legend of the Snail? Whoa... really? You got to know about Mano while investigating about Alloy. Great! Then the only thing left for you to do is go to the thicket around the beach to defeat Mano and bring back #t2210006#.
Hahaha! Oh good. I’ll soon have #t2210006# all to myself. What should I wish for~
What?! You don’t want to go?! Think this over one more time. I’m willing to share #t2210006# with you!

If you’re looking for a peaceful vacation at Florina Beach, you’ll have to come back later! This place isn’t as peaceful as it was! A dreadful monster has taken over the beach! \n#rKing Clang#k swam all the way here following the warm current!

King Clang is covered by a gigantic turban shell, and controls other monsters with its powerful strength. Now it’s reigning over Florina Beach! Everyone here in Florina Beach is afraid of King Clang. No one knows when they will be gobbled up by him!

That is why we three have made a big decision. One of us will be offered to the monster as a living sacrifice to save our village people. What? Did King Clang ask for a sacrifice? Of course he didn’t... but these stories are always like this, aren’t they?

Go read some books. A beautiful, young maiden sacrifices herself to save her village. A brave girl that hasn’t even blossomed yet. It’s in every fairytale! If you read, you’d know how important this role is! Ah... how romantic!

However, we haven’t decided who will be the heroine yet. #bRoel#k and #bRael#k say they want take the role. That’s why we’ve decided to do this in a fair manner, and single out the sacrifice ourselves. We need to start quickly so would you mind... Huh? You’re also interested?
Ah, very well then. Will you become the judge of this bet? See that no one is cheating and are doing their part in this bet. Then the job is yours!
Would you please leave? We have to start our bet.
... NOO...! Traveler! We’ve asked you to be fair as a judge, so how could you cheat?! And why did you go through the trouble helping all three and not just one person!
Now we have to change plans... what should we do? The bet is already over!
No! The bet is still on! Please help determine who will be the winning sacrifice!
Hmm. Adventurer, will you please come here? (Whispering)

We’ve started a bet on who will become the offering to King Clang. At least we did start... But plans aren’t going as we thought it would. Oh my gosh...we need to defeat all those #rKing Clangs#k crawling on the beach.

Of course, this is the kind of challenge for a winner to surpass. Still,  I’m too scared! I’d finish soon with the help from a strong and heroic adventurer like you! Will you please help me? Of course, this is between you and me.
Ha! I knew you’d help me. Please take out #r50#k #rKing Clangs#k for me. That will definitely show Rael and Roel who should be the sacrifice!
You mean you can’t help me? ...NOO...! How can you not? Someone beautiful and graceful like me, cannot stand up to an ugly King Clang! You must help me!
Oh goody! I knew you’d help me! That was fast! You truly are my hero! You’re the bravest adventurer I’ve ever met~

Huh? You want me to call this bet off? You don’t seem to understand a girl’s wish. A maiden is the most beautiful when she is in distress. I’ve dreamed of this role for as long as I can remember. I will never give up... I am already the winner! I know it!
You haven’t defeated #r50 King Clangs#k yet? I thought it wouldn’t be so hard for someone like you to do the job. Try a little harder, please.

Hmm. Are you the adventurer #bRael#k talked about? Thanks for becoming the judge but... I hope you are honest, and that you won’t help #bRael#k because you both know each other. I will never give this role up!

Still... this challenge is a burden. How can I defeat Lorang? I’ve never even given it a thought before. Nobody can succeed, except well... someone adventurous like yourself. Ohhh... what should I do...?

You actually don’t seem to be busy right now. And you don’t seem to have helped Rael, meaning that you aren’t fond of her. Anyway, this dare is almost impossible for me to complete by myself. It’s decided, then! You are going to help defeat the #rLorang#k!
Hahaha! You really are a brave adventurer! I was right. Then I’ll leave the #r50 Lorangs#k to you to hunt down!
What? You’re refusing? Hmph! But that doesn’t mean you can go help Rael. Promise?
Oh good! You’ve already defeated the #bLorang#k? How wonderful! You really are courageous!

What? You want me to back out of this bet? Why would I do that?! Something like this doesn’t come by often here in quiet Florina Beach! I can’t back out now. Thanks for helping me, but I will not give this up!
Hmm... You haven’t defeated #r50 Lorang#k yet? I might lose because of your laziness! Hurry up.
Hey... you... are you the adventurer who will be judging us? Glad to meet you. Thank you for all this trouble. I’m not confident in winning. What? You... you’re asking why I’m not?
Well... I’m supposed to defeat Torties, right? How can a girl like me get even close to them? Of course, an adventurer like you would defeat them blindfolded. I’m just an ordinary girl.
Even so... cowardly and fainthearted I am, but I don’t... I don’t want to lose this bet. Adventurer... I’m sorry to ask you this, but... would it be possible for you to help me a little bit?
Oh? Ah... you really will help me? Really? I can’t believe it! How can I ever thank you enough? Please take out #r50 Torties#k for me. I’ll be waiting for you here.
Oh... I thought so. Oh well... I can’t keep an adventurer like yourself busy with an ordinary girl like me.
Have you defeated all 50 Torties? Are you hurt anywhere? If not, then good... how can I ever thank you enough?
What? This bet... Give this bet up? Why are you saying this to me? You’ve already helped me through it! I will not take your help for granted, and will win this bet.
You haven’t defeated #r50 Torties#k yet? I will lose if I’m late...

Oh my... I’ve lost the bet, and it’s all because of you! I’ve always wanted to be the beautiful maiden that sacrifices herself to save her village. I will never forgive you! How could you disappoint me like this?!
What? No, no. All the endings of this kind of story include a brave and handsome #bwarrior#k that comes to rescue the beautiful maiden in distress and defeats the monster! There still is a way!
Adventurer! It’s up to you to complete this story with a happy ending! A warrior throwing himself to save the damsel is always heroic! You must take this role!

I must admit, the story unraveling is somewhat different from what I planned, but this has its own merits to it too. Adventurer... no I mean, warrior! Please defeat #rKing Clang#k, and save the damsel!
No, how could you?! How can you turn down a great role like this! You are no fun at all!
You’ve come back, warrior! I, #bRael#k, was worried sick over you and couldn’t sleep at all! \r\n#L0# #b(Absorbed in the role already!)#l
Oh, I’m so happy to see you again. Thank you, thank you very much! How can I pay you for your deed? What? You don’t need anything?\r\n#L0# #b(... I didn’t say a word!!)#l
You are brave but also modest. You truly are a real warrior! I will never forget you name!
I will sing a song of a brave young warrior who never hesitated to rescue the beautiful island girl from the dreadful monster! Oh, how could you be so courageous?
You haven’t defeated #rKing Clang#k yet? If it’s a burden to you... you may back out, warrior. You don’t need to throw yourself to save little old me... sniffle...
Haven't met #r#p2100##k yet? She should be on a hill down on east side...it's pretty close from here so it will be easy to spot her...

You must be the new traveler. Still foreign to this, huh? I'll be giving you important informations here and there so please listen carefully and follow along. First if you want to talk to us, #bdouble-click#k us with the mouse.
#bLeft, right arrow#k will allow you to move. Press #bAlt#k to jump. Jump diagonally by combining it with the directional cursors. Try it later.
Man... the sun is literally burning my beautiful skin! It's a scorching day today. Can I ask you for a favor? Can you get me a #bmirror#k from #r#p2100##k, please?
Thank you... #r#p2100##k will be on the hill down on the east side hanging up the laundry. The mirror looks like this #i4031003#.
Don't want to? Hmmm... come back when you change your mind.
How am I going to hang all these up? Sigh... what? My mirror? Please don't tell me #p2101# asked you for this ...
Aye...she should have come and get it herself. Seriously, she is SOOO lazy. Here's the mirror you're looking for.
Oh wow! You brought #p2100#'s mirror! Thank you so so much. Let's see... no skin damage whatsoever...
If you go right, you will see the shiny spot. We call that as a "Portal". If you press #bup-arrow#k, you will get to the next place. So long!
Did you lose the mirror? As her for it once more.
How am I going to hang all these up? Sigh... what? My mirror? Please don't tell me #p2101# asked you for this ...
Aye...she should have come and get it herself. Seriously, she is SOOO lazy. Here's the mirror you're looking for.
Oh, a traveller!! Nice, right on time... I have a favour to ask, will you do it for me? Go a little more to the right and you'll find a boy.
That's my little brother, #r#p2001##k. Will you please ask him what he wants for dinner?
Haven't met #p2001# yet? Please, open you eyes!
Ahh, soooo hungry. Where's my sister?!! I was gonna ask her to make me a mushroom soup. Soooo hungry!!
Please tell my sister I really really want #bmushroom soup#k for dinner!
He wants the mushroom soup? I guess that's our dinner right there then. Thanks for doing me a favor.

Ahh...I'm getting worried...because I need to get this letter to #p12000# fast. It's an urgent matter so I need to let him know of this ASAP. Too bad I have things to do here for a while so I won't be leaving this spot anytime soon...
I'm sorry but can you get this #bletter#k to #r#p12000##k from #b#m1010000##k? I have a lot of things to do here so I have to stay here for now. It'll only take a minute...
You're gonna do it? Thank goodness. Now I can breathe a sigh of relief. Here's my letter, and please get this to the town chief that's at #b#m1010000##k.

Head northeast and soon you'll find #b#m1010000##k. #p12000# is the town chief of #m1010000#. He should be in front of the department store probably taking a walk. Please get #p12000#'s reply letter fast!
Are you really busy? Ahhhh, this is not good. If I don't get this to the town chief... anyway if you have some free time please come back and talk to me.
Haven't met #r#p12000##k from #m1010000# yet? Please send him my letter. It's urgent. I need to get a reply from #p12000# quickly...
The letter from #r#p2103##k should be here by now. What happened...? Someone please let me know what's going on here...
You lost my letter!! You should have been more careful. Here's the letter again. Please make sure you don't lose the letter, since there are a lot monsters around this area.

This is definitely the letter from #p2103#! Ohhh, thank you. I was beginning to get worried because the letter didn't get here. Ok! here's the #breply letter#k. Please get this to her. Just head back to #p2103# and you'll be fine.
So you have gotten the reply from #p2103#. Thanks! and I want to give you something to show my appreciation.
Here is a hat. It has a Lv. limitation, but I think you are strong enough to wear this. I hope this can help you. Thanks!!!
You didn't meet up with #r#p2103##k yet? Please get her my reply letter... if you lose the letter by any chance, come find me again... I can always write a new one.

You lost my reply letter!! Should have been more careful. Oh well, there are lots of monsters around this area, so it's understandable. Anyway, here's the reply letter. Please be careful this time around.
Oh wow! You brought them all!! Sweet! Here's an item like I promised. I don't really need it anyway, so take it!
You don't have #e10#n #b#t4000001#s#k and #e30#n#k #b#t4000000#s#k, right? Don't worry too much about it. I'll be staying here for a while.

I'll give you something nice if you get me #b#e10#n #t4000001#s#k and #b#e30#n #t4000000#s#k! You can get it by taking down the monsters, but ... looking at you, I'm not sure if you're up for the challenge...

My goodness. So many useful items are being thrown away ... I've been wandering around this town, and I see so many items that are thrown away that can be recycled! Hey, say ... can you help me collect those?\n Well, don't worry, I'll reward you well for your effort.
That's right!! Please get me all the supposedly useless items that are abandoned all over town. I'll reward you well for your effort. Hahahah!!!

Well ... I don't know if you've seen the wooden boxes that have been left abandoned on your way here. Did you see them? Your job is to break those boxes and then bring them back as recyclable materials. When you break those boxes, you'll get #t4031162# and #t4031161# in return. Just collect 10 of those for me, okay? 

#i4031161# #b10#k #t4031161#s
#i4031162# #b10#k #t4031162#s
Come on ... try it!! It's not hard at all! Just strike this box next to me and you'll know what I'm talking about.
What? You brought them all? Okay, let's see ...

See what I'm talking about? So many recyclable items thrown away with abandon. We need to do something about this! Anyway thank you so much for your help! Hopefully there are more people like you to help me out. I'll see you around!!
No, no, no! Check again!! Press 'Q' to take a look at the 'Quest Info'. See the quests that are in progress and see what I'm asking of you.!

Hello there! I think you're still having trouble adjusting to life in Maple World. I'm going to be giving you a brief rundown on this place, then will give you a Maple Quiz. Once you answer them all correct, I'll be giving you a small present as a sign of appreciation, something that'll come in handy here. What do you think? Do you want to take a crack at The Maple Quiz?

Hehe ... I'll have to warn you, don't underestimate the questions for the quiz. There's still a lot to learn about this place, you know. Well, I'll give you a quick rundown on the quiz. It'll be very quick, so you better listen carefully, because it'll all be on the quiz.

Have you tried hunting there at the hunting ground? What key did you press to attack the monsters? Didn't you press #bCtrl for attack#k and #bAlt to jump#k? And you did press #bz to pick up the items, right? #nYou can also use the #rKey Config#k, located on the bottom right corner of the game, to recalibrate the buttons to your liking. Phew, I guess I got too carried away with the explanations. You'll be picking up these in no time at the Maple Island.

Now here's a brief description on the most important part of the game, the Job Advancement. To become a more powerful traveler, you'll need to have a job. To obtain a job, you'll have to leave this place, the Maple Island, and head over to Victoria Island instead. \nYou'll need to be at least at level #b10#k to become either a warrior, a bowman, or a thief. To become a magician, however, you'll need to be only at level #b8#k. Each occupation has its pluses and minuses so choose carefully.
I didn't tell you EVERYTHING you'll need to know for the quiz, so please make sure to focus for the quiz. Now, shall we get this started?
Are you worried you're still a beginner in MapleStory? Hmmm ... even with that, you'll be learning a lot through my Maple Quiz. You should at least try it!!

What do you press to open up the item inventory? 

#L0##b I#l
#L1# K#l
#L2# S#l
#L3# E#k#l
That's right!! To open up the item inventory, you press #rI#k.
K is for the Skill Window. You'll be able to use skills once you get yourself a job. Don't you remember the shortcut key for the i-tem inventory?
No, no, no. S is to check out your ability stats and the AP's. Come on, think!!
Eh? E is to check out the equipments you're donning and the ones you'd like to take off, so E is definitely not it.
Alright, talk to me when you're ready to take on the next question.

Can you wear an item just by double-clicking it with your mouse? 

#L0##bOh yes#l
#L1#No way.#k#l

Yup, you can wear an item just by double clicking it from your inventory. If you can't put it on, please check and see if your character matches or exceeds the level limit and the ability point requirements each item is assigned to.
You'll have to try it for yourself. Press E, then take off an item by double-clicking it. Then, double-click the item from the item inventory (I) to put it back on.

The questions I'm giving out aren't terribly difficult! Even if you don't answer it right the first time, just listen to my explanations carefully and you'll be able to pass it. Talk to me when you're ready for the 3rd question.

What do you press to open up your equipment inventory? 

#L0##b E#l
#L1# S#l
#L2# I#k#l
That's right! To check out the equipments you're wearing, just press E.
S is to check out the skill book and your skill points. Please remember that.
I is to check out your item inventory.

What do you press to pick up an item on the ground?

#L0##b X#l
#L1# S#l
#L2# I#l
#L3# Z#k#l

That's correct. #bZ#k is used to pick up items on the ground dropped by the monsters. The other key you can use to pick up items would be #b0 on the number pad#k. As for the seldom-used X, you can use that to sit on a chair. Once you head over to Victoria Island, you'll find some chairs you can sit on. You should try it, since you can recover much faster by sitting as opposed to just standing still!

Once you see a chair or a bench you can sit on, you can do just that. Unfortunately, you won't find any chairs in Maple Island that you can sit on. Head over to Victoria Island to sit on some chairs, and when you find one, make sure to press X. You'll be able to tell that you're recovering much faster by sitting as opposed to just standing still.
You can raise your ability stats using the AP's that you earn after every level-up. To check out the AP's, simply press S.
I is used to check out your item inventory. It is one of the most useful functions in the game, one that'll enable you to check out the items you've collected.
Alright! You're on question number 4. There are 7 questions total for this Maple Quiz. Talk to me when you're ready.
You're inching closer and closer towards making the job advancement. I'm anxious to see which job you're going to take. Now, talk to me when you're ready for the 5th question.

In order to make the job advancement as either a warrior, a bowman, or a thief, you'll have to be at least level 10 to do so. What level do you have to be in order to make the job adv. as a magician? 

#L0##bLevel 10#l#l
#L1#Level 8#k#l

That is correct!! You'll need to be at least level 10 in order to make the job advancement as either a warrior, a bowman, or a thief. To become a magician, however, you only need to be at level 8. Head over to Victoria Island, go to a magician town called Ellinia, and look for Grendel the Really Old, the chief magician that'll lead you towards becoming a magician yourself.
You'll need to be at least level 10 in order to make the job advancement as either a warrior, a bowman, or a thief, but you can make the job adv. as a magician earlier than that.

Wow, you're pretty good at this. Are you assigning your Ability Points (AP) well? You know you get those after leveling up, right? You'll need to know how to assign your AP's well in order to become a powerful hunter. Talk to me when you're ready for the 6th question.

Every time you level up, you can raise your character's ability stats. How many ability points (AP) are you awarded after every level up? 

#L0##b2 points#l
#L1#10 points #l
#L2#5 points #k#l

Hmmm ... you look like you can use a little bit of my guidance. Hahaha, do not be afraid. It just looks like you're not used to this place, yet. Is it your first time here? Hmmm, alright. It's very simple actually. All you need to do right now is to hunt the monsters. And don't think a simple act like hunting won't be of much help. You'll be assigned to do a few tasks through me, and you'll ultimately end up growing as a traveler.

Look around this town, and you'll run into lots of monsters. The weakest of all is the Snail, a tiny green snail, and it's a piece of cake. The next weakest are the Blue Snails and the Shrooms. My advice to you is to feast on the weaker monsters and level up easily, until it gets to the point where you can handle bigger, stronger, and faster monsters. It's all about understanding your strengths and weaknesses, and using that knowledge to hunt down the right monsters. 

#r10#k #o100100#s
#r10#k #o100101#s
#r10#k #o120100#s#k

Oh, and press W to see the World Map and locate Southperry. Go there and meet #p20002#, and he may have something in store for you. You can take on #p20002#'s quest while training with me, so I suggest you meet him pronto.
How was it? Have you been training by taking on the weaker monsters? Let me see ...

Hmmm ... I don't think you understood what I told you. You haven't defeated enough number of monsters. You know you can check on your quest progress by pressing Q, right? I suggest you check out the numbers again.

Wow, you're very fast! That's awesome. We'll head straight to the next quest, the last one I'll give you. This time, you'll be taking on #o1210102#, which you WON'T find just by wandering around. You'll have to walk around everywhere, go into every portal, and defeat the orange-colored mushrooms. I want you to defeat #r10#k of them!! Remember, they are considered the most powerful monsters on this island ... oh, and Biggs is collecting something about the #o1210102#'s. Ohh, a new traveler, huh? Don't you want to learn the ways of hunting? The Jr. Sentinel's you see are normally too powerful a monster to be here, or for you to handle. As you can see through the Minimap (#bM#k), located on the left corner of the screen, you'll see something green blink on the northeast side of the map. That's where #b#p2002##k is. You'll run into a Jr. Sentinel on your way to seeing #b#p2002##k. Defeat it, pick up 1 #t4000142#, then see #p2002#.
Are you the one that #p2004# is training to hunt? He said something about you having the potential to be a great hunter. Let's see ... let's see if you've trained right.

Hmmm, it will be an interesting experience in itself to go to the next map through me.

Hmmm ... you should have seen a small Jr. Sentinel at the bottom of the map. Maybe you missed it. All you need to do is attack it by pressing #rCtrl#k and kill it. Once you pick up the dropping, then come back to me.

Hello there, I'm Sam. You look ike someone I'd recommend to see #p12100#. What do you think?

I told you to have all #r7 #t2010007##k that I gave you. Open the item window and click#bconsumption tab#k. You can find #t2010007# and consume them by double click.

Hmmm... It seems you just started an adventure, so it's good that you explore the towns. My daughter is still young and not brave enough to travel around...\r\n#b#L0#You have a daughter?#l

Sure, I do. She is cute and nice. She went to #b#m60000##k to look at the sea and hasn't come back yet. She managed to get there somehow but, I guess she's afraid of monsters in the bush. Do you mind helping her?

Then please eliminate seven horrible #r7 #o0130101##k. There are lost of #o0130101# from #m1010000# to #m60000#. These stop #p20100# from returning home. When you get rid of them, let #b#p20100##k know about it. Thank you.

Ahh~ I have had it up to here!  I can't stand it! Why am I so angry? Well, listen. Someone is spreading rumors that #p20002# looks like a #o1210100#! I'll get him! What an insult! I need your help!!

What do you need to help me with? Simple. Clean up all  #o1210100#s around #m60000#! If all #o1210100#s disappear, so will the rumor. Simple, isn't it? What? There are too many #o1210100#s? Oh, come on. OK. Let's make it #r2 #o1210100#s#k. You can handle that, can't you?

It is #b#p20001##k of  #b#m60000##k who needs help. He says that he wants to make a great boat. Taking a trip with the one you love, isn't it really romantic? Look for #b3 #t4000003##k and give them to #p20001#.

Ah, you can get #t4000003# when you catch #r#o0130100##k. Huh? You don't know what kind of monster #o0130100# is? They look like a walking tree stump. If you get those, you can get #t4000003#. Wow! You have all ingredients to make a nutritious juice. Fantastic! Now, it will only take a second to make the juice!
Would you please wait until I make the juice? May I ask one more favor?

Hmm... I think you haven't gathered the ingredients yet. You need one #bone#t4000004##k and #bfive#t4000011##k. If you want to know how many ingredients you have gathered, please check inventory or quest window.
Hi? You're an adventurer, aren't you? How's your trip in Maple Island? Maple Island is small and peaceful. It won't have any threat. Hmm... May I ask your favor if you're free?
Ah! Thank you. It's not that hard. You only have to find healthy ingredients for juice. The ingredients are one #b1#t4000004##k and 5 #b#t4000011##k.It wouldn't be hard to find them, would it?
You can get #t4000004# from #o0210100#, #t4000011# from #o0120100#. Slime is a green jumping monster. It's so fast and strong. Be careful with it. Good luck.
Hmm... Since you just started an adventure, I guess you’re quite busy. When you are free, come back to me.

Ah! Thank you! I'm so glad to have a nice person like you in Maple World. It's not a difficult thing. You only give this complete #b#t04031556##k to #b#p22000##k. He is a captain in #b#m60000##k. You can't miss him. Thank you.

Now, you are ready to take an adventure. Would you like to go to a new world? If you are on board, I can show you #bVictoria Island#k. Once you leave here, you can't come back though. What do you say? Do you want to go for a big world?
You haven't found #b#p22000##k yet. He's a captain in #b#m60000##k.
What's the matter? I'm willing to take you there if you leave Maple Island and take an adventure to bigger world?

Hmm... Who are you? Did #p12100# send you to me? Why did #p12100# send you to me? 
#b#L0# #p12100# asked you to raise salary. #l

#L2# #p12100# said he wanted to compete with #p12000#. #l

Hmm... Did #p12100# say that? She always keeps her word. Then we need to have somebody. Would you tell #b#p1002101##k of #b#m104000000##k? You won't be here any longer so you can tell her when you get #bVictoria Island#k. Thank you.
Thank you. Ah, don't worry about the fare. You have to go to #b#m60000##k to go to Victoria Island. #m60000# knows who #b#p22000##k is. I'll tell him to take you for free.
Haven't you met #b#p12000##k yet? I'll take a walk in front of the store of #b#m1010000##k. Go ahead.
Did he asked for salary raise? Mai can't have said that. Are you lying in the name of Mai?
...compete? Did Mai say that? I know there's no strong man in Maple Island, but it's nonsense to ask this old man like me to compete.

Maple Island is a land for beginning adventurers. Monsters are relatively weak here, but don't take them easy. You need to have some experience to become a skilled adventurer. When you are a beginner, you have to try your best to train hard. \r\n#b#L0# You look very strong. Why are you on Maple Island?#l

That's because I'm a trainer. Mr.#p12000# hired me for people in Maple Island. That's why I quit adventuring in Victoria Island and started protecting people in this town instead. Besides that, beginners always need a bit of guidance. But I've got far too much work these days...If you have a chance to go to #m1010000#, can you give a message to Mr. #p12000#?

Ah, thank you. There are a lot of travelers in Maple Island and even more monsters. It's hard for me to protect people by myself. So please tell the senior #b#p12000##k of #b#m1010000##k to hire one more person. Thank you.
Hmm... Aren't you planning to go to #m1010000#? You can go to #m60000# directly.
Welcome to #m104000000#. Isn't this your first time in Victoria Island? Huh? You came here to deliver the message from#p12000#?
Umm~~So, #p12100# can't protect Maple Island by himself, huh? OK. Then I'll contact the seniors and hire one more. I can do that for my friend's sake. Thank you.

Yoo hoo~ Hello? Let me see... You just leveled two. Then you've got #bAP#k. Have you decided where to invest your AP? You still don't know what AP is? Well, well... I kindly enough will explain it to you.
AP means #bABILITY POINT#k. Now, press #bS#k. You will see all the stats you have. AP is on the left bottom side. If you haven't invested AP yet, your AP is still 5. Where can you use AP?

AP is used to improve your stats. When you invest AP into #bSTR, your power will be enhanced; if into INT, intelligence; if into DEX, agility; if LUK, luck#k. You can increase HP or MP if you want. AP is worthy as it can be used many different ways. Every class has one primary stat and one secondary stat. For Warriors, it's STR and DEX; for Magicians, it's INT and LUK; if you're a Bowman then you'll need DEX and STR, while Thieves use LUK and DEX.

Did you get how to use AP? When you make use of AP, you can become a strong Warrior. But, as you are still a beginner, I'll will give you one more piece of advice about changing jobs and AP investment.
If you want to hear about changing your job and AP investment, please come back. Yoo hoo~
Hmm~ You're not interested in this story. Well, that's fine. Have a good adventure.
Yoo hoo~~ You came again. You are a real adventurer not to miss any information! Shall we talk about changing a job?
If you want to be a stronger adventurer, you have to advance your job. You can advance your job in Victoria Island, not in Maple Island. You can choose one among #bWarrior, Magician, Bowman, Thief#k.

But there's some condition to change your job. #bWarriors, Bowmans and Thieves should be at least level 10#k. #bMagicians should be at least level 8#k. Other than level, you need to be ready to have a job. What does that mean? Where you placed your AP will help determine what path you take, that's why it's very important.

#bWarriors should have at least 35 STR and above, Magicians will need 20 INT and above, Bowman must have 25 DEX and above, and Thief also need 25 DEX and above#k Under this condition, you are qualified to have a job.
You can't advance your job when you're short of either level and/or stat. Although you're a beginner, you have to consider investing AP if you want to have a job. Never ever forget!
I hope the explanation on AP and changing job helps you a lot!
Oh, you look lost. Well...Beginners not familiar with Maple World often are lost. Probably you don't know how to read the world map. Do you want to know?
Haha. It's very easy. Press W. You will see Maple Island and where you are. If you click the right mouse button, you can see the whole Maple World. Isn't it easy?

It gets much easier to go around when you make use of world map. For sure, there is many areas that you can't see in the world map. Keep that in mind please. Now, do you have an idea where to go? Have a nice trip.

Hello there! You must be new! So your name is...#h0#? Nice to meet you! I am sure you still feel a bit weird about being in the world of Maple. But don't you worry about a thing! This world welcomes you with open arms.

Hey there! To start a conversation with us, just #bdouble-click#k us, and we'll be talking to you in no time. You can talk to any person or object that displays a chat bubble when you place your mouse cursor over it/us.

You should also know that #banyone with a light bulb above their heads will have a quest for you#k. Those people are dying to talk to you, so if you see any one of them, do not hesitate to double-click!
Oh yeah, I just remembered that #bSera#k has been looking for a new traveler to talk to. What do you think? Do you want to say hello to Sera?

You've just accepted a quest! Now, you should first check the #bMinimap#k located on the left side of the screen. Press #bM#k to open/close it. It'll display various colors to indicate different people, and the blinking green figures mean they're the residents of this world.

If you look at the Minimap right now, you'll see two green spots. The left one is me, Heena, and the right one is Sera. All you need to do is move to the #bright#k for a bit, and you'll see Sera hanging her laundry.
You must be not ready to meet new people. Don't be shy. We're all eager to see you.
...oh, hello there! You must be a new traveler! Did you just talk to Heena? It's so nice to see you!

Maple Island may be a small island, but this is also a perfect place for me to meet new travelers who have just gotten here. There's nothing quite like making new friends. #h0#, hopefully you will make lots of new friends here too.

If you want to move on, use the #bportal#k located on the right. You see that spot that glows on the ground? That's the portal. Go to that spot and press #bUp#k on the arrow key. I'll now bid adieu. May your journey be blessed with greatness.
You haven't gone to see #bSera#k yet, have you. Just head #bEast#k for a bit, and you'll see her.

Oh, hello traveler! Good thing you're here, I need you to help me out here, can you? Go a little bit to the right, and you'll see a #bhouse with a yellow roof#k. That's my house, and... right now, my baby brother #bSen#k is the only one there.

Sen did a great job taking care of the house by himself without complaining, so I feel like he deserves a reward, but I don’t know what to give him. Maybe something delicious... I don't know. Can you please go ask him what he'd like to eat?
Thanks. To enter the house, simply press the #bUp arrow#k on the keyboard in front of the house, just like if you'd be using a portal.
Oh, you must be busy with your adventures. Wouldn't it be fun to take some time to get to know people here, though? I think that'd be as good of an adventure as there is...
Have you not gone to see #bSen#k, yet? Head right and you'll see a #bhouse with a yellow roof#k. He should be inside.

Hmmm... who are you? What? My sister asked you to ask me what I want to eat? Mmmm... that's random. Oh yeah, that #bmushroom candy#k she made for me the other day! Can you please tell her Sen wants a delicious Mushroom Candy? Thank you!
You know where my sister is, right? I mean, you just talked to her.
Awww... aren't you going to tell her?
You haven't talked to #bNina#k yet? Awww... I want a Mushroom Candy...

So what did Sen want? What? A Mushroom Candy? Haha... he seemed to be having some cavities here and there, so I told him not to eat it... so I guess he wants one or two now. Well, he did something good today, so he'll get one.
Here are 10 Mushroom Candies. Please give them to #bSen#k for me. Thanks in advance.
Eh...? You don't want to do it? I mean, you've helped me this far already... please give those candies to him for me!
Wow! She did give me the Mushroom Candies! Yeah! Those are so sweet, and I really like them, you know! Thanks!
Oh yeah, you should try some too. My sister always told me it's always better to share the goods.
You didn't go see #bSen#k yet? He must be eagerly waiting for the candy. Please go see him soon.
Hmmm? You haven't gone to see #bNina#k yet? I really want that Mushroom Candy right now...
What? You lost the Mushroom Candy? Oh no... where did you drop them? Sigh... oh well... I'll give you another one this time, so please don't lose them, okay?

Oh, a new traveler! Hey there, my name is Todd. This is where I teach new travelers like you #bhow to hunt monsters#k. You won't find monsters in Mushroom Town, but if you venture a little bit outside, those places are in fact full of the. It'll be quite dangerous for you to go there, if you aren't well-prepared for it.

Let's first discuss the #bbasic attack#k. You can do that by pressing the #bCtrl key#k. Approach the monster, but not too close that you'll touch it, then attack with authority. Got it? Do you want to try it right now?

You see the #rJr. Sentinel#k there? Try attacking it. Normally it's a powerful monster, but Grendel the Really Old, the head of all magicians, put a seal on it just for beginners like you, so you'll have no trouble practicing your swings against it.

Once you successfully hunt the Jr. Sentinel, you'll earn Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece as a dropping. To pick up an item, press #bZ#k on top of the item, so try picking up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k and give it to #bPeter#k. He'll teach you how to use skills to attack monsters.
Hmmm... are you afraid to go up against a monster? Don't worry about it. Practice makes perfect, and you'll be good at it in no time.
Seeing you with Jr. Sentinel Shellpiece, I see that Todd has taught you well on hunting. That means you're fairly aware of the basics of hunting... now I'll teach you how to #buse skills#k.

Skills can be checked out by pressing #bK#k to open the skill window. Unlike regular attacks, skills can only be used by raising the skill level using Skill Points. You can earn Skill Points by leveling up, but you need to be careful when assigning those points to different skills.

The effectiveness of the skills differ greatly, based on the level. For example, the Three Snail Skill will require a regular Snail shell on Level 1, but on Level 2, you'll need Blue Snail shells. You'll have to really think and calculate which skills will maximize your hunting abilities.

To use a skill, it'll be much easier for you if you assign the skills on the #bQuick Slot#k at the bottom right of the screen. Just drag the skill icon on the skill window to one of the slots, and you're set to go. It'll be easier for you to just attack regularly at this point, but once you make the job advancement and earn more sophisticated skills, those skills will help you tremendously with everything.

This covers everything on skills. As a gift, I have just given you an item you can wear on your head, so use it wisely. Go to your item inventory and #bdouble-click on the item#k to equip it immediately. To #bmake sure you're equipped with it,#k press #bE#k. Happy traveling!

Hmmm... It looks like Todd taught you how to hunt, but you haven't really put that to practice. Either that, or you forgot to pick up the dropping. Press #bCtrl#k to attack #rJr. Sentinel#k, and pick up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k.

Eh? You haven't gone to see #bPeter#k yet? Don't be shy. Just hunt the #rJr. Sentinel#k, pick up #bJr. Sentinel's Shellpiece#k, and give it to him. He'll be more than happy to teach you how to use skills.

Hmmm... It looks like Todd taught you how to hunt, but you haven't really put that to practice. Either that, or you forgot to pick up the dropping. Press #bCtrl#k to attack #rJr. Sentinel#k, and pick up #bJr. Sentinel Shellpiece#k.

Ho, a new traveler! If you're at Level 2, that means you have an #bAP#k. Did you #bdistribute the AP accordingly#k? If you are not familiar with the term AP, let me explain it to you. I'll give you a #bquiz#k that'll help you understand the basics of AP, stats, and job advancements.

Now, click me again to ask some questions that you may not be familiar with. I'll explain each and every one of them to you in detail. Once you feel like you know everything, click on #bDr. Robin's Quest#k to start the quiz.
Hmmm...you must know everything already. It doesn't hurt to double-check, though.

You seem ready to answer some questions. Alright, we'll start...NOW. 1st question! You'll earn #bAbility Points, AP#k by leveling up, and you can use them to increase #bSTR, INT, DEX, and LUK#k. Now, can you also raise #bHP and MP#k using AP?\r\n#b#L0# Yes. #l\r\n#L1# No way. #l

Correct! You can actually use AP to raise HP and MP instead of stats. 2nd question! You may start off as a beginner, but once you level up to a certain level, you may choose your occupation and make the job advancement. #bNormally, you need to be at Level 10 to make the advancement#k, but #bfor this job, you can level up at 8#k. What is it?
#b#L0# Warrior #l
#L1# Magician #l 
#b#L2# Bowman 
#b#L3# Thief

That is correct! Magicians are the only ones where you can make the advancement at Level 8. Here's the 3rd question! Even if you reach the level required to make the advancement, if you don't meet the requirements, you can't take the next step. Each occupation requires a certain stat to reach a certain level. #bWhich of these stats do NOT match the requirements for the job#k? 
#b#L0# Warrior  -  STR 35 #l
#L1# Magician  -  INT 20 #l 
#b#L2# Bowman  -  DEX 25

Oh, hey there! You must be new to this place and... you seem to have trained quite well. What? Sam asked you to clear out some snails for me?

Wow, thank you so much! You know, there are delicious mushrooms growing all around Mushroom Town, and I wanted to pick some up myself, but there were so many Snails out there that I was a bit hesitant to go. Thanks to you, I can now safely walk there and meet up with Sam. Thank you, and thank you.
Now that the Snails are gone, I feel relieved that I can safely pick those mushrooms up til late. Hmmm... I'm sorry to ask you this, but... can you do me another favor?
If I return late, our chief of this town, Lucas, will get very worried about me. Please take this letter, and give it to #bLucas#k at #bAmherst#k. What? Where's Amherst?

Red Snails have a much higher HP than Snails and Blue Snails. They are also faster than Stumps, so you better not underestimate those pesky creatures.
Do you think 5 Red Snails are too much? I'm telling you, you can only make the next step by enduring hardships like this.
