Wow! I don't think I've had that much fun battling in a long time. In order to battle the queen, who's overly zealous and uses weird spells, it'd require a very formidable foe, and... someone as powerful as you is definitely of help for the Sand Bandits.

That doesn't mean you're a member just yet. You may have passed my test, but you still haven't taken all the tests required to join the Sand Bandits. You'll need to find other members and pass their tests, too. Hopefully you'll become one of us.
If you beat me in a battle, then I'll accept you.

Why are you looking at me like that? If you don't turn around right now, then I'll take it as an offense... what? Sand Bandits? How do you know that name? Are you a spy from the queen? \r\n#b#L0#I found you by looking at the writing on the wall that #b#p2101000# told me to look for.#l

...#p2101000#? He's still doing stupid things. I appreciate that he's trying to help out Sand Bandits, but this... So anyway, why are you here? What do you want from me?\r\n#L0##bI'd like to join the Sand Bandits.#l

No way. What would an outsider like you know about #m260000000# for you to join Sand Bandits? Do you know anything about the queen? Can you actually go in the queen's treasure storage room and steal some from there? If you have the ability and the guts to do it, then I'll accept you as one of us.

Hah! At least you can talk the talk... if you're that confident, then go into the queen's treasure storage room and steal the most expensive treasure from there, #b#t4031574##k. It's at the very top of the treasure storage room, so it won't be easy for you....?

How do you get in the treasure storage room? Someone in the palace should know. Of course that's something you should be able to find out... and why would they give you that information if you are an outsider who just might be a spy? Think!
Of course you were all talk. I'm not putting up with this, so get out of here.
Hello, traveler... I don't know how you made your way into the palace, but please be careful inside.
What? You still haven't gone to the palace yet? Queen's treasure storage room is only known by the ones in the palace. If you're not up to the task, then you can just forget about it.
...you... You found a way to bring #t4031574# here. I honestly wasn't expecting it... That's incredible! You...might be the kind of person that we the Sand Bandits have been looking for...

Hello, traveler... what kind of story would you like to listen to?
#L0##bA Story about the Cat's Eye Jewel#l
#L1#A Story about a Jewel forged from the Desert Heat#l
#L2#A Story about a Jewel with Heavenly Power#l

#t4031574#... It's a jewel with Heavenly Power. A jewel that is most beautiful when shined upon by the sun... But now sleeping somewhere in the treasure storage room, deep in the palace where there's no light... and can only be led to by a secret path... she's #e#basleep under the lamp that never lights.#k#n
For #t4031574#, the palace was the worst kind of fit for her... I am glad to know that someone from a special group is trying to rescue her...

A jewel that resembles a cat's eye... well, it's aptly called Cat's Eye. This powerful jewel, which has an ability to mesmerize anyone that takes a look, is fittingly at its best when adorned by a beautiful woman. There's a saying that no one is immune from falling over those with the Cat's Eye. They say diamonds are a girl's best friend, but this jewel might take the cake! This jewel is desired by those that wants to seduce someone...

It is known as the heart of the desert, rumored to be formed by the very heat of the desert sun. Do you also know that purple is the color of nobility? It's solid, it's beautiful, it's...Lidium. Quite a surprise, isn't it?

I thought it was a case of an outsider mindlessly wanting to be a part of Sand Bandits... I apologize for grossly underestimating you. So you really want to join the Sand Bandits? Then I'll have to test you once more.

Everyone at Sand Bandits has a deep hatred towards the queen. We just don't show it in public. If you just let your anger out like that, then you may feel great that moment, but you can't achieve bigger things by doing that.

That is why, the most important aspect of being a Sand Bandits is patience. Being patient enough not to be swayed by what's unfolding right in front of your eyes, but patiently waiting for the right time. That's what's required to become a Sand Bandits.

Do you know Lidium? It's a jewel that you can find from time to time by slaying the monsters at the desert. If you bring me #b2 #t4011008#s#k, then I'll personally accept you as a member of the Sand Bandits. It's not easy refining small ores into jewels, so... I think this will be a good bar to judge your level of patience.
This must be too tough for you to handle. If you can't do it, then just forget about it.

Ho!  You did bring 2 #t4011008#s. This jewel can only be found in the region of Ariant, and it's hard to make one due to its hardness, but once it's made, its figure will last for a long time. It may look brittle, but it's actually much harder than a diamond.

#t4011008# resembles a lot of the characteristics of the people in the desert. People here may not give you trust at first. You'll have to earn it, but once you earn it, they'll never turn their back on you again. You have definitely shown me your true character. I, Ereska, the desert warrior, will now anoint you as a proud new member of the Sand Bandits!

But don’t be satisfied with just this. You have just earned one person's trust, that's all. You are not yet officially accepted as a true member of the Sand Bandits. If you really wish to become one, then you'll have to find other members and prove your worth to each and every one of them. Don't worry too much about it. I think you're more than capable enough to quickly earn their respect and trust.
I don't think you have gotten #b2 #t4011008#s#k yet. The ore of Lidium can be refined by Muhammad, so once you get the ores, take them to him, okay?
You must be the one that #p2101011#, #p2101003#, and #p2101002# have been talking about. You've done a good job so far passing the tests... and now, I'll tell you a story about #m260000000#.

#m260000000# is a country set up by the wanderers of Nihal Desert. It may be a little more than a barren desert, but thanks to #t4011008# and the oasis, it's counted on as the center of commerce. #t4011008# is an ore only found in the desert, and since it's highly regarded and highly priced, it's one of the main source of wealth for #m260000000#.

But look at this town. It's supposedly a wealthy town, but #m260000000# really does NOT look wealthy, and there's only one reason. The queen. This queen that claims to be a fairy is very frivolous and heartless. All the taxes paid by the residents of #m260000000# are used to purchase her jewels. What do you think? I have already gotten the Transforming Potion from the great magicians at  #m101000000#. In order to transform into a certain person, however, we'll also need a piece of hair from that person. What is it? We don’t let any stranger in the palace.. Least of all a merchant like you. What? You're not a merchant? Then why are you just hanging around here? What? You want a piece of hair from me? Why? What do you plan on doing with it?
Hmmm... I don't know why you want it, but I can't give you my hair. I need to save each and every one of them... but I CAN give you a piece of my beard... if you can do me a favor..

Now that you have my piece of beard, get out of here.

Ah, you're back. The Tigun Transformation Potion is now complete. Drink the potion and go to #b#p2101013##k to receive an order of silk. The merchant that deals with the queen should be around #b#m260010600##k.

Not only that, but once you get attacked, your transformation ends right there. To summarize, do not engage in a fight while making your way to #p2101013#.

I really don't know what to say... except thank you SO much for your help! Hopefully the people here won't be gripped with fear as they try to eat at restaurants again. Here's a small reward for your work; a homemade food from the people of #m800000000#. Thank you!

Nooo, I NEVER said 100! I said 300!! 300!! Mufflers can't be made with just 100 #t4000066#s! That's common sense, okay? Now, get me some more #t4000066#s~
Hohoho~ you're so kind. Well, since you got me 100 last time, I need #b200 more #t4000066#s#k! Don't forget it this time! Okay?

I appreciate that. We have been experiencing problems with the lanterns in the streets lately. I mean, the #t4000222#s got stuck with ghosts! What? No no, there's nothing to worry. Really? I am sure you have your own issues to deal with. Where am I going to find #t4000222#, then?
Hmmm, okay. I guess you killed some #o9400011#s. What do you think? That wasn't too difficult, was it?

Great work there. It's really dangerous at night here without the #t4000222#s brightening up the streets. It's to make sure no one gets hurt walking in the dark. That's why we really needed these #t4000222#s. Thank you.
You haven't finished yet, right? Please go ahead and kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and gather up #b50 #t4000222#s#k in the process.
You haven't finished yet, right? Please go ahead and kill #b100 #o9400011#s#k and gather up #b50 #t4000222#s#k in the process.
Hey you! Yes, you! You look like someone that can seriously use a good advise right now. What do you think? Do you want to hear it?

Have you been feeling heavy on your neck, with your back aching and your legs shaking, and you feel fatigued for no apparent reason? You feel tired even with the red potion in your hand, and you just can't seem to do anything even after taking the blue potion. I know you might be going through that right now. Right? No? Right? No, it SHOULD be right!
The reason you seem lethargic is because you're stuck with #o9400003#! With #o9400003#!! You need to get it off immediately! Now, go out there and kill #b100 #o9400003#s#k!!
...hmmm, so you are saying no to a sound advise. That's your loss.
Ohh, did you really kill all those #o9400003#s?
Good. Now that #o9400003#s are nowhere to be found, my, I mean, our lives will be a little easier. You don...t believe me? Well, then ... I don't know what to tell you.
Huh? You haven't killed them all yet! You need to kill #b100 #o9400003#s#k! All of them!
Hoh... you found the Water Goblins came for more #t4000223#s before they decided to eat them all!
Okay, with these #t4000223#s I won't have to worry about lack of food anymore. Thanks a lot!
You haven't defeated #b#o9400012#s#k yet. You need to take care of all of them so that the #t4000223#s will stay safe. Talk to me when you defeat 100 of them.
You haven't found all the #t4000223#s yet? Hmmm ... even if you defeated all the #o9400012#s, without the #t4000223#s, it's nothing.

Sigh... There seemed to be lots of #t4000223#s waiting to be plucked this year, but ... all the other #t4000223#s remain untouched EXCEPT the one in MY FARM! My goodness, what should I do? I'm sure who the real culprit is... excuse me, but do you mind catching the culprit that's responsible for the mass disappearance of #t4000223#s?

Ahh, thank you. I'm pretty sure #b#o9400012##k is the guilty one. It seems to really obsess in #t4000223#, more than anything else. Well, the #t4000223#s in our farm are known for their great taste, and I think it was aware of that, too. I want you to hunt #b100 #o9400012#s#k and bring back #b50 #t4000223#s#k in return.
Hmmm... if you are busy, then there's nothing I can do about it. I am sure who did this, though. How am I supposed to catch it?
Oh my! You really defeated #o9400205#! I can't believe it... I mean, it's just so powerful. No one in this town dared going outside for the fear of being attacked by it.

You must really be something special. On behalf of everyone in this town, I salute you for your incredible work. Without you, there's no telling what would have happened to this town. Thank you so much. Really, thank you.
Unfortunately, I also hear that this is not the end of #o9400205#. I'd appreciate it if you can help me out here once a day. I'll see you around.
Did you not defeat #b#o9400205##k? I understand that it's a very powerful monster, but ... if you see a blue mushroom cap, PLEASE attack it. You'll find it at #b#m800010100##k.

This place right here, #m800000000#, has been a prime spot for mushrooms from the beginning. Since it's always spring here in #m800000000#, the mushrooms grew unlike other places. We've lived through numerous different kinds of mushrooms, to the point where they have taken up an important part of our lives.

The mushrooms pretty much represent our town. It's not just our prime source of income, but much more than that. The problem is, a number of mushrooms around here have lately been acting strange, and it's a cause for concern. You seem to be pretty powerful. Will you help save our town?

Ohh, okay. Thank you for taking up the offer. There are numerous types of mushrooms in this town, and among those, you may find a strange mushroom that sports a blue mushroom cap. I think it's one of those mutant mushroooms, seeing that it's different from other mushrooms. They are much more powerful than other mushrooms, and are also very violent. We need to eliminate those mushrooms before they get really out of hand.
It's called #b#o9400205##k. It sports the same, non-assuming look of other mushrooms, but underneath it lies a very violent mushroom eager to attack at will. Please eliminate it for us.
If you are indeed a traveler with immense strength, don't you think it's only fair that you use it on those that are in need of help? Please reconsider...

You must have read the flyer for you to make your way here. Yes, it's true... Happyville is in a stage of emergency. I need as much help as I can get, and...what do you think? Would you like to help us out?
Thank you. Here's a little something for your good work...
Still haven't visited #p1022101#...?
Did you bring the flyer I asked you to bring? Did you meet up with the paperboy by any chance...?
You lost that????? Sigh ... please don't lose it again.
With this flyers, #p1022101# will give a full detail of the information.
Extra extra!!!
Something urgent must be happening at Happyville. Rooney just asked me to hand these flyers out, and... if you want more information, you should go see her.
Ahhh... you must be uninterested in what was going on. It was deemed urgent, though... what should I do?? Anyway, if you are interested, please see me.

Do you want to become an elite pet trainer like me? Once you reach my level, it's easy to handle multiple pets at once. What do you think? Are you interested in walking around with multiple pets at once?

Good, but I can't just teach you like that. Pets are important, you know, and I am only willing to extend the offer to those who care. Tell you what, if you can find a note I hid somewhere around the Pet Park, I'll train you. Go thorugh the obstacle course with your pet and find the note. Good luck!
Hah, no easy as it seems, is it? It's very difficult to control multiple pets at once.
How are you doing in terms of proving your worth?
Not bad! Fine, I'll teach you my secret method...but...I think I need to be compensated here, too. It's a special item not found in regular stores, and you'll really need it to train the pets.
You still haven't found the hidden note? Keep looking for it! If you can get near #p1012007# with your pet, then you can certainly find it...
If you want to learn how to control a group of pets, then get me some Pet Snacks. I have my own secret method of handling them, and it is foolproof. Are you interested?
You won't find Pet Snacks at a regular store... but you can find it at a big store, where you can buy a huge variety of items. Find it and return to me!
There's no such thing as a free lesson here. I'll give you some time to think over.

Hello there. Do you have a moment to spare?

Wonderful. Name's Jack. Jack Masque. I'm from Amoria, but that neither here nor there...it's a long story why I left...but since you're still here, I'll give you the short version. I'm in love! I am lost in the throes of passion with the most beautiful creature I have laid eyes upon...a Princess. Princess Restless to be exact. I'm competing for her with some snob-nosed prince. We were out on our first date, and the time was perfect. The sun was shining, birds were tweeting, and just as I was about to receive a kiss from her sweet lips, this strange spider attacked us! I fought the beast off, but that was a one in a million chance with her! I swore to wear this mask in shame until I could return to Amoria with honor. But I must hurry, that accursed Prince Vince is sure to attempt to steal her away...So, I want you to go and eliminate 100 Wolf Spiders, which should ensure that this never happens again. If you're successful, I have a particularly rare crystal that may suit you...get going!
Unfortunate. Be on your way then!

Fantastic! I'll be able to face her again without worrying if one of those pesky Wolf Spiders will spoil the moment. As promised, here is your reward. Enjoy! And in three days time, you may return to me for another hunt! \n\n#L0##bActually, can you tell me more about yourself?#k#l
Anything else you wish to know? \n\n#L0##bWhy is that mask really on your face?#k#l

I'm a prideful man, and the thought that I lost my chance due to spider is...rather embarrassing to be honest. Icebyrd offered me a chance to redeem myself, and I took it. I won't take off this mask until I can return to Amoria with honor! You've helped me and I never forget a favor. I may have a few tasks for you in the future. With your help, I'm sure that I'd get a leg up on that walking waste of space known as Prince Vince... Does this answer your question?
As promised, here is your reward. Enjoy! And in three days time, you may return to me for another hunt!
Tsk, tsk. So sad. I said #b100 Wolf Spiders#k. Not 74, not 32, not 99. 100. Come back when you have something to show for your effort-besides a tired face.
Hey. Got a sec?

Then you've come to the right place! Name's John Barricade, one half of the world-famous Barricade Bros. Treasure Hunting Co. I've been trying to explore the Temple Hive, but I haven't got that far in. But with your help, I think we can make a push to discover some treasure...First, I'll need you to clear the area. Wipe out #b50 Killa Bees, 30 Mighty Maple Eaters#k and #b40 Fire Tusks#k. After that, head back to me and we'll get some real work done. Hop to it, kid!
It's called "distinct fashion sense". And I wouldn't talk if I were you...
Great work, kid! Ready to hear about the treasure? \n\n#L0##bOk, what else have you discovered?#k#l

Well, it's a pretty long list. I always liked history, even when I was a kid. All my other subjects were ok, but I always got straight A's in History-probably because my dad would kick my butt if I didn't. That what happens when you grow up with an archeologist for a father. \n\n#L0##bWhat about your family?#k#l

You must mean my brother, Jack Barricade. We've agreed to something that I'll tell you about a bit later, but essentially, he's looking for something in Aqua Road, and I'm searching here. \n\n#L0##bOk, you still haven't told me what was the first thing you discovered?#k#l

Oh, sorry. It happens sometimes. After college, my brother and I concluded that the only way to live forever was to find the Fountain of Youth. It took 3 years, but we finally found it! \n\n#L0##bNO WAY!#k#l
WAY! \n\n#L0##bThat's awesome!#k#l
We thought so too, but man we made a lot of businesses mad with that one...
Ok, let's get going. Clear a path, come on back and let's figure out this mystery.
Not even close to done, shorty. Get back out there and knock out #b50 Killa Bees, 30 Mighty Maple Eaters#k and #b40 Fire Tusks#k. After that, we can talk.
Nice work! Now, I'll need some time to study these markings.\n\n#L0##bTell me some more about your discoveries.#k#l

Heh, ok. You asked for a list, well, my bro and I have discovered King Solomon's Mines, solved the mystery of Stonehenge, found Captain Kidd's gold horde, unearthed the trove of the Knights Templar, the Lost Dutchman's Gold Mine, the Sphinx Chamber, and countless Spanish galleons. Not bad for a few years! \n\n#L0##bHoly crap! What do you think we'll find here?#k#l

I have a hunch that Subani left something here. I remember when I explored the Sphinx Chamber, I discovered an old legend that was eerily similar to that of Subani and Naricain. It also foretells that the act that created the Dark Scrolls was not their final battle. I'm not sure what we'll find, but I'm sure it pertains to that. It also mentioned another world... \n\n#L0##bAnother world? Elpam's outside, have you spoken with him?#k#l
Not yet, he smells a bit too much like old cheese... but if he really is from where he said, I might have to...
Ok, kid, get going! Return to me soon, and I should have more information!
Looking good, kid-but I'll need #b50 Hyper Glyphs#k to read the markings. I'll be waiting!
Back already, huh? Well, you proved your worth, so I'll tell you a little story...

Well, if you've heard of Dark Scrolls, you've heard about Subani. He was the powerful magician who sacrificed himself to seal away the evil demon, Naricain. The scrolls are all over the place, but that's not what we're here for. I got a tip from this funny looking guy over in Purplewood Forest, went by the name of Glimmer Man. He mentioned that Subani had a horde of items stashed away, and that the MesoGears would be a good place to look. I did some digging, thanks to the path you cleared, and found some strange markings. I don't know what they say, but I do know that there only one thing that deciphers marking like these-a #bHyper Glyph#k. It can decipher other languages, but the problem is, you can only use it once, and there are 50 markings. I'll need you to hunt down #b50 Hyper Glyphs#k so we can keep going-I know we're close to something...Try those weird-looking elephants that shoot electricity. I'm willing to bet they're hiding something in that mechanism on top of their heads!
Well, ok. You never turn down a good legend though, they always turn out to be true...
Right on time! We've got a problem...

Ok, I "borrowed" a few robots from Foxwit's hidden lab to help me decipher the markings, but the second they finished, those frigging robots went nuts! It was like they were being controlled...Anyways, they have the #bMesoGears Map Pieces#k. All of #b50#k of them. I'll need you to hunt them down and bring them back so I can start assembling the map. I'll poke around a bit in the MesoGears and see what I can find...
ust when you were getting good... I guess it was too good to be true.
A+ plus, kid. Truly outstanding! I'll start putting those pieces together right now! \n\n#L0##bI'm just wondering... Have you heard from your brother yet?#k#l
No...we haven't spoken for a while now. I hope something hasn't happened to him... \n\n#L0##bYou mentioned another world in the prophecy; do you think we could travel there?#k#l

You know, that's probably a better question for Elpam or The Glimmer Man. But I will say this, trouble's gonna find you anyway, so you might as well have fun looking for it! Ok. Time for me to get back on the map. Before that, I've got something for you.
Might not be the treasure we wanted off the bat, but when I'm done putting this map together, you and I are going hunting, Barricade Bros. style!
I like the effort you're showing kiddo, but #b50 MesoGears Map Pieces#k is what we need to put the MesoGears Map together. I'm headed back into the MesoGears to see what I can dig up...
Yes! This will do it. I can now adjust my enchanted compass! Thank you so much!
If you should have the time, please see me again, for I require a final task.
If I am to re-calibrate this compass, I'll need more #bElpam Magnets, 30 to be exact#k. I await your return.
Hello, my name is Elpam Gorlab. I am in need of assistance, do you think you can spare a moment? \n\n#L0##bYes. At the very least, you can tell me why you look so different.#k#l

Ah. Therein lay the tale of my current predicament. I am from Versal. It is best described as a parallel dimension to the Maple World, as many things are different, yet familiar. I travel here for certain occasions to observe the people that inhabit this land. However, this time when I traveled here, I noticed that I was in a strange place. In speaking with the one called Icebyrd Slimm, I discovered my calculations were off due to the appearance of the new land, Amoria. I need to get home, but I have to adjust my enchanted compass first. I will need 30 Elpam Magnets to do this properly?I believe the Barnard Grays are the only creatures in this world that may have them. I have translated this to your Quest Journal from my native language. I wish you luck, and shall await your return! 

#L0##bTell me more about your world, Versal.#k
#L1##bNo way. You smell like old cheese!#k#l

It can be thought of as the mirror dimension for the Maple World. There are similarities, but many differences as well. For instance, you may have noticed my last name is a monster here. In our world, they are benevolent creatures, and it is a mark of honor to be associated with them. It seems strange to me that they are so fearsome here... Would you help me?
If I am to re-calibrate this compass, I'll need more #bElpam Magnets, 30 to be exact#k. I await your return.
Please see me again if you change your mind.
Er...well, cheese is a popular form of cologne in our world...please see me again should you change your mind.

Fantabulstanding work! My apologies if that phrase did not turn out the way I planned. I can now make the journey home. \n\n#L0##bHold on, Hold on! I have questions... like... tell me something crazy about Versal!#k#l
Very well, you have aided me, the least I can do is tell you a few tidbits about my home. The creature known as Mushmom is the most dangerous creature there...and she's not alone. \n\n#L0##bWHAT?#k#l
Your surprise is expected, but nevertheless, it remains the truth. It puzzles me as to why she is regarded as cute and lovable here... \n\n#L0##bWhy are you so pale?#k#l

Hmm. I do not believe my skin to be pale, it is a natural pigment. The sun only shines in Versal for a period of...3 munf? No, 3 months...out of one...what do you call them...year? I believe that is the correct measurement. At any rate, it is nice to see the sun glow so brightly here for an extended period. \n\n#L0##bHow do you get there?#k#l

I am still working on my way back, but when I do figure out how to bring others there, I will most assuredly notify you. In the mean time, in return for your effort, here is something I found between worlds.
May it serve you well and see you around!
It seems as if you have, quite literally, "lost time". I will need #b60 Temporal Fragments#k if I am to make the journey home. Please acquire them, and return to me.

So glad to see you, friend. I've got the compass adjusted, but could still use a hand if you're willing to lend it. 

#L0##bSure, as long as you give it back.#k
#L1##bYou're sick! No way am I giving you my hands! They're mine!#k#l

Ha. Ha. Ha. That was a joke, as you call it? Fascinating. I'll need to travel back to the exact moment that everything went haywire. Doing so will allow me to go to my intended place and get home as normal. However, I'll need #b60 Temporal Fragments#k to give me enough time to do it. I believe the creatures you refer to as Tick-Tocks will have them, although it is a rather rare item. I will remain here until your return.
I will need #b60 Temporal Fragments#k if I am to make the journey home. Please acquire them, and return to me.
Ok... Please return when you can help me.
You misunderstand...or maybe I do. Any rate, please return when you can help me.
So glad to see you! I need your help!

Perfect! We're building the new areas, but we've come under attack from Gryphons, who are destroying my cranes, and Boomers, who are damaging my machinery! It's madness! I'll need you to kick some booty-#b100 Gryphons#k and enough #bBoomers#k to gather #b150 #t4000391##k. You do that for me, and I won't forget it!
Guess we'll have to get it done without you then...
Nice, nice. You got skills, I recognize that.
Here's a little something for your trouble. Even though you beat them back, they'll be back. See me when you're ready for action!
You got jokes, I see. That's funny, cause I know I said #b150 #t4000391##k and #b100 Gryphons#k. Not "way less than that". Do you understand the words that are coming out of my mouth? Get to it!
OUTSTANDING! I knew you were special the second I looked at you. \n\n#L0##bI have a question. So... you were a Thief?#k#l

The very best. I trained under the Dark Lord's watchful eye for many years. Once you train past a certain point, fighting becomes second nature. \n\n#L0##bHow did the Dark Lord let you leave? I've never heard of that before...#k#l

It's a long story, but The Dark Lord allowed me to leave if I touched him once with my weapon. It's much different from fighting his clone, his speed and multiple techniques are incredible. The fight was a true test of my skill...it was a stroke of luck that let me touch him. I promised to help others train as he helped me. \n\n#L0##bDid Icebyrd have anything to do with that?#k#l

In a way, yes. He showed me that my destiny is here, in New Leaf City, and to a greater extent, Masteria. It's a brave new world out there...and I want to know where my fate lies. Ok. End of the story. It's time to get paid for your work!
Here's your class reward, as promised. I'm proud of you! You can come and see me anytime you wish perform your duty as a citizen of New Leaf City!
Come on, you're not done yet, but I have faith. You can do it!

Hiya Sport! I'm the new sheriff in town. You ready for some law and order? 

#L0##bOnly if I get to help enforce it!#k
#L1##bLaw? Order? Please. You couldn't tame a fly. I'm leaving!#k#l
That's the attitude that got me where I am today! Ok, I'm Lita Lawless, and with your help, I'm going to corral this town into a crime-free zone.

I know how the devious monster mind works, having trained as a thief for many years. So, you're going to have to wipe out #b200#k of two types-I believe #bElectrophants and Gryphons#k should prove a suitable test of your skills! Take your time and report back when you're done! I've got something just for your class!
Grumpy little thing, aren't you?
Grumpy little thing, aren't you?

I want to thank you. You've been pushed to your limits in helping us, and shown you're a true Urban Warrior. As my way of saying thanks, I want you to have this chair. Check it out, and be sure to come back anytime you want. New Leaf City wouldn't be here without you! \n\n#L0##bSo, about that favor you mentioned...#k#l
We're tight, but not that tight yet. I'll tell you in time though... \n\n#L0##bI've noticed the city has quite a bit of diversity!#k#l
Yes. I felt it'd be best to be a little different. Masteria is a big place, and while we're only just starting, I have a feeling we're in for one wild ride! \n\n#L0##bWhat's up with you and Lita?#k#l
We're very good friends, but nothing more. She's a tough one, though! \n\n#L0##bJohn and Elpam both mentioned another world, Versal. What do you know about this?#k#l
Well, there's a rumor that a portal can be opened somehow from within the city, but I'm not sure how that's possible. \n\n#L0##bWhat do you mean? You built this city.#k#l

Correction-I rebuilt this city. The foundations are still there, as is some of the technology; you've probably seen some of it when you were outside the city. There's some stuff that just works, and I don't mean the Foxwit Doors themselves-I mean the energy that powers them. Foxwit is a genius and some of that is way beyond even his understanding. I'm a bit wary of using it all, just because of the old tales of Masteria-the immortal warriors, a mad scientist, a threat from the stars, some of their legends are pretty heavy stuff. In addition to that, this is where Subani and Naricain are originally from. Not the city, another region of Masteria. John probably mentioned that. \n\n#L0##bJust level with me, Icebyrd. Tell me what you know.#k#l

Ok, but keep this a secret, don't want people panicking. The Masteria of old was a sprawling utopia, one far advanced in technology. However, their ambition far outstripped their control of the technology, and there was an accident. Masteria, the great land, finally fell into the sea, its secrets lost forever. Until now. I made a deal with someone to raise the continent, and establish the city in the ruins of Olde Sapp Village. He brought my dream to life, and it cost me next to nothing. And that's where we are now. However, the city has many, many secrets that even I don't know about. Tread carefully; you never know what can open up... \n\n#L0##bOk, I know what how it was raised, but who raised it? What did you have to do?#k#l

That's a bit personal, but I will say this-if there's ever a time when you need to know more, I'll tell you. Until then, don't worry about it. That burden is mine alone to bear. For now, just let me give you a gift for the appreciation of helping our city.
Where did I put it... Just give me a second and talk to me, ok?
I want you to have this chair. Check it out, and be sure to come back anytime you want. New Leaf City wouldn't be here without you!
Looks good! Just give it a try and sit on it sometimes!

Fantastic! I'll be able to face her again without worrying if one of those pesky Wolf Spiders will spoil the moment. As promised, here is your reward. Enjoy! And in three days time, you may return to me for another hunt!
As promised, here is your reward. Enjoy! And in three days time, you may return to me for another hunt!
Tsk, tsk. So sad. I said #b100 Wolf Spiders#k. Not 74, not 32, not 99. 100. Come back when you have something to show for your effort-besides a tired face.
Welcome back! Are you ready for another hunt?
Ok, then! Same as last time. 100 Wolf Spiders for one Leaf Crystal. See you when you return!
Unfortunate. Be on your way then!
OUTSTANDING! I knew you were special the second I looked at you.
Here's your reward, as promised. I'm proud of you! You can come and see me anytime you wish perform your duty as a citizen of New Leaf City!
Come on, you're not done yet, but I have faith. You can do it!
Hey! If it isn't my favorite deputy. Ready for some hunting?

That's the attitude that got me where I am today! Ok, let's do this again! I'm going to corral this town into a crime-free zone. I know how the devious monster mind works, having trained as a thief for many years. So, you're going to have to wipe out #b200#k of two types-I believe #bElectrophants and Gryphons#k should prove a suitable test of your skills! Take your time and report back when you're done!
Grumpy little thing, aren't you?
So what else would you like to know? \n\n#L0##bWhat inspired you to start New Leaf City?#k#l

Well, I always envisioned a place where those could come and live their dreams. When I arrived here, there was nothing, just the jungle and the machinery that was left. I had some help in building this place in exchange for a favor... \n\n#L0##bWhat kind of favor?#k#l
...really not allowed to talk about it, but it's nothing you have to worry about...hopefully. \n\n#L0##bWhat continent am I on?#k#l

You're on the continent of Masteria. There's an old legend that surrounds the continent, but you're standing in the rebuilt portion of Olde Sapp Village. There's an old saying that Masteria is where warriors of all kinds come to master their fate. The continent has risen once more from the sea, and people of all kinds are here, some good, some bad. We're clearing a path deeper into the continent, who knows what we'll find? \n\n#L0##bWait, wait?the city was already here?#k#l

Not exactly. This was once known as Olde Sapp Village, and was smaller than what you see here. Essentially, Masteria has an old fable, but I'm not sure you'd want to hear about that...\n\n#L0##bYou mentioned it had "risen from the sea" I'd like to hear about how it sunk sometime...#k#l
It's only an old fable, I'm sure it wouldn't interest you. Maybe if you help out around the city, I can tell you some more...
Ok. That's it for this time. Welcome to New Leaf City and hope you enjoy your stay here!
Ah!  Returned at last I see...Perfect! Just give me a moment... <waves his hands over the Materia> and there you go!

I've given you a #b#t4031761##k.  Take that to the boy Spindle over in Omega Sector.  He's a genius with all matters mechanical, and is helping the fine soldiers there combat the alien threat.  In return for the weapons I provide them for defense, Spindle has agreed to help me with my work.  He's strictly a tech guy, but I've created a machine for him to help me with the magical aspects of my crafting.  Spindle will be able to use my machine to form this into the weapon of your choice. You have my thanks-and should you find more #b#t4031760##k, please return it to me and I can make you another Orb.  I can always use another opportunity to perfect my designs!

Unfortunately, you don't have everything I need.  Like I said, #b#t4031760##k by itself is not enough...It's highly unstable in its natural form, and I'll need #b7 #t4021008#s#k if I'm to transform it into a form suitable for crafting a weapon.  Exactly #b7#k, as 7 is the most magical of numbers!  Acquire them and return to me!
Greetings. How's it going?\r\n\r\n#b#L0# Er... who are you and why do you look so... different?#l

Why, thank you!  I am called the Glimmer Man...and yes, there are few like me in this world.  I am a mage of some power, a traveler of land and space, and a scholar of the universe and its many mysteries.

#b#L0#That's quite a funky jacket you have on.#l
#L1#Yeah, whatever... freak.  Powerful mage?  A space clown is more like it!#l#k

Stylish, isn't it?  I made this jacket myself.  Might look a little weird, but the purple markings are actually enchantments. They make this particular coat highly resistant to magic. Not that I really need it anymore anyway... \r\n\r\n#b#L0#Why is that?#l

Do you see my skin?  I am called the Glimmer Man because I can turn my body into pure diamond with a mere thought.  No, it was not something I was born with...it was a skill I learned.  My diamond form renders me impervious to magic, as well as having quite a number of other handy effects.  In this form, I've been able to survive in outer space and journey through the cosmos.  I have seen and learned much in my travels...much that most men and women have never seen, nor will ever see. \r\n\r\n#b#L0#Why are you here? Surely a mage of your power has better things to do...#l

After leaving the realm of Ellinia where I began my training, and having exhausted my avenues of learning at an early age, I traveled the distant reaches of space for many years in search of new things, new ways to improve on my abilities as a magician.  Other than a few not-so-amicable run-ins with the Grays, it turns out that space is...well, mostly made of space.
Just when I had despaired of finding new frontiers to explore, I heard that Masteria had appeared off of Victoria Island, emerging from the depths of the sea!  The tales of this place had always intrigued me-this land is rumored to be where those come to find their destiny; or in other words, gain greater power.  I had heard legends of the Grandmasters of the fabled Crimsonwood Keep, how they were without peer in their chosen professions.  Exactly the sort of place I'd been looking for to extend my knowledge!  Who knew that that such a place would be on the very planet that I'd left?  And as luck would have it, one of the very things I had searched for in space has been found here!

#b#L0#What are you looking for exactly?#l

In my pursuit of power, I have become a weapons crafter by trade.  I design all kinds... from handheld armaments to star-breakers on battle cruisers.  Years ago, I came across a very rare element called #bWhite Versal Materia#k. I had only a small sample of it but even in that small amount I saw the potential of the material!  It could be used to create weapons of tremendous power!  I studied it extensively, and drew up many schematics for weapon designs.  But alas, I did not have enough of the material to actually construct any of these weapons.  I had thought that it was a material found in outer space, and truth be told, one of the primary reasons why I journeyed into the far reaches of the galaxy was to find more.  But from what I've learned, it's not even from this world!  Rather, it's from an alternate dimension of the Maple World...a world called Versal!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Whoa!#l

Imagine my amazement upon my arrival in Masteria when I began to hear that adventurers here have been finding it!  I've already devised blueprints for a new line of hand-held weapons using this rare element!  The designs are exquisite...but unproven.  If I only had some White Versal Materia!  Should you find any, please return it to me!  In exchange for allowing me to try out and perfect my designs, you can keep the weapon I create.  Deal?

Then it's agreed!  Return when you have found my #b#t4031760##k.  However, White Versal Materia by itself is not enough...It's highly unstable in its natural form.  I'll need #b7 #t4021008#s#k as well if I'm to transform it into a form suitable for crafting a weapon.

And not to worry, I understand that given your profession, you may have a preference in weapon form and fighting style.  I have devised a machine that can mold the Materia into any form...be it blade, claw, staff or bow.  Once you return with my required materials, we can make it into the form you wish.  I bid you luck on your search...I am eager to perfect my designs!

If you prefer using your primitive weapon, suit yourself...But let me ask you this, ever been to Amoria?  Amos the Strong is a good friend of mine.  Ever notice his axe?  He didn't beat that Balrog with just any old weapon.  And the axe?  One of my design.  Think on it, my friend.  I shall be here if you change your mind.
Pre-judgement is a measure of small-mindedness, and the enemy of knowledge.  Begone and return only when you have opened your mind.
Back again, I see! And you've found more White Versal Materia! Fantastic!  Most wonderful!  Let's test out another of my weapon designs!  You know what else to do, right?
Then it's agreed!  I'll need #b7 #t4021008#s#k as well if I'm to transform it into a form suitable for crafting a weapon.

If you prefer using your primitive weapon, suit yourself...But let me ask you this, ever been to Amoria?  Amos the Strong is a good friend of mine.  Ever notice his axe?  He didn't beat that Balrog with just any old weapon.  And the axe?  One of my design.  Think on it, my friend.  I shall be here if you change your mind.
Wonderful!  More White #t4031760# and #t4021008#s!  Let's try this again!  Just give me a moment... <waves his hands over the Materia> and there you go!
Here's another #b#t4031761##k.  Perhaps this time, you can have Spindle try to make another weapon form out of this Orb!  Let me know how this one works out!

Unfortunately, you don't have everything I need. Exactly #b7#k, as 7 is the most magical of numbers!  Acquire them and return to me!

Understood. You know, he's the one who helped me getting out of that Drake's Meal Table when I got hurt... I could have gone out there by myself but I still admire his bravery and passion for doing such a thing for a human being as a snail.\r\n\r\n#L0##bOh.. that's what happened.#k#l

Don't you say that! You hurt him, didn't you? I can see he got new scratches all over on him. It's not fatal but...\r\n\r\n#L0##bI did have to hit him a few times to make him go into his shell. If I only knew Bob Snale was indeed a snail, I might have done things differently.#k#l

I forgive you. We always hunt monsters for money, for clothing, for strength, all for the survival in this world. I wouldn't be surprise if you have mistaken Bob as ordinary snails. Poor animal...\r\n\r\n#L0##bSo what's up with Bob? What do you know about him?#k#l

Bob is one of my oldest and dearest friends. I've seen him since I was little child so he is probably just as old as I am. We talked a lot. Subjects of those chats were mostly about this universe and our purpose of life. We've shared a great deal of thoughts until one day; he decided to pursue ascetic life with solitude. It's been a while since then. I didn't know I would see him like this though.\r\n\r\n#L0##bAh... I see. I was wondering, if by any chance, would you know how I could talk him to come out from his shell?#k#l
I don't know. I would think Bob is very mad at you at this moment. Maybe you can ease his mind if you comfort him somehow. I wouldn't really know how to about that though.
I wish you good luck. When he does get out, tell him my regards!

Because I can. Floating is just as easy to do as standing if you once get to know how. Don't try this at home though. At least not until you are as old as I am.
I get that question a lot since I am living at the top of trees. In my opinion, all magicians should not be afraid of heights. Magicians always can get back up there with no time unlike others.

Oh, hi! Good to see you again. You have my thanks for helping me find my daughter. I still am just making up for the years we've lost these days.\r\n\r\n#L0##bThat's good. Hey, I have a question to ask.#k#l

Ok, let's see...

He is the Legendary Bob Snale who lived with the history of Maplestory.#k#l
I wouldn't know much of a history of this world. But this is a very unique find. I bet Winston the archeologist might know more than I do for this case.

Not for me?... I am starving to death here. Staring at this snail doesn't help me losing my appetites...\r\n\r\n#L0##bOk, let's get one thing clear. I didn't give it to you! You took it from me!#k#l

You want a word of advice about the house?  STAY OUT OF THERE!  It's haunted!

#L0##bA haunted house?  That sounds like a perfect place to explore for Halloween!#k#l
#L1##bWhy would I be interested in a boring rickety old house?  See ya later, you crazy old coot...#k#l

What?  Are you daft?  What's wrong with you young 'uns these days?!  Let me tell you why you won't be wanting to go in there!  This house used to belong to a Master Toymaker named Jonas Prendergast.  Jonas used to make marvelous toys... dolls that danced, stuffed animals that walked and talked!  Every kid wanted a Prendergast toy for Christmas!
To keep up with demand, Jonas built a marvelous Toy Machine at the top of his house to automate his toy creation process.  Children from all over Maple World used to come here to see his creations and beg their parents to buy them-- and Jonas would hold lavish parties every holiday for them.  As a matter of fact, right around this time of year, every year, Jonas would have an elaborate Halloween party, giving away toys instead of candies for the trick-or-treating kids, but only for the ones who came with costumes of course!

#L0##bA toymaker's house?  That doesn't sound very scary.#k#l
#L1##bHow do you know all this?  I don't believe you.  I'm tired of your story, old man!#k#l

Don't interrupt your elders!  I'm not done telling you the tale.  So... as I was saying, that was before a terrible tragedy befell the family!  Despite being married many times over, Jonas only had one child... his beloved daughter, Sophilia, whom he loved with all his heart.\r\n\r\n#L0##bSo something happened to her?#k#l

One night, an accident befell Sophilia, a terrible accident.  They say that the death of his darling daughter unhinged Jonas... and grief drove him mad.  Jonas stopped making toys, shut down his Toy Machine, and withdrew from the world, locking himself in his workshop at the top the house.\r\n\r\n#L0##bSo what happened to him?!#k#l

That was a long, long time ago.  No one has lived in the house for years.  But they say that even now, you can hear the Prendergast Toy Machine, chugging away, continuing to crank out his toys, toys that have become twisted with his anger and sorrow.

#L0##bOooohhh, now that sounds kind of scary...  So how do I get in?#k#l
#L1##bHow do you know all this?  I don't believe you.  I'm tired of your story, old man!#k#l

What?  What's wrong with you?  Didn't you listen to my tale of woe?  The house is HAUNTED!  It's DANGEROU-- Hmph... what's the use?  No one listens to an old man!  No matter... The house won't let just anyone in.  Thank the heavens!  So even if I knew... I wouldn't tell you!  But some of you rascals have managed to get in... looking for trouble I'm sure, like all young 'uns do!  Now, scat!
HMPH!  You'll be sorry!  Don't say I didn't warn you!
That's right!  There's nothing interesting at all about this house.  That's a good kid... you just turn around and head back the way you came!
That's right!  There's nothing interesting at all about this house.  That's a good kid... you just turn around and head back the way you came!
Well, I never-- Scat!  Shoo!  Hmph!  Youngsters have no respect for their elders these days...  No respect at all.
Well, I never-- Scat!  Shoo!  Hmph!  Youngsters have no respect for their elders these days...  No respect at all.

Ha!  Can't get into the house, can you?  That's right!  Be a good kid and go on home!

I... I want to disbelieve your words as just another youngster's fibs, young 'un... but this key you've given me... This key says otherwise.

Thank you.  Thank you so much.\r\nForgive my rough words earlier.  My name is Thomlin Prendergast.  Jonas was my older brother.  The story I told you before was true... I was there.  After Sophilia's accident, Jonas went mad.  He locked himself in his workshop, refusing to see anyone, ignoring our pleas through the door to take food and water.  Even the constant thrum of the Prendergast Toy Machine that once permeated the house fell silent as Jonas mourned.

One day, the noises of the Toy Machine started up again!  We rushed up to the Workshop door, hoping that Jonas had come out.  But the door remained locked, and the noises coming from within... these were not the same noises as before!  It was a terrible screeching, like the grinding of gears, fearsome thumping noises, and god knows what else!

To make matters worse, many of the household staff swore to have seen the ghost of Sophilia... and they began to desert the house.  I confess... I saw her myself.  Soon, everyone had left.  The only ones who remained behind were myself, Edmunds, our loyal butler, and Jonas' wife, Ludmilla, who could not bear to leave the life she had to which she had grown accustomed.

I had an extra key to Jonas' Workshop, and Edmunds begged me to go in and talk to my brother.  With great fear and trepidation, I ascended to the top of the house, climbing to the heights of my brother's workspace.
There, I found Jonas... dead at the controls of his Toy Machine.  He had been dead for awhile.  There were toys everywhere.

Standing there, in front of my brother's lifeless body, his huge mechanical contraption looming above me... I couldn't help but feel that somehow part of Jonas' spirit, his grief, had entered his Toy Machine.  As if it had heard my thoughts, the machine began to crank out toys... monstrous toys I had never seen before!  They were my brother's toys... but twisted, hateful.  In my haste and fright, I dropped my key as I fled the house.   I... I have never gone back in since.
... I realize now what my mission is. Please talk to me in a minute.
"It is not mine to ask for... but I humbly ask you to reconsider.
You're a liar!  I may be close to blind but I'd recognize that key anywhere!  That doesn't belong to you!  Come back here with that!

Wonderful!  The chill was beginning to make my joints ache!  Now we can get these fireplaces going again.  <Shakes his head> So many of them in this house.  But first things first, I haven't forgotten my end.  Come back and ask me what you wish, I shall do my best to enlighten you.\r\n\r\n#L0##bCan you tell me about the layout of the Mansion?#l

Certainly.  You are currently standing in the Foyer.  The Library is at the other end of the house.  You can reach that by going through a series of rooms and hallways from here.  Master Prendergast's Toy Workshop is at the very top of this mansion but it's only accessible through the doors at the top of the Library.\r\n\r\n#L0##bOk.  Thanks for pointing out the way. Do be careful, the house is large and can be a bit confusing to navigate.  And one more thing...  In addition to the noises, I've been noticing some very odd things... What odd things?  I don't know how to explain it exactly.  Some of the rooms simply don't feel right anymore.  I've been tending to this house for decades, but somehow, it feels a bit different... almost as if the rooms are moving around on me.  <shrugs> Must be the time of year.\r\n\r\n#L0##bIs there anyone else in the house?#l

As I mentioned previously, most - or dare I say, all - of our household staff have left unexpectedly, complaining about strange noises and... um... sightings.  Who do you want to know about?\r\n\r\n#L0##bWhat can you tell me about the lady in the picture?#l

Ah, that's Master Prendergast.  As for him, he is presently... busy.  He has sequestered himself in his Workshop at the top of the Mansion.  Please do not disturb him.\r\n\r\n#L0##bOk. Thanks for the info.#l

I understand if you balk at the thought though, I know firsthand how difficult she can be.  If you are not up for being harangued, take my advice and steer clear of her... or she'll press you into her service whether you wish it or not!

No, no, this won't do.  Do you see the size of this house, and the number of fireplaces?  At least #b60 #t4000018##k are necessary to create enough warmth to ward off this chill.  Any less and I fear it will do naught but cause smoke.  Please return when you've gathered enough!

May I assist you?  My name is Edmunds.  I have been the butler of the Prendergast Estate ever since Master Prendergast acquired this house.\r\n\r\n#L0##bWhat ghost were you talking about?#k#l

Master Prendergast makes all of his wonderful toys right here, in his Workshop at the top of this house.  You have heard of the Prendergast Toy Company, haven't you?  No?!

<Sigh> It is as I feared.  I should say, Master Prendergast was once the premier toy maker, but as you can see, this place, and his reputation, has recently fallen into a bit of disrepair.  Master Prendergast once made the most wondrous toys, his delightful creations were beloved by all children!  His products made him rich, many times over, affording him this lavish home, and that drew the attention of many females.  Jonas has been married several times over - seven wives in all, in fact.
However, Jonas had but a fleeting passion toward all of his wives- even this latest one.  But the only female who held his attention was his daughter, Sophilia.

Ah, Sophilia.  Such a happy, darling child.  Then came that tragic day, a day which will be scarred forever in my memory... A terrible, dark day.  <wipes away a tear> Since that day, this house has grown so cold, so cold...

Enough of my prattling... We must all carry on, so back to the task at hand!  The groundskeeper, who used to chop and gather the firewood for the house, was one of our recent casualties...  We have no more, and it will take much to fill all the fireplaces of this manse.  If you can help me by bringing me #b60 #t4000018##k, it would get Ludmilla off my back, at least for the moment.  Ludmilla is Master Prendergast's current wife, the current lady of the house.  She has been complaining about the chill.  Do hurry with the wood, Ludmilla can be quite the merciless nag!
Service is a noble calling, my young friend. Perhaps you should look into acquiring more maturity before you return here.
Service is a noble calling, my young friend. Perhaps you should look into acquiring more maturity before you return here.

Or were interconnected, I should say.  Because of what befell mistress Sophilia, we've installed safety grates over each of the fireplaces since.  <sob>  If only we had done so sooner. I've heard rumors that the ghost of Sophilia still walks the halls of this house.  Sometimes... I think I even hear her voice coming from her bedroom.\r\n <shivers>

Truth be told, that's the real reason why so many of the household staff have deserted the house.  They say she still wanders about, seemingly still searching for something.  I haven't seen her myself, and I can't imagine what she'd be searching for, but the thought of her not getting what she wants, even if it's only her spirit, well, it's more than I can bear.

When Sophilia was alive, she couldn't get enough of Gummy Slimes, her favorite candy.  It's been a long time since we've had them in the pantry. I... I used to keep some in stock just for her.  If she's still 'here', I would feel better if we still had some around.  Bring me #b80 Gummy Slimes, 20 of each color#k (Red, Green, Orange, and Purple), and I'll give you my #dOmni Key#k, which will allow you to unlock the fireplaces and access the Chimney.

She was the daughter any father would be proud of. Smart, pretty, lovable... whenever she walked in the room, it was like a ray of sunshine.  She was spirited, adventuresome, mischievous.  The entire household loved her, it was a joy to see her playing about the house, always embarking on some adventure of her own design.  Her smile alone could brighten anyone's day!
Sophilia loved playing with everything - jewelry, dolls, rocking horses, she'd get her hands on everything she could, that little girl!  Her father was often busy with his work, and her stepmother despised her, so she was often left alone to her own devices.  This house is far from town, and rather than real friends, Sophilia had to make do with her father's toys, and her own imagination.  We played with her when we could, but we were often busy with work, and tending to Master Prendergast's business and Ludmilla's needs.  A few weeks ago, we realized that none of us had seen Sophilia in awhile.
Then one day, a few days thereafter, I... I found her.  No one knew what happened exactly, but it looked like she'd somehow taken to exploring the inside of the house, and had taken a fall while climbing the Chimney.  Of all places for a young child to be!  What on earth could have possessed her to do such a thing?
But I... I blame myself.  I should've watched her a bit closer.  In fact, now that I think of it, the last few times I saw that sweet girl alive, she kept asking me if I had seen her doll.  I was busy and thought nothing of it as her father had made her so many to play with.  <Sob>  I'm sorry; it pains me to think that a life so dear and sweet could be so easily extinguished.

No one took Sophilia's death harder than Master Prendergast.  He withdrew from Ludmilla, the household, from life.  For weeks he was beside himself with grief, refusing to eat.  He even shut down his Toy Machine and stopped all production on his toys.  A few days ago, he locked himself up in his Toy Workshop at the top of this house, and the noises of his Toy Machine began again.  He began making toys again. <shudders> But, these toys sound nothing like the toys he used to make before.  Can't you hear them?  I fear that his beloved daughter's death may have driven Master Prendergast past his senses.  I am afraid for him, but I am also afraid to go up to the Workshop now because of the noises.\r\nYou look brave.  If you could, please check on him for me, will you?  Master Prendergast's Workshop is located near the top of the house.  It's only accessible through one wing of the house, which is only reachable through the doors at the top of the Library.  I'd be wary-it's a dangerous place, with open machinery.  Please... see how he is.  We are all quite worried about him.

I am not alone in that, my young friend.  Ludmilla, is, shall we say, difficult.  I have been a professional manservant for decades, but she tries even my patience. <trembles with rage>
The woman orders me around all day, and does nothing but eat, shop, and lay about.  It's like being subject to the whim of a spoiled dog.  However, even that is within my duties... but there are other reasons for my feelings.
When I said that Sophilia could brighten anyone's day, I meant anyone except for Ludmilla, that is.  I believe she was jealous of Master Prendergast's affection for her.  She usually ignored young mistress Sophilia but all of us could sense the resentment she bore her.
But enough, I shall remain the professional, and speak no more on this.
Please... I blame myself enough as it is already.  But perhaps you are right... perhaps it is safer that the Chimney remains inaccessible.

She was the daughter any father would be proud of. Smart, pretty, lovable...whenever she walked in the room, it was like a ray of sunshine.  She was spirited, adventuresome, mischievous.  The entire household loved her, it was a joy to see her playing about the house, always embarking on some adventure of her own design.  Her smile alone could brighten anyone's day!\r\nSophilia loved playing with everything-jewelry, dolls, rocking horses, she'd get her hands of everything she could, that little girl!  Her father was often busy with his work, and her stepmother despised her, so she was often left alone to her own devices.  This house is far from town, and rather than real friends, Sophilia had to make do with her father's toys, and her own imagination.  We played with her when we could, but we were often busy with work, and tending to Master Prendergast's business and Ludmilla's needs. A few weeks ago, we realized that none of us had seen Sophilia in awhile.\r\nThen one day, a few days thereafter, I... I found her.  No one knew what happened exactly, but it looked like she'd somehow taken to exploring the inside of the house, and had taken a fall.  I... I blame myself.  I should've watched her a bit closer.  <Sob>  I'm sorry; it pains me to think that a life so dear and sweet could be so easily extinguished.

No one took Sophilia's death harder than Master Prendergast.  He withdrew from Ludmilla, the household, from life.  For weeks he was beside himself with grief, refusing to eat.  He even shut down his Toy Machine and stopped all production on his toys.  A few days ago, he locked himself up in his Toy Workshop at the top of this house, and the noises of his Toy Machine began again.  He began making toys again. <shudders> But, these toys sound nothing like the toys he used to make before.  Can't you hear them?  I fear that his beloved daughter's death may have driven Master Prendergast past his senses.  I am afraid for him, but I am also afraid to go up to the Workshop now because of the noises.\r\nYou look brave.  If you could, please check on him for me, will you?  Master Prendergast's Workshop is located near the top of the house.  It's only accessible through one wing of the house, which is only reachable through the doors at the top of the Library.  I'd be wary-it's a dangerous place, with open machinery.  Please... see how he is.  We are all quite worried about him.

When I said that Sophilia could brighten anyone's day, I meant anyone except for Ludmilla, that is.  I believe she was jealous of Master Prendergast's affection for her.  She usually ignored young mistress Sophilia but all of us could sense the resentment she bore her.
