So, you spoke to both of them?  And what did they say?  Really?  Uh-huh.  And?  Maple Claws said that?  Wow... I love her!  And what about Versalmas?  O-Pongo said that?  Really?!  Wow.  I'm really glad you told me that.  I feel like I know much more about both holidays now!
Oh...\r\nThis doesn't make my decision any easier at all!\r\nWhat am I going to do?

I know!  You're older than I am... you know what to do!  Please, take the #bwishlist#k I've made!  You decide for me!  Please give it to either Maple Claws or O-Pongo!  But please think about this very carefully!  It's an important decision... for both me and you.
Thank you very much!  Please let me know who you gave my list to... so I'll know who's bringing me presents this year!
So, who's going to be bringing me my presents this year?  You don't know yet?!  Please, I can't stand not knowing!  Please talk to both Maple Claws and O-Pongo and come back!

Ok!  My question is: what's better...  Maplemas or Versalmas?

#b#L0#Versalmas?!  What are you talking about, little girl?  There's no such thing as Versalmas!#l#k
#b#L1#Listen, little girl, I've got more important things to do than answer stupid kid questions.#l

I'm not little!  I'm 10 years old!  And there is too such a thing as Versalmas!  O-Pongo told me all about it!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#O-Pongo?  Um, right... I suppose this "O-Pongo" is your invisible "friend."#l

No, silly!  O-Pongo is real!  He's right here in New Leaf City... go look if you don't believe me!  He's just like Maple Claws except he's big and green and a mouse and wears purple instead of red!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Ok...#l

Well, maybe he's not exactly alike, but he's the Maple Claws from his world -- the world of Versal!  O-Pongo told me all about it!  He told me about how it's usually dark but that the sun shines day after day after Versalmas comes and how all the kids dance and sing together and get special treats and candies!  It sounds very exciting--more exciting than Maplemas!  Well, maybe not more-- I do like all the presents I get from my parents on Maplemas.  But you get presents for Versalmas too!  I was already going to ask Maple Claws for a new pair of skis and other stuff, but I don't know what kind of presents since I've never had Versalmas before... so maybe Versalmas presents are even better!  But Maplemas Trees are so pretty and I love decorating them!  So-- Oh, I don't know!  Both holidays sound so good but I don't know if I'm allowed to celebrate both...\r\n<looks sad>\r\nPlease... can you... can you help me decide?  You're older than I am... you should know!  Pleaaaaase!

Yayyyyyyy!  Please, go talk to O-Pongo!  He can tell you all about Versalmas!  And please speak to Maple Claws too... she's in Happyville as usual, of course!  I'm sure you know this already but you can get to Happyville by speaking to #bRooney#k, and she'll take you there.  Then come back and tell me which holiday I should celebrate!  I've been working on my wishlist all year long and I know I'm going to get everything on it because I've been a really good girl!  Please, hurry!  I need to know who's bringing me presents this year!\r\nI can't wait to hear back from you!  Both holidays sound so great!  I can't wait to celebrate, uh--the right holiday!
I thought being older means you know more but I guess not.  Hmmph!
This is not a stupid question!  This is very important!  You're a meanie... a stupid meanie with no holiday spirit!

Merry Maplemas to you, Mapler!  Are you ready to celebrate Maplemas this year?  I hope you've been good...

#b#L0#I've been an excellent kid!#l#k
#b#L1#I've actually been burning ants and stuff!#l

Have you?  We'll see once I check my list... <purrs>
<sigh> But as it turns out, I have a situation that needs everyone's help this year!  Even if you've been bad, here's a chance to do some good for others and still receive presents from me this year.

#b#L0#Sure, Maple Claws.  What happened?  What do you need?#l

Every year as you know, I begin collecting presents for all the kids in the Maple World that have been good.  It's a lot of presents so it takes quite awhile... all year in fact!  My helpers and I had finally finished gathering them all when my present storehouse was broken into... and a bunch of the presents were stolen!  These were presents that were already wrapped and simply waiting for delivery!  Without these presents and with Maplemas Day so near, thousands of children in the Maple World will go without presents this year!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#That's terrible! I'd be glad to help you with that, of course!#l

Thank you, I knew you had the Maplemas spirit in you.  I know who's taken my presents: monsters.  Monsters simply have no manners, taking what's not theirs, but they love presents as much as any kid.  In a way, my heart goes out to them. <sigh> If you happen to find any presents from any bad monsters who've taken them from me, please return them to me as soon as you can.  Hmmm.  But I sense that there's another reason why you've come to see me.\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Yes, Maple Claws, a little girl named Suzy asked me to speak with you.#l

So, Suzy is having a hard time finding her Maplemas spirit this year?  I see.  Sometimes, with the hustle and bustle of everyday life, it's easy for us to forget to treat each other with simple kindnesses.  This is why the holidays are important... it's a time to let us remember the best in us and our fellow Maplers.  But something tells me there's something more to Suzy's dilemma.\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Yes, she spoke to a mouse named O-Pongo who told her about something called Versalmas.  Some sort of alternate Maplemas.#l

Ah.  I've heard of this O-Pongo.  You say he's a mouse who talks of an alternate version of Maplemas?  Curious.  But it does not surprise me that alternate worlds would celebrate holidays in different ways.\r\nI see that Suzy is excited at the prospect of a different holiday, and likely, different presents.  <purrs in thought>  Very well, will you take her a message from me?

Thank you.  It's important that little boys and girls don't forget what it is about the spirit of Maplemas that is important.  Please give me a moment to think about what I should exactly say to her, and then come back to me.
Part of the Maplemas spirit is spreading the spirit to those who have need of it. I hope you come back when you've found it within you.
I had a feeling I'd seen a lump of coal with your name on it lying around somewhere in my present storehouse.  Tsk, tsk.

I've thought of what I need you to tell Suzy.\r\nPlease tell her this: As long as she holds the spirit of kindness and goodwill in her heart all year round, it doesn't matter whether she chooses to celebrate the holidays with a Maplemas Tree, or with Versalmas customs and gifts.  Tell her that as long as she doesn't forget that, Maple Claws will remember her and bring her presents every year.\r\nWill you tell her that?  You will?  Thank you, and a Merry Maplemas to you, too!

Here is my message for the little one called Suzy.\r\nPlease tell her this: As great as Caramel Onions and Sugar-coated Olives may be -- and certainly are! -- Versalmas is about celebrating and sharing the things that we have, and not wanting more than we need.  If Maplemas is like Versalmas, then we both believe in the gift of sharing.  I do believe that even in your world, used to the traditions of Maplemas, there is room for Versalmas as well.\r\nThank you for giving her my message.  I certainly hope Suzy -- and you! -- choose to celebrate Versalmas with me this year!  Happy Versalmas to you, and may your days be bright!

Hoy there, young friend!  My, my, what a beautiful world you live in!  Who am I?  Why, I am O-Pongo!  Nice to meet you!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Nice to meet you too, er, O-Pongo.  So what are you doing here in NLC?#l#k
I'm here because it's that time of year!  It's Versalmas time again!  I'm the Versalmas Mouse so I'm here to spread Versalmas cheer!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Versalmas?  What's that?#l#k

Why, Versalmas is the most wonderful holiday in all of Versal!  How wonderful?  Why, so wonderful that everyone loves Versalmas!  Versalmas is even better than birthdays!  Why, just imagine the best birthday you've ever had... and Versalmas is a hundred times better than that!  It's the most celebrated holiday in Versal!  Well... it's actually the only holiday celebrated in Versal.  But it's still wonderful, nonetheless!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Um, so why are you here?  Shouldn't you be in Versal for that?#l#k

As for why I'm here, it's a strange story.  As the Versalmas Mouse, I'm bound by Versalmas law to deliver a present to every Versalian, no matter how far and wide they are located in Versal.  Whew, it's no easy task I tell you!  I had crossed off everyone on my list except for one last name -- Elpam Gorlab!
I had Elpam's gift all ready to go, but I couldn't find him anywhere!  So, I asked my trusty steed, Pwnzer, to "sniff" out where he was, and take me to him, crackity-splat!

#b#L0#Er, I'm guessing Pwnzer is a reindeer?#l#k

Reindeer?  What's that?  No, Pwnzer is an ostrich, of course!  He would be offended if you thought of him as anything but!  Anyway, I yelled "To Elpam Gorlab, Pwnzer, and away!" and lo and behold --POOF!-- I arrived beside Elpam, here by this strange tower, in a completely different world!
In my shock at arriving here -- and to see one our most esteemed Versalians here in a strange new world on Versalmas! -- I almost forgot to give him his present!  Hoy, that would have been a first -- an undelivered gift!  Elpam was just as surprised to see me here -- why, he almost fell down from his perch on that metal tower!  <chuckles> It was a pleasant surprise though, I assume!

#b#L0#I'm sure...#l#k

After giving Elpam his gift, which he was happy to receive, I asked him for more information about where "here" was. He told me that this place is called the "Maple World," a place I had only heard about in Versalian legend!  In these tales, it's said that the sun shines in this world everyday!  When Elpam told me that this was actually true, I almost fell over!  And you can imagine how hard that would be to do given my size! <chuckles> I never thought the legends to be true!
Even now, I can hardly believe it!  The welcome sight of an eternal sun swells my chest with happiness! At first, I was at a lost to be in a different world, but I've realized that this also makes the Maple World a perfect place for Versalmas!

#b#L0#A perfect place for Versalmas?  Um... why is that?#l#k

Because Versalmas is a celebration of the Sun!  You see, in Versal, it is perpetually dark... I believe that you have "night" here as well.  Well, it is night all the time in Versal.  But once a year, our sun comes back... for 30 glorious days straight, which we call the "30 Days of Delight"!  Versalmas Day is the first of these days, and each day after, while the sun shines, we celebrate Versalmas.  Each day of Versalmas, everyone, not just the young, receive gifts from their loved ones. So you see, because the sun shines here in the Maple World every day, why then... it's Versalmas here every day!  Hooray!\r\n\r\n#b#L0#Well the gift-giving part sounds a bit like our Maplemas.  Er, have you heard about Maplemas?#l#k

That is what everyone I've met has been telling me!  It does seem that your Maplemas is very similar to our Versalmas.  This is quite exciting to me!  Perhaps we can exchange customs and gifts!

#b#L0#What are the differences?  Do you have different foods and traditions for Versalmas?#l#k
#b#L1#That seems to be the problem.  Do you remember a girl named Suzy?  She asked me to speak with you.#l#k

Ah, I remember speaking with that lovely little child earlier in my walk through this wonderful city--just after I delivered Elpam's gift. She told me about how she loved candy canes, and I told her in turn about our #bSugar-coated Olives#k, which are simply delicious! She seemed very excited about new types of presents and told me all about her #bWishlist#k. My, my, that girl certainly wants quite a few specific things!\r\nSo you say that she needs help to determine whether she should celebrate Versalmas this year?  Hoy, then... would you be kind enough to convey a message to her from me?

Thank you.  I understand that she - and you, for that matter - may be used to your own traditions for the holidays.  But I think there's a place for Versalmas here in the Maple World as well.  Please, come back in a little bit and let me think of something appropriately eloquent to say to her.
I understand that you may think our customs to be strange at first.  But I hope that in time, you will reconsider, and give new customs a chance.  Happy Versalmas!

Food, indeed!  Of course!  What is a holiday without food?  Food is one of the hallmarks of Versalmas tradition, and personally my favorite part!
 Whereas you people here enjoy what you call your "#bMaplemas Ham#k," we have #bSmoked Salmon#k for our traditional dinner, which sounds much more delicious to me!  I hope you get the chance to try some!  And perhaps I will try your ham as well!  There are also a host of other traditional holiday dishes, such as those tasty #bCaramel Onions#k and my favorite, #bSugar-coated Olives#k!  I am happy to say that I have a bag full of these with me which I would be happy to share! The most popular Versalmas gifts are gifts of food!
I have also heard that you decorate a tree with lights and ornamentation.  We do the same!  Only we decorate a #bCactus#k instead.  We Versalians sing many of our songs of praise to the sun as we dance around our #bVersalmas Cactus#k!  And... er, you may have noticed that Versalians are somewhat pale.  Because we're no longer used to the bright sunlight, #bSunblock#k is a popular and useful gift for this holiday as well!
It is so strange how we are from different worlds yet we have similar customs!

I see that you've spoken to Suzy.  How did her decision go?

#b#L0#She wants me to make the choice for her... and I think I like the old traditions the best.  It's Maplemas for me!#l#k
#b#L1#She wants me to make the choice for her, but I think that Versalmas sounds like the more interesting holiday.#l

Well, if you are making a decision for both you and her, then you should be doubly sure.  If you choose Maplemas, I will be counting on you to recover my stolen presents for me.  Once you've decided however, you'll be able to turn in #b30 presents or more to me at a time#k, for even better rewards!  Just a warning though, if you choose Maplemas as your holiday this year, I doubt O-Pongo will allow you to redeem presents with him anymore.\r\nThink on it, and return to me with #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k when you're sure that this is not just the right choice for Suzy, but also the right choice for you as well.  Okay?

I hope you are making the right decision.  Just so you know, if you are celebrating Versalmas this year, you will #enot be allowed to redeem presents with me#n.  I would like every present I lost back in its original condition so every child can receive what they were supposed to receive.  But good luck... I will not fault you for making that choice.  Merry Maplemas!

You're back!  And you've decided to give Little Suzy's Wishlist to me?

#b#L0#Yes! Here's her Wishlist.#l#k
#b#L1#Ummm, sorry, Maple Claws... Let me think about it some more.#l
Excellent!  I'm glad I can count on your help this year.  Let me give you something to commemorate the choice you've made...

Wear the hat proudly, and show off your Maplemas Spirit!  Now you can bring me presents in batches #b30, 40, 60, or 90#k!  Like I said before, you get different rewards at different tiers; and the more presents you bring at one time, the better the rewards!  And if you bring me #b100 presents#k, I'll give you a #bMaplemas Tree#k of your very own!

In addition, let's show O-Pongo the spirit of some friendly competition as well!  For each #b10 presents#k you collect for me, I'll reward you with #b1 Star of Maplemas Spirit#k, in addition to your regular reward. So if you redeem 60 presents, you'll get your reward plus #b6 Stars of Maplemas Spirit#k!  The more presents you return, the more Maplemas Spirit we'll create in this world.

I'll make you a promise: if we create more #bMaplemas Spirit#k than #dVersalmas Cheer#k this year, I'll reward every player who has chosen Maplemas with #ba special reward#k at the event end!  So gather as many of those presents for me, and hold on to those #bStars#k!  Remember, I'm only giving this special reward if we create enough #bMaplemas Spirit#k so work hard!

Hmmm, looks like you're ready join me, but didn't you say you needed to help Suzy make a choice?  I can't be sure that you're sure unless you bring me #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k.  I hope you haven't lost it!
Take your time!  I'll be right here.  But don't wait too long!  Meow!

O-Hoy, again, my young friend!  I see that you've spoken to Suzy.  What did she say?

#b#L0#She asked me to handle her wishlist for her... and sign both of us up for Versalmas celebrations this year!#l#k
#b#L1#Suzy asked me to make the decision for her... and I'm thinking that Maplemas is the right holiday for us Maplers.#l#k

Glad to hear it!  One thing you must realize, before you decide, is that by celebrating Versalmas, you will not be able to celebrate Maplemas as you have done before, nor speak with Maple Claws to finish her quest. You won't be able to change your mind later!\r\nCome back when you're sure, and I'll take #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k from you then! Okay?

Of course, of course!  I completely understand.  Keeping to traditions can be very important!  Please understand though, if you choose to celebrate Maplemas this year, you'll no longer be able to exchange presents you find with me for Versal gifts.  Unfortunately, I only have a limited number of my Versal items so I need to give them out to those who are celebrating Versalmas this year.  But, what is it that you say... oh, right, have a Merry Maplemas then!  But I'll wish you a Happy Versalmas as well!

Back so soon!  And you have Little Suzy's Wishlist for me?

#b#L0#Yes!  Here's her Wishlist.#l#k
#b#L1#Sorry, O-Pongo.  I'd like to think about it a little more.#l#k
O-Hoy!  We're going to have so much fun this holiday!  Oh, I have something for you!  Take this...

Wear this hat proudly; it'll bring Versalmas Cheer to others when they see it!  Now you can bring me presents in batches #b30, 40, 60, or 90!#k  Like I said before, you get different rewards at different tiers; and the more presents you bring at one time, the better the rewards! Please remember that you can only redeem a total of #b100 Presents#k per day.  And if you bring me #b100 presents#k, I'll give you a #bVersalmas Cactus#k of your very own!

In addition, let's show Maple Claws the spirit of some friendly competition as well!  For each #b10 presents#k you collect for me, I'll reward you with #b1 Orb of Versalmas Cheer#k, in addition to your regular reward. So if you redeem 60 presents, you'll get your reward plus #b6 Orbs of Versalmas Cheer#k!  The more presents you return, the more Versalmas Cheer we'll create in this world.  If we create more #dVersalmas Cheer#k than #bMaplemas Spirit#k this year, I promise to reward every player who has chosen Versalmas with something special at the event end!  So find those presents for me, and hold on to those #bOrbs#k!

Hmmm, looks like you're ready join me, but didn't you say you needed to help Suzy make a choice?  I can't be sure that you're sure unless you bring me #bLittle Suzy's Wishlist#k.  I hope you haven't lost it!
Of course, of course!  Thinking can only help you to be sure of your decision.
#b#e#L0#Happy Versalmas, Elpam!#l
Why, thank you!  Happy Versalmas to you, too!
Speaking of Versalmas, I have something for you too. Talk to me again while I get it for you.
Please, take this to celebrate the 30 Days of Delight!  I'm sorry it's not the kind made by the famous Versalian fragrancier, Dr. Ssiws, but it does the trick!
Did you get a chance to speak to O-Pongo and have him tell you the tale of Versalmas?  If not, you should listen to it.

What does the Versalmas tale mean, you ask?  The tale emphasizes strength in times of hardship, and the perseverance to do the right thing, even if all seems lost... and that you will always find others like yourself if you are focused on your goal.  There is a saying in this world, "Coal turns to diamond under pressure." Never facing the pressure means you may never discover your inner nature. This is part of the spirit of Versalmas.
Happy Versalmas, again.  And may your days be bright.

However, I am preparing for another trip around the Maple World and time is running out. So, if you could please gather some of the items I need for my trip, I am willing to teach you how to use the scrolls on unequipped items. Deal?

I bet it will be a useful skill for you. Farewell now, I'm off! I've heard rumors of a mythical creature in the Leafre region...supposedly more powerful than Zakum. I have to see if the rumor is true...

A lot of people have received my challenge, only to give up and leave the island all together. To become a great traveler requires more than just pure strength; it also requires ample amounts of patience and intensity. Now, good luck and I'll see you here!

Good work there. You got me all the items I asked you to get. It must have been difficult for you to gather up those items. I'm very impressed, and I can tell you're destined to become a wonderful traveler even after leaving Maple Island. Here, take this; Hope you put this to good use!
Hey, I don't think you have the right number of items I was looking for. You need to collect #b10 Mushroom Spores, 10 Snail Shells, and 10 Red Snail Shells#k for me!

Thanks. You know, I've just ate, and ... I think I have a stomach ache, and ... I think it'll go away with a nice bottle of cider...
Argh... I'm sick!! My gosh, my stomach is killing me...
Hey, the cider is here!!

Thank you sooo much~~ Ahh, this feels sooo goood! You know, you seem like a really nice person! And... I think I have something to tell you. I... don't have a stomach ache actually; I just really wanted to drink some cider. Sorry~!

Well, actually... I have something else to ask from you... can you help me out once more? Go meet up with Mariwaka, who should be near the movie theater. She told me something a while ago, and... I was too busy to pay attention to her, and I feel really bad about it. She's my best friend, you know... can you help me?

...are you here on behalf of Grako...?

I heard that #bMarikawa#k is in need of urgent help!! Perhaps you can help her out if you are not too busy~ Please go see her!

Anyway, since you're here and all, I would appreciate it if you take some time to listen to my story. One day, I was walking around the back alley when, out of the blue, a creepy individual crept up to me and stole my purse! I reported it to the police, but I don't think they've found it yet. You'll see a man in front of the police station, and his name is Popo. Can you ask him about the purse for me? I can't go right now because I'm in the middle of work.
Thanks~ I'll be counting on you!
Hmmm...you know... it's getting really windy here.

Ah, you must be talking about Mariwaka's purse. Well... that actually has parlayed into something much bigger, and ... other cases have come up. The backalley thugs have been running rampant, and I've been so busy that I feel like asking anyone for a backup. Please tell Mariwaka to wait a little bit more. Now, if you can excuse me...

What? Still?? Oh my gosh, what am I supposed to do now? I need to find it ASAP! Oh... oh yeah! YOU can help me find it! Don't worry, I'll reward you handsomely if you find it for me. Right... I got it stolem by the thugs in the back alley carrying a gun. You might find it if you teach them a lesson or two. What do you think? Will you help me?
I'll be here waiting. That purse is very important to me.
What? You got my hopes up, and this? I don't like people like you. Get away from me. Now.
Did you find my purse?
Oh wow! This is it! Thank you so much! This is my way of saying thanks, so please take it!
You haven't found it yet? Please find it!~~~! Man, this is really annoying~~! Argggh!!
This kitty is covered with scars, and it must be hungry. Should I feed this kitty some pet food?
I heard there's some food for pets only. Can you give me some, too?
The scarred kitty is looking up here with apprehension, but ... it looks way too exhausted to even move.
I'm so hungry that I feel like I'm too weak to even move anymore. I need something to... eat... right... now...

Wow! Thank you so much! There's actually a person with warmth and compassion around here... hmmm? Are you surprised a cat like me speaks in human language? Meow! I know, I know, I must be the "MONSTER CAT"! Do you think I like being different? Why does no one just leave me alone!! Meow!! But then again, you helped me. I owe you one, meow! If you ever run into a tight situation, I'll be more than happy to help you out!
The scarred kitty is looking up here with apprehension, but ... it looks way too exhausted to even move.

My father works in a city, and comes home very rarely as a result. It's good that he brings something nice every time he comes home, but...one time, he gave me this beautiful Orange Marble, and I LOST IT to some cat! What am I supposed to do? I consider it an heirloom, and... arrgh! Please help me! Help me get that marble back!
Thanks~! I'll be counting on you!
I'm sorry I asked for something difficult from you. I understand you must be busy... but hey, if you ever find some time, can you please help me out? Thanks~
Hey, you look pretty strong... please help me find my lost jewelry~!
Thank you soooooo much! Did you get scratched up by those menacing cats? What? The cat spoke to you? Whatever... I know I may look young, but I'm a little smarter than that! I don't believe you!
Did you find my marble yet? You know it is important to me~!
Hoo~~~~! Meow~! Meow~!
Hoo~!
Meow~!

Did something happen? Meow~ That's the Boss Kitty you're talking about, meow~ The Boss probably tried to say something to you, meow~ Maybe I should teach you some kitty language~ But remember, even kitty language has dialects, and you may only communicate with the kitties in this town, okay? Meow!
Don't you need to speak to Kitty first to learn the Kitty language?
Hoo~~~~! Meow meow~! Meow~!
Hmmm...? Hey... do you, by any chance, understand the words that are coming out of my mouth?
What does a human like you want from me? Get out of here unless you got something to say!

I like pretty objects, the ones that sparkle, because they do not turn their backs on me like humans did. I admit, what I did was stealing, and if the owner wants it back, then I'll have to return it, but you know what? I've been abused by humans for so long, as are all the kitties here. That's why, I don't feel like just giving away the item for free. We'll do it like this, then. I'll give you the questions, and you answer them all. If you answer them all right, then the Orange Marble is yours. Remember, these questions aren't for free~. You will need to get me #b300 fried chickens#k first to start the quiz. Each time you get it wrong, it will cost you #b300 fried chickens#k to start again.
Alright, are you ready to answer the questions?
Well, if you aren't ready, then there's nothing I can do about it~ Come back when you are ready.
Yay, you're back!
Thank you soooooo much! Did you get scratched up by those menacing cats? What? The cat spoke to you? Whatever... I know I may look young, but I'm a little smarter than that! I don't believe you!
Sniff sniff... what should I do? Where's my Orange Marble?
Are you ready to ace the quiz?

You've heard of some amazing people that have the ability to invigorate the hidden powers that are laying dormant within yourself, right? Well, I can do that! Anyway, can I help you? Wow...this... this is THE Zakum Armor! Hey, this... doesn't seem very powerful though. What? The armor got weakened after loosening up the spell? Hahaha... I can fix that, but once I invigorate the dormant force, the level of the equipment shall also rise accordingly. Are you sure you want to do it?

The place where the force can be harnessed is a forest where the beautiful lady sleeps; that's where you must defeat #b20 #o5300100##ks and #b20 #o6230100#s#k within 5 minutes. I will pray during that period to assist you.  If you fall down during the attack, then you'll have to return to the spot of origin. By the way, this'll cost you 60,000 mesos. Do you want to do it?

You think 60,000 mesos is too expensive? Really? The cost of using the facility will be 50,000 mesos, and 10,000 mesos for other security expenses, so that's the bottom line. What do you think? If you want to take a crack at it, then bring me 60,000 mesos. Then, and only then, will I take you to the forest where the beautiful lady sleeps.
Did you go to the forest where the beautiful lady sleeps? You'll have to defeat the monsters that I told you to get!

Greaaaat job! Now, I'm going to try to reawaken the Zakum Armor. If you decide to quit this right now, then you'll have to start from scratch back at the Forest Where the Beautiful Lady Sleeps. What do you want to do? I better get this started! Hahhhhh!!!! See? Did you see it? Here, look at it again!
Hmmm... I don't think you defeated all the monsters I asked you to get.
Sakura must be still crying. Go see what's up with her.
Sniff... sniff...
Would you please sit down and listen to my story?

Now that you've mastered the Kitty Language, go up to the Boss Kitty and start up a conversation with it.
Alright, good luck~!

Hi, you must be a first-timer here~! Would you like to participate in a Shopping Quiz?

First, before you start solving the questions, it'll be best for you to experience the Cash Shop firsthand. As long as you keep your composure and answer these questions with a steady hand, you'll be fine. The Beginner's Shopping Guide can be purchased at the Cash Shop for 1 meso, so go get your copy now! Can you expand your item inventory at the Cash Shop?

#L0##bYeah, of course#l

#L0##bYeah! #l

Memo #v05090000# can be sold according to the number of uses, what is not the number of bundles sold in the cash shop?

#L0##bOnce#l
#L1#11 times#l
#L2#35 times#k#l
Excellent ! I'm impressed!
I think without the 1-time-use ones, it'll be difficult to use it. Check the Cash Shop again.

Amazing! You answered this without any hesitation whatsoever! Based on the resounding success solving the quiz, you should have no trouble navigating your way around Cash Shop. Here's a reward for the job well done. Choose the one to your liking.

Hey, who told you to blurt out the answer like that? Please think before answering these questions.
This question is in regards to the Comfy Pillow. You didn't get mixed up with some other item, did you?
I was just reminiscing about the good old days, and decided to look at the newspaper, only to find the clipping I saved was missing. Can you help me find it?
It's a newspaper clipping, and apparently the kids in this neighborhood made a paper hat out of it. The problem is, the kids don't remember where the hat is right now...
Say, can you help me find the #b#t1002418##k?

Ohh, brilliant! This... this is the best one right here! Of course, the BEST cartoon ever is "The Diary of the Snails," published daily on Maple Times.
Yes, yes, you seem tired from all that work you had to go through to get this. Here's a reward for your hard work. This should help you immensely on your journey.
You haven't found #b#t1002418##k yet. I'm counting on you.
The prices on vegetables have been skyrocketing lately, and I don't like it one bit! Don't you think it's not right?

There's been a sudden increase of menacing animals around here, especially the #b#o8140500#s#k that have been causing great havoc. Please eliminate them for me. I'm not sure what's going on--I once thought that there was a band of raccoons that seemed to be the ringleaders, but I haven't seem them for quite some time...ever since this strange evil aura appeared in the middle of the night. It was gone by the morning, but I wondered if that has anything to do with the strange occurrences here...
As a sign of proof, please get me #b200 #t4000080#s#k.

That was fast~! They were so strong that everyone had trouble with them. Thank you so much! Hope you like this as a reward!
I don't think you have collected #b#t4000080##k, yet. Keep trying.
Hey, there! Listen up, there's going to be a movie starring me in the works, but we ran into a slight problem. Care to listen?
Well, it is an action flick, and unfortunately, the other lead actor got injured while filming. We're currently looking for someone young who can pull off some stunts.
And it looks like you fit the bill. Would you like to star opposite me in a movie?
But of course, you'll first need to be auditioned. No no no, don't get so nervous. Defeat #b10 #o9400110#s#k and #b10 #o9400111#s#k. The main point for your role is someone that can FIGHT. Good luck!
I can't believe you're giving up the chance to actually star in a movie. You won't be offered an opportunity like this anywhere else, so think carefully.
Hey, not bad disposing those monsters with your incredible skills. You may have what it takes to be a star! I'll recommend you to my director, and I suggest you meet him soon~.
Your audition will consist of defeating 10 each of #b#o9400110##k and #b#o9400111##k. Good luck!
Oh~ You're the one Mariwaka was talking about. We don't need to discuss this any further; let's get straight to the final audition.
This is a blockbuster action flick that features two main characters bravely taking on the Mushmom that's harassing the citizens of Henesys, and kill it. Isn't that cool?
I've decided not to use stunt double for this flick, making it a fast, thrilling action flick for everyone to enjoy.
You know what I'm talking about, right? Alright, the final audition is... defeat the king of Henesys, Mushmom. Okay? Action!
Hey, what do you think you're doing? You're talking about starring in a movie by the world-renowned Furano.
Once you're featured in my movie, your path to superstardom is pretty much clear. You must be cuckoo to reject that opportunity!
Well, you may not be ready to take on the Mushmom right now, so if you change your mind, talk to me.

Hahaha, you don't need to hurry. I got the footage already! This wasn't an audition; I filmed it all for the movie, and it's in the can now! You were absolutely fantastic--the skill, speed! It was an honor to film it. Don't worry, you'll be credited as 'J.Doe', doesn't that sound great? You'll be a big star!
Thanks to your help, this is going to be a fantastic movie. Yes, yes, yes, here's your movie guarantee. The movie should be out soon, so wish us luck!
Hey! I don't think you've killed #b#o6130101##k yet. You can't be in a movie like THAT!  *shakes head* No special effects, no sale!
So you've sent Maria the letter. Thank you. Actually, the letter Maria wrote reads something like this.

Recently there's been a sudden increase of snails around town. At first, none of us worried about them, until they started destroying our farms here and there. At this pace, we may have a big problem when we start harvesting. Any ideas? - Maria
So, on the letter I wrote for her, I wrote this.
I just found a great solution to this matter. Don't worry. - Lucas
Hmm... you look like someone who's dying to know what that plan is.
The master plan I have is this. I think it's a great idea.

It's the story of a soon-to-be-legendary traveler who decides to save Amherst from its troubles and leaves the town a savior! The people in town will benefit greatly from your work, and your reputation will be flawless. What do you think? Isn't that a great idea?
That's right! I hope you can go around Amherst and defeat #r5 each#k of #o100100#, #o100101#, and #o130101#. Thank you.
Really? That's not good. There's a lot of helpful tips you may need for your journey down the road that will be available with this job. What a shame...
Let me check and see how well you've done your job.

That's great. You've just taken the first step towards becoming a legendary adventurer. This is a reward for your job well done. This is the worker glove I wore while growing vegetables in the farm during my days as a traveler myself.
In order to become a legendary adventurer, you'll need to do things left and right! Keep working!

Oh no! I can't win this battle with a pencil that has a round tip like this! I can't take the recess tomorrow and not play the War of Pang Pang! I need to sharpen my pencil in order to win this game, and...\r\n#b#L0#My goodness, you're loud! What's the War of Pang Pang anyway? #l\r\n#L1#Why don't you sharpen the pencil yourself?#k#l

You want to know what the War of Pang Pang is about, right? It's a game that consists of two players. What you'll need to bring are ... a piece of paper and a pencil.
The rules are very simple! The two players will draw a dot on the paper. That'll be your area. Then, the game begins.
On top of that dot, place your pencil perpendicular to the paper, and place your index finger gently on top of the back of the pencil. 
Slide that finger down, and the pencil will draw a line as a result. 
That represents the bullet that left your area!

Thank you so much! In order for this to fly farther, the pencil HAS to be sharp! Well, the thing is... I can sharpen the pencil alright, but I need to sharpen it... so it looks good ...\nand to do that, I'll need #b#t04000110##k. \nPlease bring me #b30 #t04000110#s#k.
I may lose tomorrow in the great War of Pang Pang. If you ever change your mind, please let me know.
I may lose tomorrow in the great War of Pang Pang. If you ever change your mind, please let me know.
Did you? Did you? Did you bring \n#b#t04000110##k with you?
Thank you so much. This'll help me win my battle tomorrow. Time to sharpen up my pencil! \nI'll give you this. It's my lunch for today!
Hmm.. you don't have enough. Check and see if you have all of them. I need #b30 #t04000110#s#k!
I know it's a sin to look sooo beautiful. It's obvious why men can't take their eyes off me~!

But there are times where I'm afraid, very afraid, terribly afraid. I'm afraid of getting old, to the point where I may not look so stunningly beautiful anymore. Then, and only then, will no one look at me. Arrrrghh, I can't imagine what that feels like.
And I keep thinking about it. I keep thinking, is there a way where I can stop this aging process once and for all? I know it's impossible, but it's something all women think of at all times.

But you know? I heard of a rumor floating around the other day, the rumor that states that there's a pot that exclusively stores eternal youth. If only I can get my hands on it... hey, there. Can I ask you for a favor? Can you help me, for the sake of my beautiful face?

Hahah, I know you want to see me this beautiful at all times. That's a good decision. Thanks. I want to find out if the rumors are true, so please gather up #b50 #t04000149#s#k from #b#o8142000##k for me. Please~
Why are you like this? Can you tell me about it?
Hey, did you bring the potion?
So this is #b#t04000149##k!\nGreat job! This will enable me to be the leading actress forever... hahaha! Here, take this. It's my way of saying thanks.
Hey, the number's not right! Are you making ME count these more than once? I'm disappointed in you. Do it again!

Thank you so much for your work the other day. Thanks to you, I feel much healthier than ever, and I owe you a whole lot fo r this. \nActually... I have something to discuss with you today. I haven't found anyone willing to discuss something big like this, so ... will you be my friend and listen to my story? I know that you'll keep this a secret.
Please look.\n (Maya slowly moves around, and looks at the bottom of the bed.)\n (Below is a little kitty, huffing and puffing for breath. It's also badly scarred. This kitty is...)

It's the baby Lioner. \nSurprised? Yeah, I know ... it's a baby and all, but it's a monster nonetheless. I was on my way to dig out some herbs when I found it crawled up in between the rocks. I know it's a monster, but ... I couldn't just walk by and ignore it. I know how that feels like...

This is my plea to you. Please save this poor baby. If the people ever find out I'm nursing this, I may not be able to live here anymore.\nThat's alright, though. Please help.\nYou're the only one I can ask for something like this.
Thank you so much. You're such a nice person. Please save these two babies. \nFirst, we'll need to sanitize the wounds, and to do that I'll need a whole lot of #b#t02050003##k.
I can't leave these babies by themselves, so can you get me #b50 #t02050003#s#k, #b20 #t04000086#s#k with #b#t02050003##k on, and #b20 #t04000023#s#k to settle the wounds. Thank you.
Really? I see. I can see how this may be a distraction to you. I do not want to put you in jeopardy. Just forget about it. I'll do what I can here.
Thank you so much. I'll sanitize the wounds immediately.
（After putting #b#t02050003##k on #b#t04000086##k, Maya proceeded to apply this to the wounds where it'd no doubt sting. Baby Lioner screamed in agony.）
Oh no, I'm sorry. Please hold on.\nIf I don't sanitize the area, the wounds will be infected... \nYou're a boy, right? Don't cry then~.\m (Maya talks to it as if it's a human baby)
Okay, the wound is cleaned up. This should make sure the wound doesn't get infected.
I don't think you have enough to sanitize the wounds. Since the wound is very deep, I'll need #b50 #t02050003#s#k, #b20 #t04000086#s#k, and #b20 #t04000023#s#k.
Oh no, we've stopped the bleeding, but it's breathing very heavily. Hmm... it's getting worse though... \nMaybe...

Oh nooo!!! This baby Lioner is poisoned. It must be the poisonous herb I plucked out along with the actual medicinal herbs, and it may have infected the wound. That poison is so atypical, I'll need a combination of medicines in order to detox her.
I'll bring out the apparatus that'll help me combine items, so please get me the ingredients for the medicine. \n (Baby Lioner is breathing heavily and looking at this direction)
Thank you so much. In order to make the detox medicine, I'll need #b50 #t02050000#s#k, #b30 #t04000076#s#k, and #b30 \n#t04000058##k. Thank you.
You're the only one I can trust. Once this matter is resolved, I'll definitely reward you well for this, so please, help us.
Did you gather up the medicine ingredients?
(Maya gathered up the medicine and fed it to baby Lioner) \nSoon, it'll fall asleep. It may have a tough time while sleeping, but it'll be completely detoxed by tomorrow morning.
I don't think you have enough. It's a very rare poison, so it requires #b50 #t02050000##ks, #b30 #t04000076#s#k, and #b30 #t04000058#s#kto detox it.

All it needs now is to regain some strength. \nWe need to feed the baby with some food that'll surely energize it. From what I know... Lioners love fishes, but not just a regular fish, but a fresh one at that. I just don't know where I'll find them, though. It'll also look fishy if you buy a whole bunch from the fish merchant. What should I do?

Oh...oh yeah! #b#o5400000##k! I heard #b#o5400000##k only eats the freshest of the fresh fishes, too. Please get me the fishes that #b#o5400000##k caught. \n (Baby Lioner is slowly waking up, moving ever so slowly.)
Thank you. I see ... well, it may be really small, but there's no telling how much it can eat, so please gather up #b100 \n#t4000088#s#k for me.
You're the only person I can count on. Once this is taken care of, I'll surely reward you for your great deeds. Please help us.
How was it? Did you catch a lot of #b#t4000088##k?

Thank you. Look! The poison is nowhere to be found, and it can actually stand up now. Here, Lionel, a fish that's just been caught. (Eventhough the baby Lioner staggers to the food, once it got there, it started chowing down like no tomorrow.)
Phew. I can finally rest for a little bit. Ah, Lionel is a combination of Lioner and Lionella, a good friend of mine. Isn't it cute?

I'll be taking care of it for the time being. Lionel would also love to meet you, seeing that you're the lifesaver. Please drop by here ever so often. \nI can't thank you enough for saving Lionel's life. This is from the bottom of my heart. Please take it.
This baby may eat more than you think. Please gather up #b100 #t4000088#s#k.
Hi there. Don't worry. I won't forget all you've done for me. \nLook, look at Lionel! The baby's cured!\nHahah, look at Lionel nuzzling against your legs! Lionel must really like you!

It really is one quiet, subdued baby, to the point where I can't imagine it being a monster. I'd love to be with it until the end, but I know that's not going to happen. I plan on freeing Lionel once it is fully healthy. The problem is that, until I do so, I HAVE to keep it inside this house. I know it's not right to keep it indoors at all times, but... no one else better recognize what's in here. Lionel may not come out here alive if that happens.

Oh yeah! \nIf we disguise it to where it doesn't look like a monster, by dressing it up with... a necklace! It'll make Lionel look like a housecat. \nLook! It's so small and adorable. I think it's a great idea! Let's make a necklace for Lionel!
...but, if I buy it here, I'll attract unwanted attention anyway. But...if I ask Teo of Lith Harbor for a little favor, he'll do it for me. Can you ask him for me?
Thank you so much. Please say hi to Teo for me.
I see. If you ever change your mind, please talk to me.
Hey there, long time! \nWhat? What did Maya do? Is she sick again?

Since everything will be handmade, I can only make one per hour for you. Please remember that.
Now. would you like to make a chocolate for that special someone? Or even for yourself?

If you gather up the ingredients for the chocolate along with the packaging materials, I'll put the chocolate in a beautiful heart-shaped box and cast a special spell of love on it. That spell will protect the owner of the chocolate. Oh, and since you made it, I'll inscribe your name onto it.

#t04031110# and #t04031109# can be found through monsters. I just need #r1 of each#k. As for #t04031111# and #t04031112#, you can buy those through #bCoco#k. I'll make it for a loooooow price of #r1,000 mesos#k, so please gather them up quickly!
Hey, please remember that I only make these for the Valentine's season so gather these items quickly. Good luck!

Valentine's Day is coming, and love is in the air~ So what do you think of the Heart Chocolate that I made for you? With it, you won't lose any EXP even after dying in the middle of the battle. This item is used up when you die and goes bad in 3 days, so make sure to put it to good use! Got that?

And who's the man that brought you that tasty treat? Me, the #bAce of Hearts#k!! Well, this time, with my magic touch, I can actually extend the expiration date for that chocolate. Would you like to gather up the necessary materials for it?

Just follow my lead, and you'll be fine. What I do is ... I'll first wrap up the chocolate in two layers, and I'll package it up nicely to make sure it doesn't spill. To do all that, though, requires a number of extra materials.

First I'll need #b1 #t4140100##k. You have it with you, right? Then, in order to wrap it up in two layers, I'll need #b1 #t4031110##k and #b1 #t4031109##k. Of course, with the enhanced power of love on the chocolate, the packaging will also have to be different. You'll need to buy #b1 #t4031113##k and #b1 #t4031114##k through #bCoco#k, who's next to me.

Oh no ~ I extend the life of #b#t4140100##k once per person, and you said no to it! It's hard to get a deal better than this... oh well, if you decide to change your mind, then please see me before Valentine's.
So you HAVE gathered up the necessary ingredients for #t4140200#, right...? This time, it'll require a lot more of my work, so I'll need #b2,500 mesos#k to make it. Do you still want it?

Tada! Isn't it pretty? Take a look! #bYour name#k is inscribed on #t4140200#. This will protect the owner of #t4140200# for #b5 days#k. Oh, and I also made a chocolate out of leftovers, so please take it. Have a lovely Valentine's Day with your special someone!
Hmm? Are you sure you're not lacking any materials or mesos? Please check and see if you have all the items I asked you to get.#l
bob
bob
bob
bob
bob
Hey! Nice to see you on this hot summer day. Makes me want to snag something to drink. Think you can help me out with a little barbecue?

Enthusiasm! Always good to see. Well, I'm preparing a barbecue for some of friends and we're running low on ingredients. It starts pretty soon, so I'll need you to gather #b10 #t4031664#s (#i4031664#), 10 #t4031665#s (#i4031665#) and 10 #t4031666# (#i4031666#)#k, after that I can finish the barbecue! Thanks a bunch. I'll be waiting!
Er, Maple BBQ isn't exactly animal meat if you are in any case vegetarian, but I understand. Come back if you change your mind!
Fantastic! Everything's here. I'll be able to whip some mighty fine barbecue now! I've got some serious cooking to do. Now just give me a minute...

Yes, I'm done cooking! This BBQ turned out to be just right! Here, take one of these BBQs I cooked with the ingredients you gave. It's still hot, so be careful with it! Oh, and this hat is a gift of my thanks to your help.
Looks like you haven't got all the ingredients yet, champ! Get going!
Easter is upon us. To celebrate, I'll be crafting Easter Baskets for everyone. Do you want one?
Good choice. Can you bring me #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k?
I see. I make the best baskets in town, so if you change your mind, I'll be here.
Great job gathering up #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k needed to make the #rEaster Basket#k. Now let me see here...
Here's your #rEaster Basket#k! By the way, I hear that the Easter Bunny's nasty cousin is trying to ruin Easter this year. Avoid that rotten egg. He is a disgrace to the season~
Are you are missing something? I need #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k to make an #rEaster Basket#k.

Yeah, you heard me right, I hate Easter. I come from a long line of Easter Bunnys, but I'm not down with all that painting and scavenger hunting nonsense.\r\nDon't get me wrong. I did my time at Easter Bunny School, but they told me I don't have painting skills. I got skillz... graffiti skillz that is!

Besides, you think I want to walk around all night climbing trees and looking for bushes to bury some boiled eggs? Guess again, jack. You should join my crew and help take down Easter. If you're down to help, I'll hook you up.

Good. My cousin is an Easter Bunny and he's been planting eggs all week long. What's worse is that his buddy has been giving away Easter Baskets. Get me #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k and I'll give you something worth your while!
You just wasted my breath. Get lost!
I see that you have the #bEaster Basket#k and the #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k like I asked you to get. I'm sure it was a piece of cake for you to get all those.
My posse and I will be putting these to good use, if you know what I mean. Oh yeah...I always pay my debts on time. Talk to me later and we'll do it again.
You trying to scam me! I need #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k! Remember the plan...

Yeah, you heard me right, I hate Easter. I come from a long line of Easter Bunny's, but I'm not down with all that painting and scavenger hunting nonsense.\r\nDon't get me wrong. I did my time at Easter Bunny School, but they told me I don't have painting skills. I got skillz... graffiti skillz that is!

Besides, you think I want to walk around all night climbing trees and looking for bushes to plant some stupid boiled eggs. Hells no! You should join my crew and take down Easter. If you do, I'll hook you up.

Good. My cousin is an Easter Bunny and he's been planting eggs all week long. What's worse is that his buddy has been giving away Easter Baskets. Get me #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k and I'll give you something worth your while!
You just wasted my breath. Get lost!
I see that you have the #bEaster Basket#k and the #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k like I asked you to get. I'm sure it was a piece of cake for you to get all those.
My posse and I will be putting these to good use, if you know what I mean. Oh yeah... I always pay my debts on time. Talk to me later and we'll do it again.
You trying to scam me? I need #b10 Green Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k! Remember the plan...
Wow, that was pretty fast! Aren't you ready to open up your present?
Tada~ Here's your present! Hope you like what you see in it!! Thank you so much for helping us celebrate MapleStory's first birthday!
I don't think you have the #bRED Birthday Present#k yet. Please bring it to me, so I can help you open it!
MapleStory is nearing its very first birthday, and we're going to celebrate it in style! I have a new, anniversary-related quest for you. Would you like to do it?
Here's the deal~ Please bring a #bRED birthday present#k to me, and I'll help you open it. Deal? I'll see you later~
I see~ Please remember that this event ends soon, so if you want to take a crack at it later, then please talk to me!
Oh my goodness, you really did bring all #b10 of the Birthday Candles#k that I asked you to get! Nicely done!!

Thanks a whole bunch for your help!! Phew, I could have gotten chewed out by my boss for this. Anyway, here's something for you. Hope you like it! Well, I'm off to tha par-tay, so I'll see you later! Happy Mapling!
I don't think you have the #b10 Birthday Candles#k that I asked you to get. The party is going to start soon, and I'll need those #bBirthday Candles#k fast! Please hurry!!

Hey, what's going on? Can you believe it? MapleStory is nearing its very first birthday!!! It's all thanks to great Maplers like you! Well, anyway, we plan on having a big party among the MapleStory staff, and I need your help, big time. Can you help me out?

Thanks! Well, we have the cake, the food, and everything else needed for a grand party, but I forgot to buy something very important: #bCANDLES#k!! I mean, what's a birthday party without the candles on the cake, you know? We'll need #b10 Birthday Candles#k for the party, so please get them for me fast. I'll be here waiting for you. Good luck!
Oh, I see... that's alright. You must be busy with your other quests. But if you ever have a spare time, then please help me out here!! I'll be here waiting for you...
MapleStory is nearing its very first birthday, and we're going to celebrate it in style! I have a new, anniversary-related quest for you. Would you like to do it?
Here's the deal~ Please bring a #bBLUE Birthday Present#k to me, and I'll help you open it. Deal? I'll see you later~
I see~ Please remember that this event ends soon, so if you want to take a crack at it later, then please talk to me!
Wow, that was pretty fast! Aren't you ready to open up your present?
Tada~ Here's your present! Hope you like what you see in it!! Thank you so much for helping us celebrate MapleStory's first birthday!
I don't think you have the #bBLUE Birthday Present #kyet. Please bring it to me, so I can help you open it!

Hi there! I'm preparing a small #rBarbecue Party#k for the upcoming #rIntendance Day#k. But I just found out that I have no meats, no woods, and just nothing but this homemade Barbecue sauce!  Could you lend me a hand and get me some cooking materials for me?

Great, thank you!  Just get me #b50 Pigs' heads, 50 Tree Branches, 50 Leathers#k. I think that will be enough to cover this small party for #rIndependence Day#k. Don't worry.  I'll reward you handsomely for your effort.
Too bad... I guess we'll have to party without you. If you ever change your mind, come back. I'll be here for a while longer.
Thank you! For your hard work, I shall give you a hat to celebrate Independence Day and some delicious homemade Barbecue to stuff your stomach.

Did you like the hat I gave you? It's an item specially made to celebrate Independence Day! And the Barbecue that we made with the ingredients you gave us turned out to be GREAT! Hope you enjoy celebrating Independence Day.
You don't have everything I asked for. Please get me #b50 Pigs' heads, 50 Tree Branches, 50 Leathers#k and hurry before we run out of time.
Good Lord! Aliens are striking us harder than ever! Hey! Would you be interested to fight aliens for the independence of our world?

Just as I thought! I knew you'd be the one to help us out. There was a tremendous invasion of #rPlateons#k somewhere around Boswell Fields. Terminate the ugly suckers and bring back #b100 Plateon Helmets#k to me as a proof of your work. I better not find you hiding in a hole!
Oh... If you are scared, I guess we have to take care of this by ourselves. However, if you can get those nerves under control, come talk to me again.
You made it! Now I know we can win this battle! As token of our gratitude, we shall award you with #bthe Stars and Stripes#k. Good work soldier!
How do you like the Stars and Stripes? It is a flag specially designed to commemorate this Independence Day!
Boswell Fields are still suffering from the invasion of Plateons. Take them out!

Hello, my name is #p2060000#. You must be a traveler of some sort, for you to make your way all the way down to this remote island. I live here, raising huskies. These boys are my family, and they're also my closest friends. I heard it's hot out there. I haven't experienced summer in a long time, so this year, I made an item that'll let myself and others enjoy the dog days of the summer, hahaha. Say, would you like one?

I knew you'd say yes. It's a nifty chair, indeed. It'll allow you to relax pretty much wherever you go. Please wait now as I make the chair that should contour to your body. Check back with me after a few minutes.
I see. The summer ends sooner than you may think, and I will not make this chair after the summer. If you decide to change your mind, then just look for me and my huskies.
Hey, welcome back. You came back sooner than I thought. Do you want to take a look?
This chair can come very handy for you. If you're low on HP and MP, sit on this chair wherever you are, and just relax. Your HP and MP will be back up in no time! Hope you have a safe summer! Peace!
Hello there! You look like you've been out on a few adventures! I'm in dire need of some high-quality Turkey Eggs for a Thanksgiving breakfast I'm cooking. Do you have any Yellow eggs for me?

I'm in dire need of some high-quality Turkey Eggs for a Thanksgiving breakfast I'm cooking. Will you gather some #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k for me? Yellow Turkey Eggs can be obtained from tamed turkeys. Good luck!
Oh, ok.  Be sure to come back, because I won't wait forever to get my eggs!
Excellent work! That is a fine Turkey egg you've got...in return, let me dig around in the backpack here...I think I do have something here for you...
Take this and I hope it helps out in your travels! Thank you! Find me more eggs and I'll reward you!
Hmm, looks like your bag has some lint, but no #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k! Collect some #bYellow Turkey Eggs#k and I'll make it worth your while!
Hello there! You look like you've been out on a few adventures! I'm in dire need of some high-quality Turkey Eggs for a Thanksgiving breakfast I'm cooking. Do you have any Green eggs for me?
I'm in dire need of some high-quality Turkey Eggs for a Thanksgiving breakfast I'm cooking. Will you gather some #bGreen Turkey Eggs#k for me?
Oh, ok.  Be sure to come back, because I won't wait forever to get my eggs!
Excellent work! That is a fine Turkey eggs you've got...in return, let me dig around in the backpack here...I think I do have something here for you...!
Take this and I hope it helps out in your travels! Thank you! Find me more eggs and I'll reward you!
Hmm, looks like your bag has some lint, but no #bGreen Turkey Eggs#k! Collect some #bGreen Turkey Eggs#k and I'll make it worth your while!
Fantastic! This looks like enough to make the pie. As promised, here is a reward for your kindness. Don't let it get cold, eat up!
Thanks for your help! There's also a contest to see which guild can gather the most Pumpkin Pies. Check Nexon.net for details and come back soon!
I don't think you have everything yet. Trying to fool an old woman? I've been your age, but you've never been mine. Remember, I need #bPie Crust, Pumpkin, Flour, and Sugar#k! Get going!
My, you look like a fine young spirit! Care to help me out?

Great! I'm trying to make some pie, but those pesky monsters stole my ingredients! I'm sure gathering them will be no problem for a seasoned adventurer like yourself! I'll need #bPie Crust, Pumpkin, Flour, and Sugar#k. Bring them back to me, and I'll give you something that'll fix you right up!
Darn, I was hoping you'd help! Oh well, come back and see me soon!
Greetings, traveler. My name is Hannah and I'm currently organizing a Festival of Lights for the Holidays. If you could help me out, I'd greatly appreciate it!

Excellent. I'd like to build an altar for the festival, so we'll need 25 Altar Pieces. Some others attempted to help me, but their axes got stuck in the wood. Fighting those monsters should give you the needed pieces. Thank you and hurry back!
Truly a shame, I suppose that I will have to find another good soul to assist me...Fare thee well!
Wonderful! These should be enough pieces to build the Altar. Thanks for your help! I've got one other thing for you when you get a chance...
Ok, I'll start building the Altar. In the meantime, I'll need you to gather 9 Sabbath Candles so we can officially start the festival. They can be found on those strange horned mushroom creatures.
Oh my, it looks like you don't have enough pieces to build the altar yet. Be sure to hurry back when you do!
I'll start building the Altar. In the meantime, I'll need you to gather 9 Sabbath Candles so we can officially start the festival. If you could help me out, I'd greatly appreciate it!
Glad to hear it. Ok, They can be found on those strange horned mushroom creatures. Come back here when you've got 9!
Alright. I still need your help, though, so be sure to come back!
Great job! I think these candles will be enough to being the Festival of Lights! Thanks for your hard work, please take this present as a token of my appreciation.
Thanks again! If you want to open this present box, then would you like me to help you open up the present?
Ah, you've returned...with not enough candles, I see. I'll need 9 to start the Festival. See you when you get them!
Hiya... think you can help an old man with building a Graham Cracker house?

Thank you, kindly. My name is Mr. Kit Kat, I worked long and hard to find the perfect spot for my graham cracker house. Only the monsters keep eating all the pieces! I put one up and they steal it when my back is turned to eat it! They even laugh at me! I've had it. I need you to get 50 Graham Cracker Pieces and bring them back to me. Good luck!
Hey! Hands off! If you don't want to help, fine-but you can't eat them too!
All 50? Great! Now I can build my house! I'd like to thank you by offering you a little something I made for you. It's my special Banana Graham pie. Use it wisely and thanks again!
Now I can build my house! Use it wisely and thanks again!
Got em all yet? No... don't think so-get a move on! In my heyday I would've been done by now!
Hey there. I want to thank you for all your help with delivering those presents. Since we're coming up on New Year's, I'd like you to take this present.
My pleasure. Happy New Year!
Heh, not really, but I can understand. Please come back when you want your gift.
This is for you.
Come back when you are ready to receive your gift.
Hey there. I want to thank you for all your help with delivering those presents. Would you like me to open your present?
Alright, let's open the present!
I understand. Come back when you are ready to receive your gift.
Here they are. Do you like what you see?
I sincerely hope this year becomes your best year ever! Happy New Year, from MapleStory
No one knows what's inside this Hanukkah Present Box. Would you like to find out for yourself?
I shall open the box for you. You will be blessed with an item that should fit your need.
You shall know that this box has an expiration date, and it should be opened before then. Please reconsider.
Here it is. Hope you like it.
The item(s) you have received shall help thee on thy journey down the road. Happy Hanukkah, and Happy New Year!
...Hello, how's it going, my friend? If I could steal a moment of your time, I have a most interesting quandary concerning my Sakura Garden. Do you have a moment to spare?

Fabulous! My name's Jacob and I run the Sakura Garden. I'm looking to expand the garden with some more trees and nice, leather sofas. However, I'm rather lacking in the materials department. A well-traveled being such as you should have no problem gathering #b25 Cherry Blossom Seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k. The Cherry Blossom Seeds come from Sakura Cellions. I recall seeing a few over in the Purple Plains area of Amoria, so you may want to check over there. The Silk Feathers are fairly rare, but I've heard through the grapevine that Jr. Lioners tend to shed them upon demise. Bring them back to me, and I'll give you some of my very best potions stock!
Ah, I understand. We are all stones in the river of time, my friend. If you change your mind, I'll be here.
Fine job! These will fit perfect for the garden. As promised, here are the potions. Enjoy! I've got another task for you when you're ready.
Thanks again for your assistance. Incidentally, I need some more help if you've got a moment.

How funny! You could make an easy living as a jester, coming back before the task was finished. You've amused me, now head back out there and get the #b25 Cherry Blossom Seeds#k, #b10 Silk Feathers#k and #b10 Leather#k! I'll be waiting.
A fine job, my friend! You've accomplished a task of the highest order! I want you to take this #bBlossom Juice#k as your hard-earned reward. You have my gratitude...
You're assistance has proven invaluable, my friend. Thanks again!
Hmm, your satchel appears to have a hole in it my friend, when you sew it up, gather the rest and head back here.
...Ah, I must thank you for your assistance with the Cherry Blossoms, which are growing nicely-and the sofas, which look magnificent. I do have one other task for you if you're up to it.

Excellent, excellent! Well, to celebrate the opening of the new Sakura Garden, I've decided to give away some presents. As you demonstrated such combat prowess last time, I'm sure acquiring #b20 White/Purple-ribbon gift boxes#k, #b10 Lupin Dolls#k and #b10 Toy Baby Seals#k should be a simple twist of the sword for you! You might want to try Pink Teddies for the gift boxes, the Lupin Dolls and Toy Baby Seals should be easier to find. I have something special for you this time around.
That's unfortunate... you were a fantastic worker. Well, should you reconsider, you know where to find me!
Hi there! If you have a moment to spare, could I ask you for a favor?

Thank you...my husband, Richard, is a sailor on Tae Gong's ship over in Aqua Road. He works all the time and I do love him, but I barely get to see him. I would like to send a few things to him, but I don't know how to fight. I'll need you to gather #b25 Stiff Feathers#k and bring them to him on the boat along with the letter I wrote for him. If you do so, I'll have something nice for you when you get back.
Darn... oh well. I guess I'll have to find another brave fighter to help me then...
Howdy, I'm working, so I only have a second to talk. Oh... are you from Angelique? My buttercup always loves to send me things. Let me see what you've got there.

Awesome! Angelique always sends me the goods. And what is this ... a letter? Ah ... such a romanticist even after all these years. It's things like this that brings joy to my otherwise mundane life at work. Thanks!
Thank you so much!
That's funny, it looks like you haven't got everything yet. Could you hurry? I want Richard to get it soon.
My wife would want me to have more than what you have in your bag... come back when you've got everything!

You're back! And he got everything ok? Fantastic. And ... what is this ... oh a letter? Awww ... whenever I write him a letter, he always follows up with a sweet letter of his own. Great~ As promised, here's your reward. It should come in handy during your adventures.
Again, I thoroughly appreciate your help. I hope you have a safe journey. Here's wishing you good luck!
Haven't you met my wife yet? Go ahead... Hurry up!
You must be miss something, right?
I've been working on this love letter for Angelique, could you do me a favor and deliver it to her?
Thanks again! Don't get hurt!

Salutations, my friend. My name's Gary and this is my fiancée, Shatima. We wondered if you had a moment to maybe help us with getting our engagement rings back...

Great news. Well, we're schedules to get married, and I got Moony to give us a set of Golden Heart rings. Would you believe that the day after I propose, some Tweeters came along and dismantled both rings into fragments to put in their nest? Ridiculous. If you could hunt them down, I'm sure you'd come across the #b20 Ring Fragments#k. After that, Moony has agreed to restore the rings. If you could bring them back to us, we'd be grateful beyond words.
Oh...I see. Maybe we were mistaken about you. If you have a change of heart, please come back.
Simply Spectacular! Now we're off to get married. Thank you so much for your help!
My fiancée and I both thank you. Your kindness has touched both of our hearts.
Back already? That's gre-wait, wait...not all of them are here. When you have them all, be sure to head over to Moony.
Hey, are those Gary's and Shatima's rings?
Absolutely! Gary's an old friend of mine. Hand that ring over and I'll mend it back perfectly. They won't even know it was broken.
Oh, ok. Take your time and let me know when you're ready.
There we go...good as gold! Tell Gary I said to take this with my best wishes. You're all set.
I already repaired the ring. Gary and Shatima are expecting it when you get a chance.
Not enough pieces to meld the rings. I'll help you, but only after you've got all the pieces.
Hello, dear. Would you like to give Mom and Dad some help?

Music to my ears! Dad and I got a new computer, but the mouse doesn't really work that well. We heard about a man named #bMr. Spot#k, and he should have a better #bMouse#k for us to use. Go and see him, he should be in Kerning City. Thank you!
We raised you to be a little more obedient, young one. I will expect a different answer next time you come around!

Wonderful, you've got the #bMouse#k we need. I'm sure this one will work great! I know Mr. Spot probably told you about his #bNexon Cash Card#k, and I know you wanted one, so here is your #bAllowance#k.
Thanks again sweetie! Come back in a day, and I might have another chore for you...
Looks like you forgot the Mouse, dear. Be a doll and go see Mr. Spot as soon as you can.
Hi! I'm Mr. Spot and your Mom and Dad told me you might be coming here. I have the mouse for them, but first I'd like to tell you about something else I have. Would you like to hear it?

Well, I have something here called a #bNexon Cash Card#k. It comes in 2 kinds: #b100 points#k and #b250 points#k. These are available wherever you see the store that I work in, #rTarget#k. You will need your #bAllowance#k from Mom and Dad to get one, though. I can give you the Mouse you want for free if you come back later to get a #bNexon Cash Card#k. Keep the card, and in two weeks it will turn into actual Maple Points you can use. Here's the mouse you need. Hurry back!
I can see that you aren't going to change your mind anytime soon. That's sad. When you're ready to finish your chore, come back!
Ah, back already I see, ready to get your #bNexon Cash Card#k?
Excellent, well, here you go! Remember to keep it, after the Event ends, it will become #rMaple Points#k you can use in the Cash Shop!
Looks like you have some dirt, but not your #bAllowance#k. When you get your #bAllowance#k from Mom and Dad, be sure to return!
Here is what you were looking for. Please don't lose it this time. This rings mean something to Gary and Shatima.
Just go straight to Gary and Shatima this time. No fooling around!
Hey, what are you doing here? Please don't tell me you are here to tell me you lost the Repaired Ring for Gary and Shatima, are you?

Oh my. You did lose the Repaired Ring... I knew it! I found these Rings on the ground the other day and it looked so familiar but I wasn't sure whose they were. Let me get it for you. Talk to me again.

Oh you got the Repaired Ring? I see. I found some rings laying on the ground and I thought you lost them. But I guess you didn't. Well, you don't have a thing to worry about. Say hi to Gary and Shatima for me~
Easter is upon us. To celebrate, I'll be crafting Easter Baskets for everyone. Do you want one?
Good choice. Can you bring me #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k?
I see. I make the best baskets in town, so if you change your mind, I'll be here.
Great job gathering up #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k needed to make the #rEaster Basket#k. Now let me see here...
Here's your #rEaster Basket#k! By the way, I hear that the Easter Bunny's nasty cousin is trying to ruin Easter this year. Avoid that rotten egg. He is a disgrace to the season~
Are you are missing something? I need #b100 Tree Branches#k, #b100 Squishy Liquids#k, and #b1 Red Ribbon#k to make an #rEaster Basket#k.

Yeah, you heard me right, I hate Easter. I come from a long line of Easter Bunny's, but I'm not down with all that painting and scavenger hunting nonsense.\r\nDon't get me wrong. I did my time at Easter Bunny School, but they told me I don't have painting skills. I got skillz... graffiti skillz that is!

Besides, you think I want to walk around all night climbing trees and looking for bushes to plant some stupid boiled eggs. Hells no! You should join my crew and take down Easter. If you do, I'll hook you up.

Good. My cousin is an Easter Bunny and he's been planting eggs all week long. What's worse is that his buddy has been giving away Easter Baskets. Get me #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k and I'll give you something worth your while!
You just wasted my breath. Get lost!
I see that you have the #bEaster Basket#k and the #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k like I asked you to get. I'm sure it was a piece of cake for you to get all those.
My posse and I will be putting these to good use, if you know what I mean. Oh yeah...I always pay my debts on time. Talk to me later and we'll do it again.
You trying to scam me! I need #b10 Yellow Easter Eggs#k and #b1 Easter Basket#k! Remember the plan...

Hey, what's going on? Can you believe it? MapleStory is having its second birthday!!! It's all thanks to great Maplers like you! Well, anyway, we plan on having a big party among the MapleStory staff, and I need your help, big time. Can you help me out?

Thanks! Well, we have the cake (and pie), the food, and everything else needed for a grand party, but I forgot to buy something very important-birthday candles! I mean, what's a birthday party without the candles on the cake, you know? We'll need #b10 Birthday Candles#k for the party, so please get them for me as fast as you can. You should try hunting the #bCandle Monsters#k for them. I'll be here waiting for you. Good luck!
Oh, I see... that's alright. You must be busy with your other quests. But if you ever have a spare time, then please help me out here!! I'll be here waiting for you...
Oh my goodness, you really did bring all #b10 of the Birthday Candles#k that I asked you to get! Nicely done!!

Thanks a whole bunch for your help!! Phew, I could have gotten chewed out by my boss for this. Anyway, here's something for you. Hope you like it! Well, I'm off to tha par-tay, so I'll see you later! Happy Mapling!
I don't think you have the #b10 Birthday Candles#k that I asked you to get. The party is going to start soon, and I'll need those #bBirthday Candles#k fast! Please hurry!!
Welcome traveler! I am Ames The Wise and I am here to tell you stories of Amoria. But today, I had a special request from my brother to explain him and his work. Are you interested?

Well, my brother Amos is the strongest member of our family. He's so busy training, he's never had time to really find someone special. So, rather than pout about it, he built a special challenge for married couples, in the name of Elias. As you know, Elias sacrificed himself to create a memorial to Cecelia, his true love.

The Amorian Challenge is a test of strength for married couples, where they must work together to survive. He can tell you more about it. He's at the far end of Purplewood forest, you can get there by traveling through the Purple Plains.
Ok, what else can I help you with?

You have a question about Amorian Challenge? You've come to the right place. The Amorian Challenge is the perfect way for Married couple to train together. You don't have to be with your spouse to train (although Amoria seems to reward both of you playing at the same time), you just need to be married. I built this hunting ground as a tribute to the memory of Elias, and there are plenty of dangers inside for you and 5 other.
Here is just a taste of the special items, I've placed in my Vault. Treasures you shall only see, use and wear should you triumph! When you are ready, see me!
Go to Amos The Strong and ask more about Amorian Challenge. If you are eligible, you can start the challenge and even if you aren't he might still have something nice to show you.
Hey! Nice to see you on this hot summer day. Makes me want to snag something to drink. Think you can help me out with a little barbecue?

Enthusiasm! Always good to see. Well, I'm preparing a barbecue for some of friends and we're running low on ingredients. It starts pretty soon, so I'll need you to gather #b10 #t4031664#s (#i4031664#), 10 #t4031665#s (#i4031665#) and 10 #t4031666# (#i4031666#)#k, after that I can finish the barbecue! Thanks a bunch. I'll be waiting!
Er, Maple BBQ isn't exactly animal meat if you are in any case vegetarian, but I understand. Come back if you change your mind!
Fantastic! Everything's here. I'll be able to whip some mighty fine barbecue now! I've got some serious cooking to do. Now just give me a minute...

Yes, I'm done cooking! This BBQ turned out to be just right! Here, take one of these BBQs I cooked with the ingredients you gave. It's still hot, so be careful with it! Oh, and this hat is a gift of my thanks to your help.
