Hey... isn't this #b#t4031019##k? Hmmm... I have to say, I know a thing or two about this item. This is a scroll that contains parts of the ancient secrets that's been sealed to it. It is a very mysterious item, and if you try to open this without supervision, might put a curse on you to protect its contents.

If you give me the #b#t4031019##k, then I'll request it for deciphering to the expert at Omega Sector. I'll give you #b#t4031017##k in return. It's a mysterious box that contains an item, and no one knows what's inside. What do you think? Will you give me that scroll?

Alright! I'll have to request it immediately! By the way, do you know how to open the #b#t4031017##k? You'll need an item called #b#t4031072##k in order to open that box. I used to have it, only to lose it one day at a place where monsters were aplenty.

Please defeat #b#o2230103##k, which can be found at Eos Tower en route to Ludibrium, and bring back the #b#t4031072##k with you. I'll open the #b#t4031017##k for you if you bring me that. I'll be here awaiting good news~
Hmmm... I can assure you that keeping the scroll won't do much for you. Talk to me if you want to change your mind!
You really did bring #b#t4031072##k! Now I can open #b#t4031017##k with ease. What do you think? Do you want me to open this for you right now?
Do you like the item you got from this box? Alright, if you ever find #b#t4031019##k again, please come talk to me~!

I don't think you have found  #b#t4031072##k, yet. I lost the #b#t4031072##k a while ago at Eos Tower near Ludibrium. Please defeat #b#o2230103##k, a spider look-alike monster, and bring the key back so I can open the box for you~
That was fast! I knew you'd be good, but this is better than I expected. I can safely say that you'll become quite a traveler around here. I truly believe that.

Did you get the money? I know it's not much, but this may be very useful to someone like you who has just begun the journey. It would be nice to run into you someday and see you mature into a complete package.

You haven't gotten all the items I asked you to get. Maybe I have overestimated your abilities. Please gather up #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b30 #t4000004#s#k as fast as you can. I know you are more than capable of doing so.

Hello there ... are you about to embark on a journey? You look a bit too weak to take on such a task. When I was young, I was eager to prove my existence to the world by roaming around the world, experiencing everything ... I miss those days. There's nothing quite like traveling around in different exotic places, soaking in everything I could soak in...
I was green and unaware of what exactly was in store for me, so I had my share of hard times. Seeing you right now brings back those memories...

You know, I am saying this because I think you have great potential, but if you prove me right by completing a task I'm about to give you, then I'll help you get started with your journey. Do you want to do it?
Alright. Please gather up #b50 #t4000016#s#k and #b30 #t4000004#s#k for me, then I'll see what I can do to help you out.
Really? I was just trying to help... if you ever change your mind, come talk to me.
Woo hoo!!! Congratulations on completing Stage 1!
Here are some watermelons for you to forget the dog days of the summer. Please come see me if you want to tackle on Stage 2.
Here's your task for Stage 1: Defeat #b50 #o0130101#s#k and #b20 #o1210102#s#k. Good luck!

Isn't it really hot these days? It seems like everyone's depending on fans and air conditioner to get through the day. I, however, believe that it's important for one to defeat the dog days of the summer by means of moving around and sweating.

This is why MapleStory is proud to present #rBeat the Heat#k Challenge for the summer. Anyone that passes the three stages of the event will be provided with an opportunity to enter a ballot for prizes. Would you like to participate in this event?

Good choice. You'll find yourself forgetting how hot it is outside once you fully engage yourself in this event. This event has 3 difficulty settings designed to sufficiently meet your level, and I think you should participate in the #r<Easy>#k level.

The 1st stage of the <Easy> level will be a warm-up task. Your job is to head out to the field and defeat #b50 #o0130101#s#k and #b20 #o1210102#s#k. Easy, right? Complete the task for the 1st stage, and then I'll give you the instructions for the 2nd stage. Good luck!
This event goes on until September 2nd, so if you decide to change your mind, you should definitely participate in this event!
You're the one that completed Stage 1, right? Would you like to move up and tackle on the Level 2 training?

The task for the 2nd stage of the <Easy> level will be to gather up items. I hung up #b#t4031167##k on #b#o1110100##k and #b#o1110101##k for the sake of this task. Please gather up #b10 #t4031167#s#k for me.
This event goes on until September 2nd, so if you decide to change your mind, you should definitely participate in this event!
Woo hoo!!! Congratulations on completing the Level 2 training!
Here are some watermelons for you to forget the dog days of the summer. Please come see me if you want to tackle on Stage 3.
Here's your task for Stage 2: Gather up #b10 #t4031167#s#k that are hanging around the bodies of #b#o1110100##k and #b#o1110101##k.
Woo hoo!!! Congratulations on completing Stage 3!
Great work there! What do you think? To overcome the dog days of the summer, I advise you to live the life to the fullest, and keep yourself busy!
Congratulations on completing the <Easy> level of the Beat the Heat Challenge. Happy Mapling~!
Here's your task for Stage 3: Defeat #b25#k #b#o1130100#s#k and #b#o220100#s each#k, and gather up #b30 #t4000037#s that #b#o1210103##k drops.
Here's your task for Stage 3: Defeat #b25#k #b#o1130100#s#k and #b#o220100#s each#k, and gather up #b30 #t4000037#s that #b#o1210103##k drops.
You're the one that completed Stage 2, right? Would you like to move up and tackle on the Level 3 training?

Hello there. You must have heard the news, too. Yes, it's true. The various Mundane Monster Figures that you've seen everywhere are in fact, legendary structures that possess mysterious powers. Would you like to know more about these mysterious Monster Figures?

No one used to believe in these Mundane Monster Figures, myself included. Not only that, these statues were in fact given to #b#p2040050##k, who was just passing by. He was, in fact, looking for the history of these statues, and after a long time, he finally found the history behind these previously mundane structures.
I didn't hear too many details myself, but if you have some time, you should go visit #b#p2040050##k and hear the story yourself.
Maybe you're not interested in the mysterious powers of the Monster Figures...

Hello there. I'm #b#p2040050##k, the one that recently discovered the hidden powers of these Monster Structures. I am still quite tired from all that traveling, so come see me later, and we'll talk about the secret, mysterious powers of these Monster Figures.
If you really want to know more about the secrets of Monster Figures, then you should see me later.
If you want to delve more into the true history behind the Monster Figures, you should go see #b#p2040050##k.

Hello there, I'm #b#p2040050##k. For the longest time, no one believed or cared about the legend of these Mundane Monster Figures. I, for one, believed in those, though, and set out to prove that those legends were in fact, true.
And after much research and traveling, I finally discovered the secrets behind these Monster Figures. Do you want to know more about it, too?

This may be a long story. I set off to travel a long way in hopes of discovering the truth behind the legends of the Monster Figures, and while traveling, I ran into a wise man who had a tribe to himself in the middle of the desert. The story behind the Guardian that wise man told me turned out to be a great clue.

That tribe had a Guardian that protected their tribe. It may look like nothing more than a bunch of hay disguising itself as a 'figure', but it had immaculate jewelry on it's head. When the wise man placed the jewelry on its head, the previously ragged-looking 'doll' was engulfed in a mysterious beam of light, and became a powerful Guardian.

That's when I thought of the small hole behind the Monster Figure, and hurriedly returned to town and placed a gem I picked up from the street on it. That's when the statue became engulfed by the mysterious light and emerged with mysterious power. If you give me a gem, I'll make a Monster Crystal Figure with mysterious powers surrounding it.
The gems I'll place on the back of the Statue are #b3 #t04020000##ks, #b3 #t04020001##ks, and #b3 #t04020005#s#k. Wthen you get me the gems, I'll make you the Monster Crystal Figure.
You're not interested in the mysterious powers of these Statues? It's a mistake if you ask me...
Wow, you brought all the gems. Now remove them from your inventory, and I'll turn this into a Monster Crystal Figure, with mysterious powers engulfing the structure.

Here it is! From a mundane statue into a mysterious Monster Crystal Figure! With this statue, you'll be able to transform into a monster for a period of time. Please know that #bonce you get attacked by monsters or receive damage, you'll be changed back into a human#k.
Hope you have a great time on your journey, and if you need more of the Statues, then please let me know!!
In order to create the Monster Crystal Figure, I'll need #b3 #t04020000#s#k, #b3 #t04020001#s#k, and #b3 #t04020005#s#k.
It's been 3 years since the Maple world was first created. We have prepared a special present to everyone that has helped us grow for the past 3 years. Would you accept it?
The special present is actually a very special spell. This spell will definitely make you more powerful than ever. It'll take a little bit of time for me to prepare the spell, so talk to me in a bit.
Please allow me to say thank you.
I will now cast a spell on you called #bGM's Blessing#k.
You have now been blessed with #bGM's Blessing#k. GM's Blessing will boost your stats for 1 hour.

Also, you may only receive GM's Blessing once every 90 minutes. Please remember that #beven if you log off or if your blessing runs out, it'll still have to be 90 minutes after the blessing passes before you can receive another one#k, and if you want another one of the GM's Blessing, make sure to come see me.

How did you find your way here? As you can see, I am busy researching... but I have run into a problem, and my research has hit a dead end.

When I'm conducting studies and researching, I go through a lot of pencils for maps, blueprints, equations, etc.. This also creates enough mess to erase, but alas, I have used up all my erasers... this is the reason why I can't erase my mistakes...
This is exactly the reason why I need an eraser... so if you have one, can you give one to me?
Good choice. You don't need to carry that around if you don't put that to good use... and since I will be conducting studies inside, I hardly ever have time to go outside and get one myself.
Hey you have a variety of erasers. Just give me one each of #b#t4001038#, #t4001039#, #t4001040#, #t4001041#, #t4001042#, or #t4001043##k. Let me know when you're ready to go on.

I have to reward you for this... but this is all I have right now. I found this around the lab the other day.
Check it once more! Are you sure you have the erasers ready to give?
Thank you. I can't believe you're giving me this important item. I need to pay you back for this. Tell you what, I'll give you #b#t01302049##k. This is a weapon made by us aliens.
Again, thank you so much! Enjoy your weapon!
Are you sure you have the correct list of erasers from me? Please check it again.

Hey, I see something very intriguing with you... can you show me one? I'll just take a quick look at is give it back to you.
Okay, so what's this called? An eraser? What are they used for...?
It looks very interstng... and it resembles a creature we've been looking for... has this been frozen using special equipments?
Anyway you and your eraser... are you willing to give me some? I just need one of each of the following: #b#t4001038#, #t4001039#, #t4001040#, #t4001041#, #t4001042#, and #t4001043##k.
Are you still wary of being around me because of that? Why don't we just forget about it and move on? No? Well, let me know when you change your mind.

The one who has both the Monster Eraser and Undine's Cloth. The one who's ready to own the sword. You are now the rightful owner of this sword, #b#t01302063##k. Thank you. Thank you for freeing me from the sword.
It was really tragic to think that the one sword I have adored more than anything had become the very thing that took away my freedom... thank you for freeing me from it.
Unless you have #b1 #t4001038#, 1 #t4001040#, 1 #t4001039#, 1 #t4001041#, 1 #t4001043#, 1 #t4001042#, and #b#t4001115##, no one can become a rightful owner of this sword.

You look like you are worthy of becoming the rightful owner of this sword. Don't be shocked... I am the owner of this sword, as well as the spirit that has been trapped in the sword for a long, long time. I've been waiting for a day like this, where a rightful new owner would step in and free me from this forged prison.

Long ago, I used this sword to fight the Spirit of Fire, Salamander. I was able to slay him, but as a result, I lost all my powers and in the end, became part of the sword. The sword, that had just lost its owner was also bound to my remains. Now, try pulling this sword out. It will not move. This sword is utterly immovable, even the remains of the spirit... my sword became the immovable sword..

But that doesn't mean there's no way to remove the sword. With the #bMonster Eraser#k, the evil forces from it will awaken the power of the sword that had laid dormant. With that power, the sword will be able to be removed. But don't think about hastily awakening the sword. This sword is already a part of the ashes, and when the powers are reawaken, it'll be surrounded by the flames of Salamdander... which means no one will be able to touch it.

That's why you'll also need #b#t4001115##k. It's the one thing that can neutralize Salamander's massive force. It's really hard to find, though. I've been waiting for a long time in the sword, but I've never met anyone who had both the Monster Erasers and the #t4001115#. You're the only one... what do you think? Would you like to become the rightful owner of this sword?

Then please bring all the items required and make your way back here. I need #b1 #t4001038#, 1 #t4001040#, 1 #t4001039#, 1 #t4001041#, 1 #t4001043#, 1 #t4001042#, and #t4001115##k. That should be enough for you to own this sword.

For you to say no, even after having all these items... #b#t01302063##k is an immensely powerful weapon that combines its natural power with the spirits laden in it. I have no idea why you'd say no to that...
Oh, you are only interested in trading for it! Here it is, the Seal Cushion! Now please give me the #bMonster Eraser#k and #bHectagon Crystal Necklace#k.
Ahhh... this is indeed a beautiful necklace. Of course, it looks much better on fairies like me!

Don't just give me the #bHectagon Crystal Necklace#k. I also want one of each: #bStump Eraser, Lupin Eraser, Mushmom Eraser, Wraith Eraser, Octopus Eraser, and Slime Eraser#k. I mean, I'm giving you this lovely cushion. That's the least you can do!!

Hello, human! Yes, you! Please stop for a second. That necklace you have there... isn't that the Hectagon Crystal Necklace? Oh my gosh, it's real! Amazing! How did you get this? \r\n#L0# #bI got it from Pigmy's Egg.#k#l

Ahhh, really! I've never seen Hectagon Crystal Necklace up close before. This is mesmerizing... hey... can you give me this? It doesn't look good on humans anyway. You don't even know what to do with it!\r\n#L0# #bWhat do you mean??#k#l

That's why you cannot harness its power... will you give it to me? I'll give you something else... an adorable Seal Cushion!

Look. Isn't it adorable? I really cherish this item, but for a #bHectagon Crystal Necklace#k... I can make that sacrifice. Please get me #b1 Stump Eraser, 1 Mushmom Eraser, 1 Lupin Eraser, 1 Wraith Eraser, 1 Slime Eraser, 1 Octopus Eraser, and a Hectagon Crystal Necklace#k, and I'll give you the cushion.
What? You're telling me you don't like the cushion? How can you say no to this? Humans are very, very strange sometimes...

Okay... I know it's a little too early to ask, but will you be my date? Wait wait, that's too cheesy. Hmm... hey there, I like you a lot, would you be my Valentine? Hmmm, that doesn't sound like me either... whoa, were you watching me the whole time? That was embarassing. What was I doing? Well... I actually took a liking to this girl not too long ago, and I want her to be my Valentine, but I don't know how to say it. The problem I have right now is that I am stuck here, doing my work, and I can't go visit her right now. Can you do me a huge favor, just this one time?

Thank you so much. The favor I am about to ask you is simple, actually. I can't leave this place, but I want to really do something for Maya. She's amazing-looking, but I heard from the grapevine that, for some reason, she's spending this Valentine's all alone. Nothing will surprise her more than a surprise present from me.

I feel like this is my chance, you know. To make this a reality, I want you to go see #b#p2041017##k and make one #b#t04140100##k for Maya. Once you have the chocolate ready, head over to Henesys and give it to her for me.
Oh no... if I don't ask her today, she might find someone else!!! Noo!!!

Hello, there. How can I help you? What? This chocolate's for me?? From Cody??? Wow... I am speechless. That's.... so sweet of him to do that. Awww, thank you so much for this. Here, hold on one second, I got something for you... I can't let you go just like that! You just made my day!
As much as I love chocolate, this is A LOT, so I'll share some with you. It looks really delicious, too. Happy Valentine's!
Hey what are you doing here? Please go see #b#p2041017##k and ask him to make one #b#t04140100##k for Maya. Once you have the chocolate ready, head over to Henesys and give it to her for me.
Sigh... it's Valentine's, and I have no date this year. I'd like nothing more than a box of chocolate right about now...
You slew 100 #o2100105#s? Really? I find that hard to believe... wow, you really did!
But #o2100105# isn't really anything. Sand Bandits constantly face bigger and stronger monsters than this. You can't be a member just by destroying #o2100105#.
You haven't slain #r100 #o2100105#s#k. How can you honestly call yourself a candidate with those skills?
Who are you? What do you want from me? What? You want to join the Sand Bandits? Where did you get that idea? Wait, that's not important. Do you really want to be a member?
Hmmm... the tasks of Sand Bandits are full of difficult missions. You look like a skilled traveler, but... I can't trust you. Show me you are worth the membership... by slaying #r100 #o2100105#s#k.
If you don’t want to do it, then get off my face.

#b10 Stormbreaker Badges#k were the terms of the challenge... and you are still shy of that number.  By accepting those terms of my challenge, you are honor-bound to bring me exactly 10, and no fewer.  Return when you have acquired all of them.
The ashes!  If I may take them from you?  Please... handle them with reverence
You have earned my respect.  While you are not one of us, I welcome you as a fellow clan member.

Go speak to Fiona.  In addition to being a skilled fighter, she is a talented weapon smith.  If you have earned any of our Raven gear from Joko, Fiona can reforge these items to become even more powerful than they already are.  You may also wish to speak to her about some of her unique creations.
I want to thank you again for returning our map.  This gesture tells me something of who you are.  Perhaps someone to be trusted... a potential ally.  Time will tell if my faith is misplaced.

You asked me once what we were, if not bandits. <smiles> So I tell you this now: We are members of the #bRaven Ninja Clan#k, and hail from an island called the Isle of Vigilance off the northern shores of Masteria.

We Raven Ninjas trace our lineage back to the ancient Masterian guild of the #bShadowknights#k, so you could consider Crimsonwood Keep our ancestral home.  Our mission here is to discover the reason for Masteria's disappearance and its return.  It is almost certainly tied with the current events at the Keep, and what you and this Jack Barricade are pursuing.

Based on what you have told me, I have expanded our mission to include the elimination of these trespassers that now occupy Crimsonwood Keep.  <smiles>  It's what we do best.  But we will #bpay a bounty for the badges#k of those you happen to dispatch as well.  Consider yourself a contractor.  My brother #bJoko#k will handle the details so you should speak to him.
Oh, and keep this map.  Jack may have been right to entrust you with it.  Until we meet again, friend.

Well, well... looks like the pup's got some bite after all!  I see that you're tough enough to at least survive in this forest.  Looks like I might have to re-evaluate where you stand in the food chain.  Hmm.  I'll admit you've made these woods a little safer by what you've done.  And for that, you're welcome here in our camp.

The name's #bTaggrin#k.  I'm the leader of this little band of "bandits" you see here.  <laughs>  Feel free to warm yourself by the fire.  #bIf you need to resupply, you can enter the supply tent and buy stuff from Mo#k.  I'll tell him to open up for you.
"Bandits."  Ha!  That's a good one!
I said #b50 Phantom Seeds#k.  Count 'em and you'll see you're still short.  It ain't as flashy as fighting, but last I checked, basic math was still considered a necessary life skill.
Nice work, kid, I'll have these materials shipped off to have another one made immediately.  In the meantime, here's the Marker I promised.

Oh, and kid, a word of advice: watch out whenever you're using any sort of ancient teleporting devices... There's always chance you could end up in a worse position than before.  So whenever you're exploring, stay on your toes!

Looks like you’re short on some of the materials, kid.  #b1 Power Crystal#k, #b10 Gold Ores#k, and #b4 Typhon Feathers#k.  I’d like to help you out but it wouldn’t make sense for me to lose out on this deal now, would it?
You found my brother?!  Wonderful!  Glad to hear that he’s alive and kicking.
You're back!  What does the code mean?  What did John say?  What?!  You guys haven't figured it out yet!?  What are you waiting for?!  We need to find out what this means immediately!
You have misplaced the translation.
Here, let me write it down for you again.  Go and let John know what these words mean.
You don't need one?
You must get the letter I have translated to John.
Haven't found my brother yet?  <sigh>  He's gotta be somewhere on this continent.  Just continue to keep an eye out for him, will ya, kid?

I'm still trying to get these darn Hyper Glyphs to work!  Have you spoken to the others in NLC?  No?  Hop to it, then!  We can't let Jack down.  #bProfessor Foxwit#k, #bMayor Slimm#k, or #bLita#k might all know something about this.  Who knows, maybe even the #bGlimmer Man#k or #bElpam#k may have come across this writing before!  Cover all the angles, kid!
What, no luck yet?  That's no reason to stop... keep trying, ace!  Someone around here's bound to know something about this!
Hurry, take the #bTranslated Communique#k back to my brother!  And tell him what I said about Subani!

Meow~ didn't you think it's interesting to see a cat talk like this? Well, my name is #b#p1040002##k. Pets usually don't talk unless they become very closely attached to their owners, but my master is a fairy living in this forest.

The fairy gave me a little bit of magical abilities, which enabled me to talk to others on my own, and also become transparent at will! Since you came a long way to see me, can you help me find the stuff that I lost?

What I lost is  #b#t4031273##k. My master gave me that as a present, and it's a very important item to me as a result. I really love playing around with that furball~ but then, a few days ago, I dropped it somewhere, and the furball kept rolling around the forest. Now I can't find it...

I have a feeling the #r#o0210100##k, a very curious bunch, took them in amusement, and they're not returning them! Please find the meowy #b#t4031273##k from #r#o0210100##k. Find the furball, and bring it with #byour pet#k, and then I'll reward you with something nice.
Are you here just to see me out of a curiosity? You must have nothing to do. If you don't have anything to do, then just leave. Meow!
Meow! That was incredible! It's the red furball that I lost, indeed! Thank you so much~! Meow!

Don't you feel like you've gotten really close with your pet? I told your pet that you've been very good to me~ then your pet told me it's very happy to have a good master like you, and thinks you're the best!
The item I lost is a #bsmall, red furball #k~

You're alive! I mean, you made it back! That's great...and there's only a few dozen scratches on you-nothing a Ginger Ale won't fix in a jiffy. And you brought Bigfoot's Toe! How was the fight? Take this reward-you've certainly earned it!
Hmm, looks like you're short of 1Bigfoot's Toe I asked for. I can understand if you want to rest, Just be sure to get them all before you return to me.
Excellent! You've brought me the Jack O'Lantern! The Phantom Forest is much safer now, thanks to your efforts! Be sure to come back to me for more work-I can always use a hand!
Hmm, looks like you're short of 1Jack O'Lantern I asked for. I can understand if you want to rest, Just be sure to get them all before you return to me.

Ok, ok. Let's not go overboard here-this isn't some award you can hang on a wall-it's something that designates you as a guardian of the city, and whenever I summon you, you must answer the call.
Oh ok, let me know when you're good and ready to receive this honor!

This... is one interesting organism. A magical life blended with a power of science... the evolution of life has become that much more advanced now. Okay, so what brought you here...? Do you want to grow this Robot.. I mean, this living pet?
Okay... but I can't just sit back and watch it grow. Unlike other pets that were created purely with magic, this pet is a bit different. I'll need 1 #t5380000# and 50 Cheap Batteries for that.
Take your time gathering up those materials. I'll be here studying more alchemy-related formulas.
Do you want it stay in that form? Then there's nothing I can do...
Did you bring all the materials?

Hoh...you seem to have yourself quite an intelligent pet. Did you bring it here for my training? Pets need to be trained and educated...and of course, once I do that, the pet will become that much more special. It'll even learn to talk by itself. What do you think? Do you want me to help you out?

Okay, good decision. You should also know that there's nothing's that's free. If you train others as much as I do, you tend to get a bit thirsty. Can you get me a drink? I have this drink that I really love, so much so that the merchants know exactly what i want. I'll be waiting.
Fine. Let me know if you ever change your mind.
Did you bring the drink? Ahhh...just thinking about drinking this already puts me in a much better mood. Okay, now shall we start the session?
Hey what do you think? That was fast, wasn't it? Marvel at my awesome training skills... and now, your pet will be that much more intelligent than before.
What? You didn't bring the drinks yet? I am thirsty... and I can't teach without the drink.

Hoh... you seem to have yourself quite an intelligent pet. Did you bring it here for my training? Well, with a little of the training, I can teach the pet to move right next to you in an instant, wherever it may be at the moment. Are you interested?

Okay, good decision. You should also know that there's nothing's that's free. If you train others as much as I do, you tend to get a bit thirsty. Can you get me a drink? I have this drink that I really love, so much so that the merchants know exactly what i want. I'll be waiting.

Did you bring the drink? Ahhh...just thinking about drinking this already puts me in a much better mood. Okay, now shall we start the session?

Hey what do you think? That was fast, wasn't it? Marvel at my awesome training skills... and now, your pet will be that much more obedient to your commands. All you need to do is say /petcome, and your pet will slide up next to you.
What? You didn't bring the drinks yet? I am thirsty...and I can't teach without the drink.

Hoh... Did you manage to find the antidote...? You weren't able to get one from Sage Cat...? Isn't that obvious? If he was to give you the antidote that easily, then he wouldn't have poisoned me in the first place... Cough cough!
There's no other way now. You'll need to defeat #rSage Cat#k and obtain the #bAntidote Marble#k! I truly believe...
Hmmph... (breathing heavily)... oh, you, you are back... were you able to...oh, so this is the... Antidote Marble...
Cough cough cough!

...phew... Fortunately, the Antidote Marble is real. I have a feeling the Sage Cat was using the Antidote Marble as a bait for something very sinister. Thank goodness his plan was foiled... hmmm? Why do you have that look on your face?

Don't feel sorry. I may have been poisoned, but I'm fully cured now. You were also able to defeat the Sage Cat once and for all! Isn't that what we all hoped for? He was a thorn in Mu Lung's side for the longest time, but this should keep him quiet for a while now. Thank you so much!
Hmm...were you not able to obtain the Antidote Marble? You can acquire the #bAntidote Marble#k by defeating the #rSage Cat#k.
Bark bark-!
Don't you have something for me ...? The item that you got from #p2012019# of #m200000000#.
Bark bark-!(Moppie picked up a small box from somewhere.)
Bark! Bark bark!(There seems to be a small box around Moppie's neck.)\r\n#L0# #bObserve the box.#l
Would you like to remove the box from Moppie's neck and observe it?
The box contained a phrase.\n\n#b'To #p2101002# of #m260000000#...'#k
Bark bark-!
You have done it!  As I promised, here is the key to the Inner Sanctum.

Lightening Field? The Grandmasters would never shield the entry to their Council Hall in such an offensive manner!  This Keystone opens the mechanical locks of Inner Sanctum gates, but this unholy energy field you describe is another matter.  Regarding this impediment, I do not know what advice I can give.  Perhaps someone in your time who has studied such things can provide a solution.

There are still too many warriors guarding the Keep.  I cannot, in good conscience, give you the Keystone.  Remember, your mission can only hope to succeed if you destroy at least a battalion each of the #bWindraiders#k, the #bFirebrands#k, and the #bNightshadows#k - which means #b75 of each type#k of these corrupted ones.  Return when you have decimated their ranks.
You haven't gathered them all yet? You can find #b#t04001126##k these days on quite a few monsters, so why don't you just get it from them? All you need to do is bring me back #b50#k of them.

Hey there, #b#h0##k! As we celebrate the Autumn Festival of MapleStory, I have something to tell you that you may find very interesting.

#i01012098# #t01012098#

This is what I heard from #p9000021#, who is in charge of protecting the Maple Trees, and he mentioned that there's a special Maple Leaf out there that'll awaken your hidden abilities just by holding it in your mouth.
What do you think? Don't you find it interesting?

Haha, okay! That's what I like to hear. \nActually, on the outside, #b#t01012098##k looks exactly like #t04001126#, so it's really hard to tell the difference between the two with the naked eye. If #p9000021# didn't teach me how to separate the two for a full week, then I'd still be struggling right now.

I've really worked on it over the years, so now I have no trouble picking them out! Seriously! You'll see some monsters that will have #b#t04001126##k stuck on them. Can you bring me back #b50 sheets#k of those? I'll tell you if one of them is indeed #t01012098#.

You seem quite suspicious of the effects of #b#t01012098##k. If you lose valuable time wondering whether it's legit or not, you'll find yourself without one really soon... you know you're not the only one looking for it!
Please get me #b25 #t04001126#s#k. You'll be able to find them quite easily from hunting!
Hey! Have you been enjoying the awesome effects of #b#t01012098##k that I gave you last time?

I knew it... I knew you'd like it. All you need is one #t01012098#, and you should be set. That being said... are you aware that there's a way to maximize the effects of #t01012098# and increase its potency?
Oh! So you must have heard it through the grapevine. No wonder you're a traveler; you seem to be aware of a lot of things. It's actually called #bMaple Syrup#k.

Every year around this time, people gather up #b#t04001126#s#k, grind them into a fine powder, and heat them up to make fine, delicious #bMaple Syrup#k. The process of making it is quite simple, but it's not easy to set the right temperature and timing for this, so there aren't many people out there who can be considered experts at making the Syrup. You know what, though? Recently, I was able to receive a few pointers from #p9000021#, and now I can make one myself!
I can honestly say that I am the best in the world of Maple in making #bMaple Syrup#k! In order to make one, I'll need #b25 #t04001126#s#k, so... once you have 25 #t04001126#s ready, let me know.
Oh... you must not know about it. You may want to learn a few things about Maple Syrup before talking to me about it.
Great job keeping track of your attendance! Here's your PB & J Sandwich, Chocolate Milk, Chips, Cookies and Fruit Roll Ups! Make sure to come back tomorrow to receive the final prize.
Take this attendance sheet to Cody.
Oh hello there! Are you enjoying the Back to School Event of MapleStory? How about joining me in participating the Attendance Event?

Starting September 11th, log onto MapleStory everyday. I'll give you an attendance sheet, and you can exchange it for 5 delicious lunch snacks through Cody. Cody will give you PB & J Sandwich, Chocolate Milk, Chips, Cookies and Fruit Roll Ups! If you attend Maple for 14 days straight and collect all these items, Cody will give you a special gift!
Here's your attendance sheet. Take this to Cody to exchange it for delicious lunch snacks. He'll give you PB & J Sandwich, Chocolate Milk, Chips, Cookies and Fruit Roll Ups!
It really is a fun event, you know. You should really think about doing it. I even have great prizes for you... just so you know.
Here is your prize. It's a Lunch Box Weapon. The monsters shouldn't under estimate the power of a little lunch box!
Nope, can't give you the prize. Check if you met all the requirements.
Hey! Did you come to MapleStory everyday starting September 11th?
I applaud your persistence! You're a treasured Mapler indeed.
Oh...I guess you're not ready to exchange your snacks. Hope you're not planning on eating it all!
Green Slime, Kru, The Book Ghost, Blue Kentaurus are dropping Notebooks. Collect as much as you can and bring them back to me. The team that collects the most will be rewarded.
Scania, Kradia, Bellocan is Team A; Bera, Khaini, Yellonde is Team B; and Broa, Windia, Mardia is Team C.
You have made the right decision! Be aware that the Notebooks are dropped at a low rate. Good luck!
Come back again later if you feel like you're missing out on all the fun.
Are you a trainee looking to become Master? Hmmm...No Gong sent you here? He thinks Tae Roon is regaining consciousness?

If you're requesting that I check up on the spell that's gripping Tae Roon, I can happily do that. He's a student of Mu Lung, first and foremost, even before being No Gong's student. It breaks my heart seeing a fine kid being controlled by Master Goblin, and I can't let that go on. Hold on for a second.
Haven't you gone to #bDo Gong#k yet? He's right there, so go now.

#bTae Roon#k... He was the most intelligent, dedicated student I, No Gong, have ever had. He was a courageous kid who could not turn his back away from evil. The only way this bright kid is wandering around like a loose cannon these days is because of that Master Goblin.

Tae Roon had always been a thorn on Master Goblin's side, because he was dedicated to defeating Goblins, so one day Master Goblin casted a spell on him that made him lose his mind. All he did was let go of himself for a bit, and Tae Roon lost his mind. Once that happened... he began to attack the good people in this town, as well as numerous travelers...

It broke my heart knowing that I couldn't do anything to help him get back on his feet. The only thing I could do to help Tae Roon, who felt miserable by his actions everytime he regained consciousness, to... exile him from this town so he won't injure another person.

For that Tae Roon to help Tae Soo... Maybe the spell on him has weakened over time... if the spell cast upon him by Master Goblin can be broken, then Tae Roon will be able to live in the friendly confines Mu Lung, just like the old times. Can you check up on this?
#bDo Gong#k should be able to determine the strength of the spell casted on Tae Roon even from afar, so please go talk to him immediately.
I understand that it's a difficult task, but ... please reconsider.

Hmmm? What is it? Are you interested in physical training? Whaatt? You saw a bear outside and did what? It's really hard to tell since there are so many bears around here... They all are my students, but... they all look alike. No?
A big, hulking bear with a scar on his eye? And he helped Tae Soo out...?  No way... #rTae Roon#k...?
You haven't gone to see #bNo Gong#k yet. He lives at #bMu Lung Temple#k.

The animals that inhabit around Mu Lung are unlike any other animals in the world. A great majority of them are equipped with intelligence and dilligence, as they train to become Master. Of course, every once in a while, you'll run into a few that will act up on their instincts and attack humans. I ran into a bear like that a while ago at the Sky Forest.

I was stunned when I was attacked, because Sky Forest is normally a peaceful place. Its long, sharp claws were ferociously swung literally inches from my eyes. Then, something incredible happened. A powerful force fired by someone took out the wild bear and rescued me, but...

The one that helped me wasn't a human, either. He actually looked even more ferocious than the wild bear... he was #ba Hulking Bear with a Scar on His Eye#k. I found myself controlled by fear once again. He looked like he was going to use me as his lunch pale, but... he just turned around and left... without saying a word... without acknowledging my 'thank you'.

I feel terrible that he may have felt offended by my response, even though I was more than grateful for his help. His attire suggests that he may be one of the bears training to become the Master at Sky Forest... who must that be? If it's okay with you, can you do me a huge favor and find out what he's all about?

Ahh... thank you. From looking at his uniform, he may be one of the students of #bNo Gong#k. Pretty much everyone around here that's involved in physical training is a student of No Gong, so... that's my guess. Please go see No Gong and ask about him. Thanks!
Hmmm... you must be really busy. There's nothing I can do, then. Please be aware of the bad Peach Monkeys around the Peach Farm.

How annoying can it be! I've just seen some people throwing rubbish all around Singapore Airport!! Argh... This is something I cannot tolerate!! They ought to do something about it~ Well... hmmm, will you help me out?

Really?? It is so nice of you!! Would you help me out by clearing some of the rubbish around Singapore Airport? A kindness of clearing #b20 Wasted Paper and 20 Recycle Water Bottles#k will make a difference! Please get those items for me. Thanks~
Okay!! Humph~ I'll find someone else then...
Wow! You cleaned up the surroundings around Singapore Airport with such amazing speed! It is a huge place. Let me see if you really did clean it.
Well well well... If everyone in Singapore were like you, this island would be free from rubbish!
Thank you so much~! Ahh... The place looks much cleaner now!
Are you going to let our beautiful Singapore dirty??? Please clean up those empty bottles and waste paper!
Where can I find more Stop Signs and Metal Poles, do you have any idea?
Hmmm.. I wonder how you manage to get all these items in such a short while. Hope you have not done anything by breaking the laws. Nevertheless, you are indeed an efficient person. Thank you!
Have you gathered #b100 Stop Signs and 100 Metal Poles?#k

Hi Traveler, I am upholding the law and order of this beautiful country! My duty is to catch all the law breakers and put them to justice! Recently, I notice a lot of riders along the expressway, failing to stop accordingly!
I tried my best to catch them, but..... sad to say, I will need some equipment to assist me in my daily law enforcing routine. Could you help me out?

I guess you care about the island's safety as much as I do~! Okay, I will need your help to get me #b100 Stop Signs and 100 Metal Poles#k to install them along the expressways to remind all riders about the safety.
Let's hope the hell riders will not get into real trouble.
Hey Traveler~! It's you again! Thanks for the help on the previous encounter. Erm... Could you help me with another task? Please?
I knew it! You are such an helpful person! Okay, here's how it goes.... Currently, I notice a lot of riders fail to travel at a safe speed along the expressways. This could result in fatal accidents!
If you are kind enough, please get me #b100 Speed Limit Sign#k and #b100 Metal Pole#k, as I will need them to be installed along the expressway to remind all the riders about speed caution.
.................................... oh Yeah? You don't really care anything but hunting... What a LOSER!
Where can I find more Speed Limit Signs and Metal Poles? Do you have any idea for it?
This is the 2nd time you gathered all the required items in such a short time! Thanks for the help!
Have you gathered #b100 Speed Limit Signs and 100 Metal Poles#k?
Arghh... I was assigned to a technical assignment that requires some motor parts by Teacher #bAiru#k. Unfortunately, I am down on flu currently. Sob~

I was asked to find #b2 Headlights, 6 Tires and 1 Car Battery#k for that assignment. However, I don't think I have the energy to move around the area to search for all the assignment materials. Will you help me to locate all these items? Please....

Really? It is so nice of you~ Please get me #b2 Headlights, 6 Tyres and 1 Car Battery#k for my assignment. Once you have gathered all the required items, please look for Teacher Airu and pass her the items. Thank you!
Okay~ I am done for sure. Teacher Airu will punish me once I get back to school after I have recovered from my flu.
Hi There~.... What? You came here to see me for Johnson's favor? Oh Dear.... I should be giving you A++ for doing this...

It is so kind of you to help Johnson to gather all the required items for the technical assignment while he is sick! Johnson is one of my favorite student~ He is intelligent and hardworking! Please accept this token~
What? You are unable to locate Teacher Airu? She is always seen walking around in CBD Area.
Have you seen Johnson lately? I have not seen him for the past 2 days. I am starting to worry about him~
Why are all the dresses in Singapore so beautiful?

You... yes! Stop looking around, it's you! Are you the local of this island? I bet you are~ I was wondering, why mostly all the dresses in Singapore are so beautiful? Especially the traditional ones from the 3 Major races on the island!

While I was doing some window shopping around CBD, and I saw a superior tailor making a very beautiful dress! I asked him, and he told me that this dress originates from the traditional Indian Custom. I asked him to make me one of the dresses, but he told me that he is unable to do so. Sob~
He will need #b20 #t4000035##k and #b20 #t4000021##k to make a whole new Indian Costume if I am interested in it. By the way, can you help me to find all these materials?

Joining this event is easy! Do you remember the #bMini Dungeons#k that are located all over the world of Maple? Use the ticket I just gave you and enter one of the dungeon maps. Once you use the portal inside, you'll be able to move to a special Mini Dungeon that is slightly different from the ones you've been used to.
Ah, the dungeon will look the same on the outside. The big change is the item the monsters drop. One of the items they'll drop will actually be #bThe Secret Something#k.

The #bSecret Something#k......that something is actually a crystal called #b#t4032056##k. I want you to gather up as many of those as you can, and then come back to me. Depending on how much you bring, I'll give you a special, special reward that you'll surely love!

Oh, and while setting up this event, I have changed the Mini Dungeon settings a bit. Please take note of the following: 
1, Once you enter the dungeon, you can only be inside for 5 minutes. After that, you'll be automatically removed from the dungeon.
2,You may enter the Mini Dungeon up to 6 times per day.
3, You can't enter the dungeon if you are affiliated with a party at the time of entrance.
4, You cannot use special skills once inside the dungeon.

From what I hear, the suspicious group of people roam around in weird costumes and carry unusual weapons. People say they hear sounds coming from the shores. It's really puzzling. Could you investigate this for me?

Henesys is the town located in the center of Victoria Island. Not only is #p1012100# keeping tabs on what's going on, so are #p1052001#, #p1022000#, and #p1032001#. Please go over to #b#m100030000##k and see if it's anything we may have to investigate further.

Just like the wisemen in Victoria Island training for the day the Black Magician returns, #p1072008# is busy making sure that his followers stay in low numbers.  She's so young, too. That's just so admirable!
So no more suspicious looks! We're not here to fight you! I swear on #p1072008#'s name!  We come in peace!

We, the Hafrings, have coexisted with the Dragons for a long, long time. Our friendship with the Dragons have helped us immensely in that we did not need to protect ourselves in case of danger, for the Dragons were there to do so. We just wanted nothing more than a simple, quiet life in the forest.

That does not mean we should be oblivious to what is happening in this continent. After the loss of Nine Spirit, it has become evident that we the Hafrings will also need to step up and defend ourselves in times of danger. I believe this is that time.

A #bnew force#k is primed to change everything in the Maple World. It's laying dormant for now, but... it won't be long until they fully show themselves to the public. I want to know if the new force is to be welcomed, or to be feared... and... I'd like for you to do that for us. Can you?

You have been well-experienced in this world of Maple, and your judgement holds true to all of us. Please go to #b#m100030000##k and meet with them. I want you to tell us whether they are good people or not.
This is a colossal development that will affect the Maple World and you're going to turn your back on it?!
Did you say you have a letter to give me? I wonder where this letter's coming from...
She's back. I've heard of the rumors, but I guess she really is back.
I asked you to give this to Athena Pierce of Henesys. Have you not gone yet?
You told me you brought the letter, right? Now where is it?

Hey, you! Yes, you. What do you have in your hand there? I am 100% sure that paper in your hand is only used in the Captain's Room. What's that doing there in your hand?\r\n#b#L0# I picked it up from the trash can in the hallway.#l
From the trash can? Can you show me that? Hmmm... just as I thought. I'm sorry I suspected you of doing something else. Now that I know you're okay... can I ask you for a favor...?

This letter is written by Kyrin to Athena Pierce in Henesys. The two have a complicated history going on there, and... that's why I think Kyrin wrote it, but was never able to actually give it to her. I want you to take this letter, go to #bHenesys#k and give it to #bAthena Pierce#k.
I understand if you don't want to participate in this. It's a very personal matter, and I can understand if you don't feel comfortable partaking in it.

I can't thank you enough for giving me this. At least I know how Kyrin is doing these days. I am just proud that she came back to Victoria Island all grown up. It does seem like she's still dogged by her past, though...\r\n#b#L0# Her past?#l
It's a long story. Care to listen?
Since you served as a messenger, I should tell you what really happened. Please give me some time as I try to recollect and make sure I remember what actually happened. It's been so long...
You must be busy with something.
I'll have to go quite a while back. Kyrin's father is Testonen, a savior of Victoria who battled the Black Magician when Victoria and Ossyria broke into two separate lands.

Once Victoria found some peace, he asked me to take care of his newborn kid Kyrin before he left to track the Black Magician once more. That's how she ended up growing up here in Henesys. She was full of courage like her father, and she was also very capable of inventing things. Some of her inventions did end up causing chaos in this town, though. Hahaha...

One day, during one of the meetings between town chiefs, she overheard what happened to her father, and disappeared all of a sudden. I went to Ossyria, Victoria, Maple Island, and everywhere else looking for her, only to find my search attempts futile. After all these years, I didn't think she'd come back to Victoria Island, all grown up.
I'd really love to see her once more. I am sorry, but can you help me facilitate this meeting between her and myself?
Hmmm? You're here to give me an item from Athena Pierce?

Oh... this orgel... I can't believe she actually kept it after all those years... this orgel was my very first invention. Back when I was child, I would spend countless hours making this just for Athena Pierce...
I feel ashamed to have not summoned up the courage to meet her first. I better go pay a visit to Athena Pierce really soon.
I would really appreciate it if you can take this orgel and give it to Kyrin. She'll like it.
You lost it? No wonder... you dropped the orgel right here.
It's an item I cherish, so please don’t misplace it again, and give it to Kyrin this time around.

I think Kyrin had been feeling guilty all this time about leaving Henesys without telling me. She shouldn't have felt that way, though. Can you help me give this item to Kyrin? If she sees this, maybe she'll summon up the courage to come visit Henesys after all these years.

Thank you so much. This is the orgel that she built when she was a kid. Her very first item, shall we say. She gave it to me as a present, and I've kept it after all these years. Please let #bKyrin#k know how much I miss her, and give this #borgel#k to her.
Ah... will that be too much for you? I'll have to look for other ways, then...
Uh... ummm... if you aren't too busy, then can you please help me? I really need your help... and I feel weaker by the second.

Thank you so much. I may look like a regular dolphin to you, but I am Sharyl, the prince of Whalians. It's hard for me to even stand right now because my mana has almost run out. Can you please get me one #bMana Elixir#k bottle?
Ah... please...so...weak...
Thank you! I can feel myself already getting better. Yeah!
Please get me 1 Mana Elixir bottle.
