The Shining Stone can be found in the Generator Room. Haven't found it yet?
The Shining Stone can be found in the Generator Room. Haven't found it yet?
You must be wondering why a prince would end up in a place like this. As the Prince of Whalians, my job is to stay here and control the Shining Stone.\r\n#b#L0# Shining Stone? What is that?#l

The Shining Stone is the source of power for The Nautilus. All the power that's required to move The Nautilus is generated from the Generator Room, where the Shining Stone is. Only the Whalians can control the power of the Shining Stone. We owe Kyrin a huge favor, and to repay the gratitude, we provide Shining Stone, and control its massive power. Now that you're here and all, do you want to experience the mystical power of Shining Stone?

The Shining Stone is located on the right of me, the #bGenerator Room of The Nautilus#k. Once you go there, you'll see my colleagues collectively controlling the power of the rock. Go down there, touch the #bShining Stone#k, and experience its powers. It'll be unlike anything you've ever experienced.
You're on board at The Nautilus. You might as well go experience the power of the Shining Stone...
I've already received word from Prince Sharyl. Can you give me the Magic Flask you received from him?
Collecting the Vigor of the Sea will require some time. Please wait for a bit.
You can find Muse at the Aquarium. Please get the Vigor of the Sea for me. Please....

What? You broke the Magic Flask? You'll really need to be careful with it, because it's made out of glass. I'll give you another one, so place fill up the flask with the Vigor of the Sea and bring it back to me.

Ah hello there! You must be the one that experienced the power of the Shining Stone before. Doesn't it seem like it's a bit darker here these days? It's that the ones that light up The Nautilus, the Water Fireflies, are getting weaker by the day.\r\n#L0##bWater Firefly?#k#l

Yes. Water Fireflies are these mysterious creatures that emit bright lights by consuming the Vigor of the Sea deep in the ocean. Once The Nautilus reached Victoria Island, they have never had a chance to go back under the deep sea, so their lighting has dimmed little by little. If you have some time to spare, can you get us some Vigors of the Sea for the sake of Kyrin and the fireflies?
Vigor of the Sea can actually be found through #bMuse of the Aquarium#k. Please fill up this Magic Flask with #bVigor of the Sea#k.
Are you busy? Oh no... what will we do...
The Magic Flask has been filled with Vigor of the Sea. Are you ready to return to The Nautilus?
Here it is. Please give this to Prince Sharyl ASAP.
Let me know when you are ready. The Prince seems to be in a hurry, so it'll be nice if you can get yourself ready fast.
Ahhh you brought it! The Nautilus will be dim no more!
I am sure Kyrin will be relieved of this. Hopefully she'll be happy with what's about to take place.
You haven't gone there yet? Please head back to The Nautilus immediately and hand this Vigor of the Sea to Prince Sharyl.
Still not ready?
Oh no... did you lose it?
Gathering the "Vigor of the Sea" requires a lot of work. It is that hard to obtain, so please don't misplace it again.
Ahh, you were the one that did me a huge favor the other day. I'm sorry I keep asking you this, but can you please help me out once more?
Thank you. A while back, I left a #bMother of Pearl#k inside the #bGenerator Room#k, and I am sure by now, it has a huge piece of pearl inside. I'd love to donate that pearl to Kyrin...

Please take the #bpearl#k and give it to Kyrin for me. I am way too shy to do this myself... and please let her know that Prince Sharyl picked it out because he thinks it'll look good on her. Thank you!
Before making your way to Kyrin, however, you should really watch out for #bMuirhat#k. He might stand in your way of getting this done.
I understand if you feel burdened by my constant requests. Who should I ask, then...
Wait, what's that pearl you have in your hand? \r\n#L0##b I'm here carrying out the Prince's order to give this to Kyrin.#k#l
Prince Sharyl?? Hmmm.... So you're saying Prince Sharyl ordered you to give that to Kyrin? \r\n#L0##b Is there a problem?#k#l

Hmm, the Prince should give it up right about now, yet he's still persistent. I bet even if Kyrin receives the pearl, she'll only get angry at him for that. Hand me the pearl. I better talk to Prince Sharyl about this myself.
The Prince will be saddened by this. For you to carry out a personal order like this, you must be very close to Prince Sharyl. Next time you see him, make sure to console him.
Please find the pearl and give it to Kyrin. I want nothing more than to see Kyrin smile. Just make sure not to be detected by Muirhat.
You're here on Rolonay's behalf? Oh thank you for this... please send him my gratitude.
Rolonay is really a genius. Look at this graph that depicts the relation between the wave of the alien's powers and the power of the ancient magicians. This is perfection!
Dr. Kim is at Omega Sector.
It's a very important & confidential report, and you lost it? The information inside cannot be made public...
I'll give you another copy for now. Please don’t lose it again!
Ahhh, I'm so busy. Hey there, walking right past me. Are you busy right now? \r\n#L0##b Hey! Aren't you...???#k#l
...Wha...what? Ha...haven't you seen a pe...person wearing glasses and a beard? \r\n#L0##b Hmmm... you just looked suspicious...#k#l

I am busy right now, so let's talk about that some other time. Right now, I am in a major pinch, and I need your help. I need to turn in this report to Dr. Kim, yet I have so much stuff to do that I can't possibly get to Omega Sector right now. Can you please help me?
Thank you so much. I'll never forget this. Please gather up these reports and give them to #bDr. Kim#k.
You must be really busy. I see...
What? Baine noticed that, too?
I mean, I noticed something a few days back, too. Wait... there should be a document that contains the record of activities that day...the log...
You can find Bart at the observatory tower at the Nautilus Harbor. He spends his time with the seagulls.

Do you hear it? That strange noise that comes out of The Nautilus. Use this stethoscope, and you'll hear it. I've been working here for 10 years, and I've never heard anything like this. Can you find out what exactly happened?

Go to the #bharbor outside The Nautilus#k and walk towards East to find the #bobservatory tower#k. You'll find #bBart#k, there, and I have a hunch that he might have felt something. Please check and see if he's okay.
Maybe you don't hear that strange noise. Place your ear next to The Nautilus. Come on, just try it.

What? Is that true? So Bart detected something strange as well? Oh no... this is serious now. If that strange being is indeed a spy for the Black Magician, then this is going to throw the world upside down. I better read the report carefully!
Hmmm... I better start reading this report thoroughly.
I told you to take it to Baine.
For you to lose such a valuable item like that... you must be subpar at keeping things around. I'll give you another copy, but don't lose it this time.
Ah, here it is! Can you please give this to Baine for me?
This document is very important, and you must not lose it. Please give this to #bBaine#k.
It's not a hard task, but if you are too busy... there's nothing I can do.
Ah, you're back already. That was fast. Did you find the Black Magician's Token?

I knew it... I knew they were still in Victoria Island. I have a feeling they may want to collect more information on us. Good thing we noticed them before it was too late. In order for me to write up a report on this to Muirhat, I'll have to start writing up a report on the Black Magician.
You'll need to defeat 20 pigs and 20 red snails. You may be able to find some clues on the spies working for the Black Magician.
Were you not able to find the Black Magician's Token?
I have read through the report, and just as I suspected, the spies sent by the Black Magician seemed to have gathered some information about us. I believe this is only going to get worse.
I'll have to report this to Kyrin or Muirhat. I'll need some sort of concrete evidence that shows what Bart and I exactly saw... will you help us find it?
I am pretty sure they haven't left Victoria Island just yet. Based on their past actions, I think they are still around here...

There may be a token that one of the spies may have dropped around here. I am pretty sure one of the monsters around the area has it, so please defeat #r20 red snails and 20 pigs#k and bring the #btoken#k to me.
Is this too tough of a task to do? If you can help us out just a little bit, that would be... so helpful. Sigh... I guess I'll need to just report to Muirhat without them.
Did you just say the spies from the Black Magician? What? They are here, all the way to The Nautilus...?
Hmmm... if it is indeed as stated in the report, then this is a serious, serious issue...
Muirhat should be standing in front of the Captain's Room.
I can't believe you just lost that. I'll give you another copy of the report, as well as the token that someone else had picked up. Please don't lose them again.

Thanks to your help with the Black Magician's Token, I was able to complete the report much earlier than expected. I'll now have to give this report to Muirhat, but since you were the number one contributer with the Token and all, I think it's only fair that you hand in this report yourself. No?

If things end up working out because of the report, then you may become the hero of The Nautilus. Please hand it in to #bMuirhat#k. Muirhat can be found #bin front of the Navigation Room#k on the #bupper hallways of The Nautilus#k.

He can seem like a man of very few words, and you may feel like he'd be unapproachable. In fact, the opposite is true, so I suggest you summon up the courage and talk to him. I mean, you'll also take the lion's share of the praises if this all goes well. You have nothing to lose!
Ah~ were you able to slay them?

That was incredibly fast. You're the kind of a prodigy that's hard to find in Victoria Island. I'll let Kyrin know of your outstanding job here. Everyone at The Nautilus will remember your job well done here.
Were you not able to eliminate the spy from the Black Magician yet? You may want to revisit the place I told you to go to.

Hmmm... this is a big problem. The spies sent by the Black Magician have been observing us for quite some time here. The problem is, this is not the first time they have been chasing our every move. I want this to be taken care of soon. Are you willing to do it?
Referring to Bart's report, the spies seem to be around this area. Hmmm... I'll send you to their hideout spot, and I want you to eliminate the #rBlack Magician's Spy#k.

They are always in disguise, so they'll be very hard to detect. It's when they're tired that they transform back to their normal selves. I want you to really look carefully so you can spot the one and eliminate him.
I was hoping you'd be able to take care of this. Was I asking too much?

Sigh... what's with all this dust! I keep cleaning and cleaning, yet I don't see any difference whatsoever! Now my towel's about to be completely torn off... and now, it is. Oh no... what should i do...\r\n#L0##b Is there something going on there?#k#l

Sigh... look at this cleaning towel. I wiped away so much dust that it's already ragged and torn off. I don't have any spare with me... and yet, look at all this dust! How am I going to clean all this? Where can I find a spare cleaning towel?\r\n#L0##b Do you want me to find one for you?#k#l
Oh, that's very nice of you! Will you do that?

I hear that the Ribbon Pig on Victoria Island wears a ribbon with such a tightknit fabric that it's very good for soaking up dusts. I would love for you to get me #b50 Ribbons from the Ribbon Pigs#k. I know it's a lot, but I think I'll go through that quickly, too.
Look at all this dust! Don't tell me I don't need a cleaning towel right this minute... well, but if you don't clean, this doesn't matter much to you.
That was fast! Let's see, did you bring all 50?
1, 2, 3,...., 50. That's it! That's it! How can I thank you for this? I love it so much that, even if you mess this place up a bit, I will just let it slide.
I said 50 Ribbons. If you can get me more, that would be suuuuper.
Ahhh, all the squeakings from the rats. I can't stand it! Hey, aren't you the one that got me some ribbons from the Ribbon Pigs? Haha, good to see you!\r\n#L0##b Is there something going on again?#k
Kids these days catch on pretty quickly. You've helped me last time, and... can you help me once more?

The Nautilus usually was on the water, so you don't even sniff a rat around here... but ever since we came here, since the ship is in direct contact with the land, I see rats here and there, and that really bothers me. Shulynch saw one yesterday, and she almost fainted!
I hear that the Ratz from Ludibrium give out #bRat Trap#k, and if you can get me some, I will love you for it. I just need #b50#k.
Will that be too much for you? Sigh... what am I going to do with all these rats?
Hohoho! You're fast, just like the last time!
Now how am I going to set up these 50 rat traps? Anyway, I like how young people like you take care of things so quickly. Hahaha.
Ahhh, did you forget your promise already? I need 50 rat traps, and you can get them from Ratz in Ludibrium.
Hahaha... hey there, kid. Can I ask you for one. More. Favor? \r\n#L0##b Wait a minute... what's this smell???#l#k

Sigh... if you see Jack, you know how he smells. Seriously, I have never, ever seen him wash up once in my life. Jack has been on board for 10 years now, and even if I clean and clean and clean some more, Jack's disgusting footprints leave a mark everywhere. I need to wash him up... and I need your help. Can you help me one last time?

Ahhh, thank you so so much. If you go waaaay down to Sleepywood, you may be able to get some #bpure water#k... and I want you to get one bottle of it, and pour it on #bJack#k. Just so he can be a tiny bit cleaner than he was earlier today.
I know, I know, I keep asking you for favors. I understand if you are busy right now.
Hehe, who are you? What's that in your hand? Is that food?\r\n#L0##b Hi there, are you Jack? (OMG... he really smells...)#k#l

Sniff sniff... my hair itches. (Scratches his head) let me see what you have in your hand. It looks like something I can drink...  \r\n#L0##b I am really sorry, but just stand still for a second! (Sprays water all over him.)#k#l
Whoa! That's cold!

Sniff sniff... what are you trying to do? Did... Mrs. Reade order you to do it? Hahaha... this will not make me do what she wants me to do? Why do I have to wash up? I mean, the nature takes care of me, and I'll be naturally clean after a while...
Man, you only got my shirt wet! Oh well, it's going to dry up in a bit, right? Hahahah... oh man, my back's itching...
(Oh my... even with that impromptu shower session, there's no change whatsoever!)
Please spray that Pure Water over Jack. If that'll help him get JUST A BIT CLEANER...
Ahhh... what should I make for dinner... hey, you're back!
You were able to eliminate it already. That's amazing! Oh, to be young again! Thanks to you, those pigs won't be sniffing around the food storage area anytime soon.
Please teach 30 pigs and 30 Ribbon Pigs a lesson, so they won't ever sniff around the food storage again.
Oh no! Our food! Those darn pigs came in late at night and ate our food again! Hey you there, help me out here. I don't see a lot of people crossing path, so that's why I'm asking you for help.

Phew, you're a much nicer kid than I thought. What I want is for you to eliminate some #rpigs#k and #rRibbon Pigs#k around the area. Those hungry creatures always come in to our food storage area and eat some overnight. If this keeps happening, we'll all be starving soon. That's why I want you to eliminate some of those dastardly creatures. #b30 each#k. I can't wait!
Ah... young kids these days... sigh...

Hmm hmm.. Hey! I saw you just walking by! Thanks to your great work, those pigs haven't been sniffing around ever since. Thank you so much! Hahahha... I cooked something for you in return... and... here, try it.\n\r#L0##b Whaaaaaaat! (Is this really... the Dragon Special that I've only heard of in storybooks??? Oh my goodness...)#k#l
Hahaha! Isn't it delicious? That's what everyone says when they try my food. Now that you've tasted the heavens, can you help me out once more?
Yes yes, I like your attitude. I need to make food for everyone on board, and I am out of milk. Please fill this bottle up with milk.

For fresh ingredients, I raise a number of milk cows at the corner of this ship. Go there, and milk some from the cows. Lately, we've seen a number of baby cows being born, and... those kids sure can eat, so please be careful. If you leave the bottle in front of them, they'll just drink it all...

Oh, and you can only fill up 1/3 of this bottle from one cow. If you try to milk more, there won't be any left for the babies, so... once you're ready to hit the stable, let me know. I'll take you there.
Were you not that impressed with my food?
Ohhh! Fresh milk! What do you think about the stable? Isn't it amazing?
Haha... thanks to your help, the crew will be feasting tonight. Thank you, and if you ever find yourself hungry, come by and I'll make you something delicious. Hahahah!
Didn't I tell you to fill up the whole bottle with milk?
Hello, traveler? Are you here at the Generator Room to see this rock? Isn't Shining Stone amazing? And the Whalians that control the rock... they're amazing too, right?
Since you've made your way all the way down here, can I ask you for a favor? Not many people pass through this area, and we're in a bit of trouble right now.

The Whalians here don't eat what the normal people eat. They eat something that can only be found in the sea. They always ate that, but... now that we've spent a considerable amount of time here on land, the ingredients have run out.

My cousin Kenta, who lives in Aquarium, can make something for them. That's why I am here to ask you for a favor. Can you send this letter that I wrote about that food to #bKenta#k? You can find him at the Aquarium Zoo.
I guess you don't have time to help me. Who should I ask, then?
You're here to give me a letter? It's from Porchay?
Oh... so it's about the special food that the Whalians eat. They only eat certain things, so... let's see if there's any left.
You can find Kenta at the Aquarium.
Kenta is at the Aquarium Zoo, watching over the animals.
Did you lose the letter? Oh no... I'll write you another one. Don't lose it again, okay?
Now, please give this letter to Kenta.
Ah, you are back! All I have to do now is to dump in the Sea Horse Tails in here, and the food will be ready.
Okay, now let's dump them in. See what happens.
I don't think you have 50 Sea Horse Tails. I can't cook this thing if I don't have all 50 of them...
Oh no... I am actually missing one of the ingredients... the Sea Horse Tails... what should I do...
Ahh, you're willing to find some for me? Thank you so much! The #bSea Horse Tails#k can be found through #bSeacle#k. You can find them all over Aquarium. Can you get me 50 of them?
You must be running out of time. I am just glad you made your way all the way here to give me this letter.
Oh you're back! I've been waiting for you!
Wow! Kenta sure cooked up a feast! I can just imagine the Whalians smiling at the thought of eating this. Thank you so so much!
Please take this feast and give it to Porchay. She seemed to need it right this minute, so please hurry your way back to her.
What you lost it?? I have some spare, but please don't lose it again.
Here's the feast. Can you please take this and go deliver it to Porchay?
Here it is! Give this to #bPorchay#k, and please let her know that if she ever runs out again, all she needs to do is let me know, and I'll make some for her.
I guess you don't need to go to Victoria Island yet. Yes, it is a long way from here.

I heard it from Black Bark already. Seriously, he asks for favors first, then thinks about it. Sigh... I am busy preparing for this festival... if he wasn't an old friend of mine, then the answer would have been no...
Yeah, that's 40 tablecloths all right. Okay, time to make a dress!
Mrs. Ming Ming is at Henesys.
I don't think you have 40 tablecloths, and without them, I can't make a dress.
Hey hey there! Are you aware that Kyrin's birthday is coming up! Seriously, to see her all grown up now, that is just astounding. Seriously!

That's why a few days ago, the crew voted and we decided the best birthday present for her would be a dress. Yes, I've seen her for a long long time, and I have honestly never seen her wear a feminine dress. That's why I asked my dear friend Mrs. Ming Ming for help, and... the problem is, we don't have the materials! Can you get some for us?

Hahaha... unlike most people, you seem nice and diligent. That's very commendable! I knew you were a capable member of the crew at The Nautilus! In order to make the dress, we'll need a thin, white cloth with good quality, and I heard that the tablecloth from Jr. Wraith is the best one available. I want you to acquire #b40 tablecloths#k and give them to #bMrs. Ming Ming#k.
Hmmm... that was cold.
Ahh, you're back! Let's see the dress!

Ohh... she still has it. This dress is just beautiful! The crew will be in awe when they see this. You should also drop by for the birthday party, you know. Don't you want to see how she looks like in that dress you hand-delivered?
Please deliver the dress to Black Bark. You didn't forget it, did you?
Good thing I have an extra dress that I made with spare materials. It took me a lot of time and effort to make this. Don't lose it again!

Okay, good thing I have started on the basic stuff already, because I am done with the dress now! Please give this to Black Bark, and tell him... that I'll be charging him for this dress shortly. Hahahaha!
Please make sure that this dress doesn't get wrinkled, and since the fabric is very thin, it may get ripped. I suggest you deliver this to #bBlack Bark#k now. He hates waiting...

Are you avoiding Black Bark because he scares you? He may look intimidating, but ... he hasn't even held a girl's hand yet. Hahaha... not even my hands back in the day... hey, what am I saying? HAha....
My glasses are horn-rimmed. Please find it for me.
My glasses... my glasses...\n\r#L0##b Is something wrong? Did you drop something on the ground?#k#l

Ahhh, please don't come near me! My glasses might have been dropped somewhere, and you don't want to step on them! Are my glasses around there? A black horn-rimmed pair of glasses...\n\r#L0##b No, I don't see any glasses around here...#k#l

Man... I told Bart so many times not to take my glasses. He likes shiny objects, so he'd take it while I am asleep... and each time that happens, the seagulls seem to take it from him. I am legally blind without them, so... can you go up to the Observatory Tower and find my glasses?

Thank you so much. My glasses are like another pair of my eyes. Without them, I can't see anything. Like I said, I am legally blind without them. I can't even recognize your face. It's just a blur to me.
Mine's a black, horn-rimmed glasses. My eyes are so bad without them that I can't see anything in front of me, so please find it!

You can find the #bObservatory Tower#k by #bheading right all the way#k. You'll see Bart and those seagulls in flocks, so it won't be hard for you to find my #bglasses#k. Please bring them back to me!
Don't you find me even a bit sad? You must be one cold-hearted person.
My fingers are losing their grip now... I can't do this much longer... if I let my hand go, the ship will sink... please help...somebody...

You are going to? Then get me #b50 Solid Horns#k. The ship has a hole right now, and if we don't cover this, we're all going to submerge. I'll plug the hole with my finger for now, but please get those horns right now! Hurry!
Ahhh.. The Nautilus might sink, though...
Did you bring the Solid Horns? Yes! Thank goodness. Please give me those right now. I better plug this hole with the horn.
That should temporarily take care of it. We better fix this ship soon.
I need 50 Solid Horns. I need to cover this hole on the ship right now.
You have reached Level 30 already. Are you here to become the Brawler? Then you've come to the right place.

But I can't just give you a job advancement that easily. I need you to prove yourself worthy of it. Brawlers use brute strength, steel fists, and their full bodies power to eliminate all opposition. In order to become a commendable Brawler, you'll need to be good with your fists! Proveto me that you are.

It's simple really. You'll just need to head to the test room where I'll send you, and fight #rOctopirates#k. Your task is to bring back #b15 Potent Power Crystals#k. You think it's easy? Then think again. These Octopirates can only be attacked with #rFlash Fist#k. Other attacks will be fruitless. It may be tough, but any honorable Brawler must go through this. Good luck...
Do you not wish to become a Brawler?
Good. You got all 15.

That performance in the testing ground was impressive. You look like you can become a legitimate force as a Brawler. Now tell me when you're ready to make the job advancement, and I'll go ahead and do it for you.
Bring 15 Potent Power Crystals.
You have reached Level 30 already. Are you here to become a Gunslinger? Then you've come to the right place.

But I can't just give you a job advancement that easily. I need you to prove yourself worthy of it. Gunslingers use Guns to eliminate oppositions. In order to become a commendable Gunslinger, you'll need to be good with your Gun, right? Prove it to me that you are.

It's simple really. You'll just need to head to the test room where I'll send you, and fight #rOctopirates#k. Your task is to bring back #b15 Potent Wind Crystals#k. You think it's easy? Then think again. These Octopirates can only be attacked with #rDouble Fire#k. Other attacks will be fruitless. It may be tough, but any honorable Gunslinger must go through this. Good luck...
Do you not wish to become a Gunslinger?
Good . You got all 15.

That performance in the testing ground was impressive. You look like you can become a legitimate force as a Gunslinger. Now tell me when you're ready to make the job advancement, and I'll go ahead and do it for you.
Bring 15 Potent Wind Crystals.

You look a bit stronger than last time! Rest assured, my friend, you haven't reached your true potential yet. There's no end to training, you know. If you need my help, I'll be more than ready to assist you.
This time, I want you to slay #r26 pigs#k. You fought them once, so this should be a piece of cake. Once you're done, come back here and let me know of the result.
If you are confident in your own training method, then that should be good enough for you.
Great job slaying 26 pigs! Not bad at all, I say, but you know you still have a long way to go, right? Compared to other monsters in this world, you haven't even scratched the surface yet.
I'll let you know when I see that you'll need another set of training. Until then...
You haven't slayed #r26 pigs#k yet. I didn't think they'd be too tough on you, but...
You were able to slay 43 pigs. I am quite impressed!
I'll let you know when I see that you'll need another set of training. Until then...
You haven't slayed #r43 pigs#k yet. I didn't think they'd be too tough on you, but...
Hey there! I heard you have gotten much stronger since the last time. Don't you think it has something to do with my great training method? Hahaha, off to the next one!
This time, your task is to hunt down 43 pigs. #r43#k... might be a bit high, but I think you can do it easily. Show me what you've got.
If you can train yourself effectively, then I won't need to step in.
Wow, you were able to slay 10 Green Mushrooms! I knew you could it!

Remember, the way of the Pirates have only just begun. The path is long, and sometime arduous, but I urge you to keep your head up, have no fear, and have the courage to look right into your opponent's eyes. That's the true mark of a Pirate.
I don’t think you've slayed all #r10 Green Mushrooms#k.

Thank you for being able to keep up with the training. It's good to see you molding into a bonafide Pirate. In order for you to prove to everyone that you're a Pirate, however, you'll have to pass this final test.

It's simple, really. You just need to hunt #r10 Green Mushrooms#k. Green Mushrooms are unlike any other monsters you've faced. I strongly advise you to keep your focus at all times. That doesn' t mean you should be too worried. You are already strong enough to handle them.
Are you afraid of the test? As a fellow Pirate, I find that behavior puzzling at best.
That was fast. I knew you'd be able to do it. Hopefully your efforts will result in bringing in peace on Victoria Island.
Once you make yourself more powerful, I'll contact you again for more help.
Please defeat 100 Stone Golems. They can be found in the deepest part of Victoria Island.

It has been a while. What brought you here? Hmmm... do I really have that look of concern? Everyone has been talking about how I seem to be in distress. I guess the words reached far enough that you made your way here... sigh...

What it is is that the evil spiritis of the Black Magician penetrated deep into Victoria Island, and that concerns me a lot. I feel that you may be capable of helping me stop the spreading of the evil spirits reaching the deepest part of the island. Will you help me do that?

Hey there~! Do you need to make your way to Omega Sector by chance? I know of an easy way to get there... but of course, for a price. There's no such thing out there that's free.

Okay, so you still want to know what it is, right? I'll tell you of a great way to get to Omega Sector at once. Tada! This card is all you need to make a quick trip there! I carried out Muirhat's order once and he gave me this as a reward. Use this card, and you'll have access to the warp portal that heads to Omega Sector. How is there a portal like that, you ask?

Dr. Kim of Omega Sector has been lifelong friends with Kyrin. They both share a mutual interest in technology, and they help each other out. When Kyrin built The Nautilus, I heard that Dr. Kim helped out qutie a bit. They still look to one another for technological help, and that's why they built this warp portal.

If you do me a favor, then I'll give you this card. Your basic trade of the goods, you know. What do you think? I have a list of items that I have to deliver to multiple places, and... if you can do it for me, I'll give you this Warp Card.

Awesome! Thank you thank you! Seriously, The Nautilus is much bigger than you think, and I didn't want to visit every corner of it. As promised, here's the Warp Card.

Use this to gain access to the machine located at the Navigation Room of The Nautilus and you'll head straight to Omega Sector. Without this card, however, this machine will not activate. Remember that, okay?

Ohh, and one more thing. This Warp Card is only available for one-time use. Once this card is inserted in the machine to activate it, the card will not be returned. Save the card until you really need to use it, you know. If you don't have multiple cards with you, then returning here will be a big problem.

It's been a while. You've changed quite a bit since the last time I saw you. I still remember when you first came here wanting to become a Pirate, and now you're a Buccaneer. How does it feel to become one?

Don't you feel like you are lacking that something? If you feel that you are already plenty strong, then you are deathly wrong. The path to greatness is filled with treacherous obstacles, one that you'll have to continuously walk on. Hmmm... from looking at you, I can sense that you need that extra something.

That's the attitude I've been looking for. I'll teach you a new skill that'll blow you away. Under one condition, that is... You may be a Buccaneer, but you may not have reached the level that I want you to be in. If you pass the test I give you, then and only then will I give you the new skill.

My test basically involves... withstanding me. You'll be dueling me in a battle, and I'll be using the new skill that I'll teach you. If you can withstand the attack, then you'll be good. Keep practicing Super Transformation and one day, you'll find yourself using the skill without even thinking.

When you use Super Transformation, it is imperative that you have a stone-cold demeanor. That means you should use this without any mood swings or thoughts into it. It looks like you still have a soft spot in your heart, so... head over to Leafre, and you'll encounter a monster named Red Dragon Turtle. Its heart is made out of stone, and it is both ruthless and cold-blooded. Now, I am not saying you should emulate them, but I do want you to take note. Yes, you will be facing the Red Dragon Turtle.

If the training ends well, then I'll even give you a small reward. I'll teach you a skill that you can use through Super Transformation. What do you think? Snatch is a powerful, powerful skill that can only be used when you are under the #bSuper Transformation#k. Please use this skill wisely...

Hey there! Long time! What? I look like I lost weight? That is true. The studies I have been conducting these days have been brutal to my body. I've been working on this new study where I'm seeking a new method that'll allow you to move from one place to another at an exact time by warping the dimension of time. This is obviously not an easy task...

Don't you think it'll be great if this really pans out? If it does, then we can travel to the past and correct our mistakes. I have actually gone 80% with this study, and it had been going great... until now. I've been stuck on neutral for a while now... in order to warp the dimension of time, I'll need to use the crack of dimension at Ludibrium. Unfortunately, you and I both know that place is controlled by Papulatus.
#h0#, are you really willing to help me with this? Of course, if all goes well, I will reward you well for your work.
With your unparallelled bravery, I think you are more than capable of defeating Papulatus. Defeat #rPapulatus#k, and also take note of anything abnormal that may serve as clues to this study.
Is Papulatus too much for you? Do I have to face him myself? Oh no...
Did you get any clues from Papulatus?
Hmm... it's a key. What is it for?
Please find anything abnormal regarding the crack of dimension through Papulatus.
Papulatus' key is not usable here right now. If you head over to the Origin of the Clocktower, then you may be able to find the machine that uses this key. Can you please head back there?
Please find the clues behind the key at the #bOrigin of Clocktower#k.
Are you deathly afraid of Papulatus?
Hey, how did you get in here?? And who are you? Wait, that key you have in your hand... I have that too... how do you have that? There should only be one key of this kind in this world...
Please show me the key that you have in your hand.
It is the key I have with me. How is it that there's two of its kind?? This is strange.
Please head over to the Origin of Clocktower. I am sure you can do something with the key there.
Please leave this place immediately.
Oh no, you lost the key? Thankfully I made several copies, so here you go. Please don't lose it again. It's an important piece of the puzzle I'm trying to complete.

What? You've met me before? This can't be right... I don't think we've ever met... and not only that, I haven't gone outside in a long time. I had been working on something for a while, and I had been seeing progress lately, so that's why I didn't go outside for a long time. What? You want to know what I am doing? Hmmm... how am I going to say this...
Look around this room. Once you look around here, then I'll let you know what I've been working on these days.
You must care less about what I'm working on these days.

What do you think about these rather interesting devices? Well...have you ever thought of traveling through time, visiting both the past and the future? That's exactly what I have been working on these days. How do I get that to work? Hmm...while I was wandering around the area, I ran into a 'Crack of Dimension'. Its a slight crack where time gets warped and distorted. I am utilizing this distortion to travel to wherever, whenever, at any time.

I am about 99% complete with the studies. Hmmm...what? You think I'll succeed? How do you know? And you said you've met me before... but this is the first time I've ever seen you! Wait, come to think of it, that key...that key...how did you end up with that? What? You're from the future?

You've received a key from me...and you know of my future...maybe you really came from the future to see me. It's hard to believe, but...what do I do in the future? For you to tell me that this will ultimately succeed...my heart is now racing into overdrive! I'm going to work so hard to finish my curl might come off!  Perhaps we shall meet again...

I have a lot of questions to ask you about the future... like how you ended up back in the past... but I think it'll be boring if I find out things about the future soon. Anyway, it's great to know that you've actually met me from the future...

Anyway, don't you have to return to the future? I know taking advantage of the warped dimension of time is cool, but you may also run the risk of damaging the timestream altogether. There's no telling what may happen when you travel back in time and run into the "old" you.

My studies are almost complete. 1% left, in fact. This means one thing... I have not tested it out yet myself. You'll need to go back to the future, and... will it be okay if I can help you return to your normal time?
You really trust me to do this? I mean... I understand if you feel weird about being a test dummy, but... I am 100% sure this will work. You already told me that I'd succeed in the future...

Alright, now I'll set this up so you'll return to where you came from. This machine will require some time to open the crack of dimension, in which you'll enter and time-travel. If you see me back in the future, please say hi... even if I may not necessarily remember you, again.
Do you feel that my experiment will end up as a failure...? Well, it is true that this is the very first live experiment I'll be conducting with this.
Hmmm...? You're telling me you met Papulatus in the past? Oh, so Papulatus took the key. I see... so does that mean that's the key used to open the crack of dimension?

Anyway, I also feel a strange aura emitting from you, #h0#. Maybe it's because you created a crack of dimension in an abnormal way, and you may have been affected by the special powers that exist while traveling time. Please have a seat. I'll examine you for a bit.

#h0#, close your eyes and start thinking. Do you feel something different? Something powerful? From what I see, I think you acquired a new power. I don't know what exactly it is, but I feel something different emmanating from you. Look at yourself closely in the mirror.
(After hearing Rolonay's words, I tried to meditate for a bit and realized something is a bit different. What is it? Oh... oh! I was able to turn back the clock for a little bit!)
(I think I did acquire a new power. I'm going to name this 'Time Leap'.)
Please let me know when you are ready to return to the future. I am all set and ready to open the crack of dimension.

That's great. Who's Lord Jonathan, you ask? He's the one that has been a pillar of strength for us Pirates. Pirates and seagulls have this special relationship, where we help each other out in numerous ways. Our friendship goes back ages. Currently, Lord Jonathan serves as the king to the seagulls. Are you not eager to meet Lord Jonathan because you don't know who he is? Hmm... I think it'll be best for you if you pay a visit...

Ohhhh! Now that was impressive! I considered my test quite difficult, and for you to pass that... you are indeed an integral member of the Pirate family, and a friend of seagulls. We are now bonded by the mutual friendship that will last a lifetime! And, most of all, friends are there to help you out when you are in dire straits. If you are in a state of emergency, call us seagulls.
Notify us using the skill Air Strike, and we will be there to help you out, because that's what friends are for.

Have you ventured into the volcanic lava areas of El Nath, the innermost part of the earth? There actually was a town located in an even deeper region than El Nath.

The residents there worshipped the fire-breathing monster and the statues made out of stone that resembled a human figure. To prove their unwavering belief, they would build a statue right underneath the tree that's planted in the deepest part of the volcano, and worshipped them.

That is when the disasters started occuring. The tree located deep in the volcanic mountain was actually saturated with the evil powers of Zakum. Zakum didn't have any physical body to work with, but after the residents built that statue, Zakum merged himself into the statue, and became a resurrected, living being.

Soon after, the town vanished without a trace. Since you have been in the world of Maple for quite some time, I am sure you must have heard of the monster called #bZakum#k, living under the fiery lava.
The first batch of truth ends here. When you are ready to hear part 2, let me know.
The first story I want to share with you involves a town located deep in the volcanic mountain that completely disappeared. Are you interested?
Great. I think you are more than capable of hearing the truth. Let me know when you are ready.
Whatever happened to the courage you summoned to see me?
Have you been to the Aquarium, located deep in the sea? The Aquarium is a mysterious area that floats above the the deep canyon. Aren't you curious to find out how Aquarium stays afloat?

At the bottom of the canyon where Aquarium stands, there is a series of corals that grow on their own, called #bHoly Corals#k. No one knows how it ended up there, or how it started growing, but it had been there for a long, long time.

#bHoly Corals#k have this mysterious ability to purify the ocean, and this power allows Aqua Road to stay clean, while keeping Aquarium afloat above the canyon. Without the #bHoly Corals#k, the whole sea will be blackened.
The second batch of truth ends here. When you are ready to hear the last story, let me know.
The second story I want to share with you involves corals that grow in the sea water. Are you interested?
Great. I think you are more than capable of hearing the truth. Let me know when you are ready.

Head up north from Leafre, and you'll see a lake that is bigger than the forest. People call this Lake Ludus, or The Lake Where Time Stops.

On top of the lake stands a humongous tower that supports the Ludibrium Castle. The giant clocktower that is placed in the middle of Ludibrium Castle provides a holistic power that protects the castle and allows the residents to keep the child-like dreams alive. That's how the time stopped ticking there.

The crack of dimension that exists in Ludibrium, however, has been getting bigger and bigger lately. The crack also allows the evil forces to seep into Ludibrium, contaminating the place in the process. I can sense that the powers of Alishar and Papulatus only seem to grow by the minute.
I am sure you may be aware of the reason why I am telling you these three stories of truth. Making the 4th job advancement comes with responsibilites like this.
You'll need to understand how the world of Maple works even more, and make decisions as a hero to all. I will now give you the last set of tasks to do for the 4th job advancement.

The third and last batch of truth involves The Lake Where Time Stops. Are you interested?
Great. I think you are more than capable of hearing the truth. Let me know when you are ready.

How you will acquire these items, I'll leave that up to you. If you want to acquire by fully utilizing your courage and physical capabilites, then you should get them through #bManon and Griffey#k. If you want to acquire them using brains and wisdom, then head to Leafre and see #b#p2081000##k.
What is there for you to fear? You are walking the path of Pirate greatness, and you don't wish to encounter hardship?
I have heard of your story through the priest at the Minar Forest. Is it true that you are trying to make the 4th job advancement?

What you are looking for are probably #b#t4031343##k and #b#t4031344##k. If you can do this one thing for the good people in this town, then I will give you an item that you've been looking for. What do you think? Do you wish to prove yourself as a hero to all of us?

This forest and the dragons have protected us Hafrings, and we the Hafrings do our job protecting the eggs of the dragons. Lately, however, we have come to realization that we'll have to one day find ways to protect ourselves as well.

From what I hear, the merchants selling scrolls from other towns also sell #b#t4031348##k, a scroll which protects the one that uses it. I feel that the scroll will be able to protect the town and the Minar Forest as well.
Will you be able to acquire the scroll for our town?\r\nIf you get us the scroll, then I'll give you the item you've been looking for.
You don't need to necessarily take up my offer on it. I know you are resourceful enough to try other methods to find those items.
You successfully found #b#t4031348##k! Thank you!

I can't thank you enough for your kindness. This scroll that you worked so hard to get us will be of great help for everyone in this town. \rI truly believe you have the heart of gold, a hero to all of us.
Not ready with #b#t4031348##k yet?
They're here! They're here! They have finally returned to the Maple World! What...? Are you asking who "they" are?! You still don't know? THEY, are the #bPirates#k!!!

#bShe#k is now back in Victoria Island, after years of traveling the ocean as a Pirate, in search of something! She must have finally gotten over her personal agony that have haunted her for the longest time. If the Pirates can help out the Maple World, then it will be awesome! Haha... just thinking about it gets me excited!

The newest set of heroes to grace the world of Maple, the Pirates! You won’t be able to ignore their presence. If you are interested in these Pirates, then... I can offer you an opportunity to experience one of their #bamazing skills#k. What do you think? Are you interested?

Then prove it to me that you are interested in Pirates. I will give you #b4 questions on Pirates#k. If you can answer all four of them right, then I will give you #b#t2210010##k. Talk to me when you are ready to answer the questions.

You are the one who has already exceeded the boundaries and the limits of a human being...the only time the proud #t1902002# bows its head is to you. Hopefully you'll experience new, amazing adventures that are surely to await you with #t1902002#...

Until you bring me #b#t1902001##k and #b#t1912000##k, I am afraid I won't be able to introduce you to your new friend.  Return to me when you are ready, and I shall make the introduction.

I know who you are. You were born a Pirate a long time ago aboard the mighty vessel known as the Nautilus.  You established your presence and power at the land of the snow, and...I also bestowed you of a new name worthy of a great Pirate...

Now that you have reached the apex as a Pirate, I'll introduce to you a new companion. Countless Pirates, from Ms.Behave to Loosetooth Pete, strived for it, but couldn't get it, and now you have the opportunity to get it... What do you think...do you want #t1902002#?

It may not be a human, but #t1902002# possesses a fierce spirit...but, for someone like you, who's reached the level only a select few can dare reach, then it should serve you with the utmost loyalty.
If you are ready to initiate a powerful friendship, then let me know.
I don't think you are ready. No one in Maple can defeat you, so why fear the change?  As the undisputed master of the sea, one who feels at home amongst the waves, this should seem enticing to you...
Help! Help! Please help me!

Thanks. I need to rescue 'Delli' right now, can you help me? Delli is a monster who was with Rolonay at Mu Lung. I'm sure you've noticed it by now that Rolonay wasn't a person, no? The disguise wasn't very well-done, so... it's not hard to tell.

The best way to describe Rolonay and Delli is that... unlike other monsters, they are more "aware" of things. In the beginning, monsters and humans didn't hate one another. They coexisted peacefully. It wasn't until one day when the monsters collectively got swept away by the evil powers that engulfed the world, and turned against humans. Not so for Rolonay and Delli, though. They tried to lead their fellow stricken monsters back to normal.

During those tough times, Rolonay was put in a dangerous situation, and I wound up saving him, bring him to The Nautilus. We also tried to bring Delli along with us, but she refused, so we left her there at Mu Lung. Unfortunately, we received a word that she has been captured by the mosnters there. We have no idea where she is trapped, so... I'll scour the northern part of Mu Lung, and you'll scour the bottom half. I'll take you there with me right now.
Do I have to find someone else...?

Again, thank you so much for rescuing me. I don't know how to repay you for all this... both Shulynch and you are the nicest people I have encountered. If you approach the monsters the same way you approached me, they may all end up becoming friends with you, as well. Please never lose the kindness you have in you.
